review: One of the best and most unique tower-defence games I have played. Definitely not a TD where you can idle in between rounds, but the game gives you a great selection of weapons/spells so that you can battle the hordes yourself. Easy to pickup and learn but still offers a great challenge. If you enjoy tower defence games, you will definitely enjoy this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198106332639', 'num_games_owned': 407, 'num_reviews': 123, 'playtime_forever': 1099, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1099, 'last_played': 1666562010}
review:
Orcs Must Die is a mindlessly fun game that mixes tower defense with third-person shooter/sword play elements. Essentially the game gives you traps or allies which you can place around the map to your liking. I found that the levels sometimes played out like a puzzle where you would try and find the best combinations of traps/weapons/magic to make a map more manageable. The game has a ton of enemy types which add variety to the map that forces you to react and adapt or else you'll find yourself not making the 5 Skull score.

One issue I had with this game was that it was very easy and you'll find yourself leaning toward a particular group of traps for a good portion of the game. Also, a small portion of the traps/magic/weapons are completely useless in my opinion. Another thing about the game is the story, which isn't very good and is just thrown in to make the game seem less like an arcade game.

Graphics: 8/10
Gameplay: 9/10
Story: 3/10
Music: 5/10
Difficulty: 4/10 (Medium) 7/10 (Hard)
Game Length: 27 hours if you're going for 100%

author: {'steamid': '76561198422408922', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 1179, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1179, 'last_played': 1629923870}
review:
[h1]Зато здесь котики, они такие милые и смешные![/h1]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2562490208
Полчища орков ломятся в замок. Местный Иванушка-дурачок каждый раз невероятным образом отбивает несметные орды и спасает мир в одиночку. Вот такой нехитрый синопсис. Формула простая, но рабочая. Ведь здесь сочетается и визуальный стиль и музыка и геймплей. Музыка достаточно простоватая, не режет слух и поддерживает общий задорный стиль игры. Реплики главного героя прекрасно озвучены и каждый раз доставляют. Визуальный стиль близок к мультяшному, что не мешает надоедливым оркам разлетаться на куски под каламбурчики боевого мага альянса.

[h1]Tower Defense[/h1]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2584891715
Самая сильная сторона Orcs Must Die! это геймплей. Не дать орде добежать из точки А в точку Б можно десятком различных способов. Расстрелять из арбалета, пойти в рукопашную, настроить хитроумных ловушек, использовать окружение типа чанов с лавой/кислотой или плохо закрепленных канделябров - все что угодно. Смерь поджидает орков буквально на каждом шагу и над каждой изощренной расправой наш бравый герой готов подшутить.

Лучшая игра в жанре tower defense. Была и судя по всему таковой и останется.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077020855', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 1301, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1254, 'last_played': 1629824974}
review:
Ors Must Die! is a Tower Defense game that adds a main character as a third person action figure to the classical gameplay of such games.
You place traps and soldiers at crucial locations before each round and as soon as the round starts, you actively participate by casting spells, shooting with your crossbow, or entering melee combat.
Throughout the playthrough you will literally kill ten thousands of enemies, which are quite manifold and require different counter measures: there are not only orcs, but also ogres, kobolds, gnolls, and flying enemy types. The huge array of traps and accessories is entertaining and allows different approaches and tactics.
Orcs Must Die! is a very fun game I can recommend to anyone who likes action or TD games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076379593', 'num_games_owned': 191, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 1188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1188, 'last_played': 1629660147}
review:
[h1] Orcs Must Die! 100% Review [/h1]

This game was a blast to play, and if you love tower defense games that also require you to take action while in game, you'll love this. This version of the game is single player and the achievements are not hard to obtain, there a great guide to help you along your way to 100%. I ended up beating every map with a 5 skull rating on every diffaculty before obtaining the 30k Orc achievement, but it only toke me 3 extra map runs to get me the kill count. Very enjoyable, very fun, would recommend anyone picking it up when it is on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015797674', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1629639823}
review:
I tried to play the game but the game would not let me,  because the game won't allow me to open the spellbook,I tried all user suggested fixes used two different controllers but nothing worked,
after looking it up this is an issue that's been around from 2013!! and the devs did nothing to address this issue.
Yet they keep selling this as a "complete" product.
Don't bother purchasing this broken mess.

review: Dopo anni ho ripreso questo gioco e l'ho trovato ancora più divertente di un tempo. Ricordatevi che per ottenere cinque teschi bisogna finire i livelli entro il tempo massimo, che viene evidenziato a fine livello nelle statistiche, altrimenti anche se avete fermato tutti vi beccate solo quattro teschi. Gli ultimi livelli sono veramente ostici ma provando diverse strategie si possono superare.

author: {'steamid': '76561198329242102', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1195, 'last_played': 1629509675}
review:
Vydáním třetího dílu se tato hra dostala do mého hledáčku. Zábavná hra na způsob tower defense, kde zároveň běháte za Maxe a střílíte z kuše, nebo kástíte spelly a samozřejmě pokládáte pastičky. K tomu menší příběh, hromadu Orků/koboldů/jiných potvor a o zábavu je postaráno. 
+Achievementy se v pohodě daly zvládnout.
------------------------------------------------------

-Nejtěžší obtížnost zas tak těžká není.

review: Jako člen člověka v tísni, máte za úkol dostat bezpečně nebohé orky za hradební zdi a když už se vám to podaří, musite je uvnitř hradu nějak zabavit. k tomu vám slouží pokoutně vyrobené středověké tentononc, jako kupříkladu plamenomet, zelezná, ostnatá gule, (kterou je ovšem potřebas používati s rozmyslem, bo taková nebohá orčí hlava občas nedává majzla a koupí jí na první dobrou mezi lampy), z čehož ve středisku bezpečnosti práce nemá radost vůbec nikdo, nota bene, když je taková nebohá orčí obět přišpendlená na zdi, které naproti vévodí nevhodně umistěná atrapa zdi, která při průchodu okolo, vystřelí stovky nabroušených šipek. a to by v tom byl gnom, aby v tom nějaký potížista z bozp nenašel funkční prototyp a navíc bez cedulky "procházet pouze na vlastní nebezpečí". naštěstí orků je dostatek a tak se na nějaké ty ztráty moc nekouká.  dvojka je taky super, tak neváhej a užij fotříkovu kreditku. tohle je rozhodně hra, kterou musíš mít!

author: {'steamid': '76561198128815553', 'num_games_owned': 268, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 1325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 758, 'last_played': 1629228633}
review:
"Ca fait désordre" dira votre personnage après avoir démembré 50 orcs à l'aide de son gros rondin hérissé de pics. Non l'autre rondin.

L'opus original de la série vaut encore le coup pour ceux qui se demandent, bien qu'il soit clairement suclassé par ses successeurs. Toutefois, bien qu'il ait moins à offrir et notamment pas de partie en coopération, il reste très bon sur tous le plans :
- Graphismes "un peu cartoon" ayant l'avantage de ne pas souffrir du temps qui passe.
- De bonne sessions défouloires.
- Beaucoup de pièges pour varier les plaisirs et les combos.
- Des répliques qui font sourir de temps à autre.
- Une difficulté bien dosée (d'autant plus que vous serez seul, pas de coop possible).

Si vous hésitez entre cet opus et le 2ème Orcs must die!, préférez tout de même le 2 : il comprend les niveaux du 1 (niveaux "classiques" et permet les parties en coop ou le mode infini.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053232583', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1788, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1480, 'last_played': 1694301364}
review:
Tower Defense games and I haven't really ever gotten along. The gameplay loop often got stale quickly and I found myself just going through the motions - that said. Orcs Must Die! was able to hold my attention for a long time and I found myself sinking in many hours playing it.
The gameplay is quick and easy to pick up and yet the levels offer enough of a challenge (especially on 'Nightmare Mode') to keep you on your toes.
Sure you'll have the traps and spells you like but you'll find yourself in a level that will require a new strategy that you'll need to think up on the fly.
The music is fun and simple, nothing to bother or distract you while playing and the story is rather simple and straightforward.
I picked the game up a while back and never really got around to playing it until now and honestly I'm glad I did.
I highly recommend 'Orcs Must Die!' to anybody who likes the genre or just somebody looking for a neat little game.
Score: 8/10

review:
Es increíble que un juego de hace 10 años haya logrado envejecer tan bien en lo que es jugabilidad y ni hay que hablar del soundtrack que tiene (que ya tengo descargado en mi teléfono).

Lo único que lamento es que cuando lo compre no lo descargue en lo momento para jugarlo, ahora lo único que me falta es terminarlo para moverme a la secuela que si los desabolladores no metieron la pata sera mucho mejor que este.

author: {'steamid': '76561198439651846', 'num_games_owned': 357, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 2532, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1872, 'last_played': 1656776123}
review:
Orcs Must Die é o melhor Tower Defense que eu já joguei na vida. Tão bom que você platina sem perceber.

Absurdamente divertido, estratégico e terapêutico. Perfeito para desestressar no dia a dia, enquanto espera a água do miojo ferver ou naqueles 10 minutos entre um serviço e outro.

Me faltam palavras para descrever essa formosura em forma de jogo. Basicamente você vai utilizar armadilhas e magias para causar um genocídio de orcs invasores de propriedades alheias, usufruindo de táticas que unem inteligência, sadismo e prazer, limitados apenas pela sua criatividade assassina.

Tá com raiva? Frustrado? Entediado? Com prisão de ventre? 
Vem matar orc. 

Nota: 10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198052319100', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 564, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 564, 'last_played': 1627665944}
review:
Orcs Must Die! je jakýsi mix akce a klasického tower defense žánru, takže vašim úkolem bude ubránit se hordám orků, ogrů a různých dalších potvor. K dispozici vám k tomu budou rozličné zbraně a pasti, které budete odemykat postupným zdoláváním levelů, a poté sázet po mapě za určitý obnos peněz. Vše je přitom zabalené do velmi líbivého grafického kabátku a okořeněné solidně nakopávající hudbou.

Hra vlastně nenabízí žádný hluboký příběh nebo nějaké komplikované mechaniky, ale svou jednoduchostí a svižným tempem dokáže přikovat k monitoru tak, až zapomenete, že onu větu "Ještě jeden level a jdu spát." si říkáte už další dvě hodiny a několik levelů po sobě. Orcs Must Die! je zkrátka velmi chytlavá hra, která hráče po náročném dni nebude zatěžovat nějakým příběhem a dalšími složitostmi, ale nechá ho trochu se vyřádit na hordách nepřátel.

Jako mínus bych zmínil to, že zde chybí editor vlastních levelů a multiplayer, což by hru povýšilo na úplně jinou úroveň. Dále pasti, kterých je ve hře hromada, se mi zdají většinou stejné, jen s jiným vizuálním efektem zabití. Takže v pozdější fázi hry už budete mít svůj osvědčený výběr nástrah či zbraní a ostatní budete moci v klidu ignorovat. Mně například nejvíc zabírala taktika, kdy jsem byl já sám vybaven ohnivou střelou a všude jsem kladl zpomalovací pasti a vybuchující panáky, zatímco okolo jsem měl gardu lučištníků. Ostatní pasti už byly jen do počtu.

Orcs Must Die! není nějaká velká hra na desítky hodin, ale jako nenáročná jednohubka funguje bezvadně.

review: Kiedyś odrzuciłem ten tytuł, ale teraz kiedy swoją premierę będzie miała trzecia część od razu postanowiłem ograć pierwszą i jestem pod mega wrażeniem. Pierwsza część nie miała trybu współpracy, ale II już ma i myślę że to będzie jeszcze lepsza zabawa niż w singlu. Polecam, warto!

author: {'steamid': '76561198254796599', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 3052, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3052, 'last_played': 1627250672}
review:
Первая миссия выходит как учебная , при загрузке миссии всегда дают советы по ловушкам и магии. Игра не много напоминает мобильную игру Defender. Нужно отражать волны врага. Присутствует прокачивание оружия , ловушек , магии. Система прокачивания лёгкая нужно подбирать черепа или получать их за выполнение заданий , если уложиться во время чем то время которое отводится на выполнение миссии плюс один череп , сохранить 20 или 30 жизней портала плюс ещё один череп ну так далее. Каждая миссия может быть так и с одним проходом атак так и с не сколькими проходами. Волны первоначально отражаются быстро и легко с каждым уровнем всё больше и больше добавляется новых орков. Самые трудные которые летают они могут появиться от куда угодно и не успеваешь понять , что от куда прилетело пока занят отражением атаки то на карту смотреть не , когда. Самое не удобное , когда предлагают на выбор , что прокачивать в бою ловушки или магию то есть по сути это нужно всё но нужно выбрать что-то одно и это крайне не удобно. Большой скажем минус , что в игре нельзя играть кооператив тут как раз его не хватает играя с другом проще было проходить миссии и не беспокоиться о том , что кого-то  пропустил или идёт атака с другой двери. Про это , как-то разработчики не подумали. Игра довольно не плохая каждая миссия заставляет хорошо подумать , как грамотно поставить ловушки и , что прокачать. Игра оставила положительные эмоции быстро и легко убивает время.
Минусы :
1. Не хватает  кооператива 
2. Мало ловушек 
3. Система прокачивания в бою не удобна из за выбора между ловушками или магию
Плюсы :
1. Грамотное расположение ловушек 
2. Удобное управление 
3. Интересно затягивающая игра
4. Русский язык 
Итог :
5 из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198017820191', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 513, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 513, 'last_played': 1322121600}
review:
Et super charmerende spil, der udkom tilbage i 2011, hvor jeg dengang ligesom så mange andre, var begejstret for tower defense spil i webbrowser form. 
Orcs must die der på given dato er en trilogi, er blevet en serie jeg er rigtig glad for. De er hyggelige, ikke for komplicerede og så har serien et skønt glimt i øjet. Denne titel er kun singleplayer men det var helt fint dengang. Jeg vil stadig anbefale Orcs must die, da det for sine egne præmisser er et rigtig godt spil, men skal man vælge imellem dem, vil jeg forslå at man spiller 3’eren. 

8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198177311526', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1429, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1429, 'last_played': 1626798967}
review:
Game has a goofy and like-able protagonist, a basic but decent story line. Game-play is quite straightforward, the Orcs Must die, and you gotta make it happen.

Good things about the game:

	- Solid 15 to 20 hours of game-play
	- Achievements are relatively easy to get (you get most of them by just playing the game)
	- Both Graphics And Game-play doesn't feel dated at all

Criticisms:

- Lack of infinite (wave) mode
	Some levels really makes me wish i can fill up Every inch of the level with traps and have 1000s of orcs running in every wave.

- Traps balance
	All traps and weapons are useful in some scenarios, but some are just too "meta" when you're working with limited resource, an infinite mode would've helped mixing up trap setups.

- Trap upgrades
	You gotta finish the Whole game, in 2 different difficulties to get all the upgrades, and you don't even get to feel OP by the end either, coz of the previous 2 points.

All these 3 issues are solved in the sequels thou.

Side note:

	DLC weapons are quite op, recommend playing without them, but if you're struggling in a certain level they can help you out.

Concluding thoughts:

	Definitely a good game for the first of the series, highly recommend if you wanna give the orcs series a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198147937223', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1194, 'last_played': 1627058897}
review:
Yes, yes and yes. 

A tower defense with a twist. You get to be part of the defense! You can actively shoot your crossbow, throw your spells or go in with your sword. It's super fun. 
There's a lot of variety when it comes to the traps, different types of enemies, maps and spells. You can upgrade your traps with the skulls you earn (depending on how well you do on the levels). There's a lot of solutions to each level, be creative.
A simple story and funny interactions with the orcs and the villain. Nothing spectacular but it's a nice detail that it's there.
Three difficulty levels (the nightmare one made me sweat, but hey, i completed it). 
And it's relatively cheap and will give you at least 10 hours of fun (just for the main story on normal difficulty).

review: Es la curva de dificultad mas rara y ambivalente que vi en mi vida. Pero llegado cierto punto se siente bien cuando te sobran los créditos para comprar trampas y por instantes no tienes que ni moverte para verlos morir.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057378996', 'num_games_owned': 3918, 'num_reviews': 479, 'playtime_forever': 1421, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 652, 'last_played': 1628006114}
review: The game's great, so is the franchise, but this is incredibly difficult at times, with meta heavy builds that cannot be ignored or else you'll pay by losing, a lot. The worst part is this one didn't have COOP so some of the levels are incredibly hard and you can't seek for help from another player. It's the game that started the franchise, it's amazing but I just wish this was properly balanced.

review:
This games a blast 
keep in mind its not really something you will play seriously days on end.
its the type of casual game you play a few rounds have a barrel of laughs and just enjoy the carnage.
stages get nice and challenging and the amount of freedom they give you to  design your trap set ups is lovely.
so if you want a blast and a game you can play with friends in co op then gives this game a try
a true gem you wont regret it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039406214', 'num_games_owned': 1735, 'num_reviews': 140, 'playtime_forever': 923, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 923, 'last_played': 1625767888}
review:
Posipi :

- Tué des orcs .
- Une multitude de piéges .
- Des map qui offre un défis .
- Chaque orc a un comportement différent .
- Les tisseuses de destin qui offre une orientation en fonction de notre mode de jeux .
- 24 Maps + 5 dans le DLC 
- 3 niveaux de difficulté (  2+ 1 qui se débloque après avoir fini le jeux )


Negapi :

- Le jeux a mal vieilli .
- On fini pars utilisé toujours la même combinaison de pièges .
- Des cartes un peu longue en temps .
- Durée de vie  environ 8H pars difficultés .
- un scénario qui tiens en  3 phrases .


Conclusion : le jeux a quelques défaut qui serrons corrigé dans le second opus .

author: {'steamid': '76561198325029207', 'num_games_owned': 123, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1720, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1720, 'last_played': 1600001830}
review:
[h1] Orch Must  Die Или же - Как я пропустил одного орка в портал?! [/h1]

     Довольно интересная игра, где ты защищаешь порталы от орков и ставишь ловушки. Здесь довольно приятно, то что здесь работаешь головой и улучшаешь реакцию, иза каких-то ситуации, где всё не идёт по плану. С каждым прохождением уровня, уровни становятся всё сложнее и сложнее. Но и также открываются интересные ловушки и вооружения (Оружия, магия, и артефакты). Сюжет здесь прост: Старик, который защищал порталы, умер. И его ученик становится на защиту порталов. Думайте это всё? Нет. С каждым прохождением уровня по дневного развивается сюжетная линия, и понемногу понимаешь, почему орки, которых мы убиваем их тысячами штурмуют замок для того, чтобы войти в портал и почему мы бесконечно защищаем их. Здесь также очень крутые саундтреки играют во время штурма, прям хочется взять арбалет и расстрелять этих наглых орков.

[b] Рекомендую? Да. [/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198054590239', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 864, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 426, 'last_played': 1625703900}
review: I was first introduced to the "Orcs Must Die!" Series on PS4 through their free game at the time "Orcs Must Die! Unchained," and I fell in love with it. I love most "Tower Defense" genres and this met more than most my expectations going in blind and almost 100% trophy unlock the game. So I then bought OMD1 and 2 on sale here on steam and its humorous, a fair challenge at times and is a great game to just burn, shock, or blast some Orcs beyond the senses they already lack. I'm playin through 1 and soon to start 2 before the release of 3. I did play a bit of 3 on the Stadia and its nice that it is multiplayer. Go get those Gibs!

review:
Echt Cooles Tower Defense Spiel.

Perfektes Spiel für nebenbei. 

Steuerung ist leicht zu verstehen.
Grafik sieht immer noch echt schick aus auch wenn das Spiel ca 10 Jahre alt ist.
Die Story ist klein aber fein.

Der Preis für das Spiel ist fair und das Spiel bietet viel Abwechslung von Waffen, Fallen, Level bis hin zu den Feinden.

Kann das Spiel nur weiter Empfehlen und einen Daumen nach ob da lassen.

Bitte achtet wann die Review geschrieben oder bearbeitet wurde !

author: {'steamid': '76561198093882345', 'num_games_owned': 2582, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 573, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 573, 'last_played': 1552591881}
review:
[h1] Миру конец... [/h1]

Вполне добротный tower defense, сюжет забавный, играть приятно, графика и анимации хорошие. Даже сейчас играется вполне неплохо и весело, несмотря на дату выхода. Как бы это странно не звучало, но сказать больше и нечего, игра действительно хорошая, но простая, поэтому и обзор такой же) Если вам игра приглянулась по скриншотам или если вы любите TW, то советую купить и ознакомится самим, скорее всего вы получите удовольствие от прохождения.

author: {'steamid': '76561198870002005', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 2831, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1374, 'last_played': 1654100161}
review:
In short: a very fun tower defense that can be played as a hack n slash instead, with a whopping 24 fortresses that get a really hard nightmare difficulty too. The one thing that makes this one distinct from the other titles though, is the weavers, who generally give you the option to make your traps ultra powerful, yourself powerful, or the power of making loads of money off of orcs killed by magic. However, the game is still suprisingly short, I completed my playthrough of both difficulties around the 17 hour mark, but either way the replayability is pretty insane.
So go ahead, grab your spells, warp in some archer, barricade most reasonable ways to the rift, and watch them shred everything to pieces, only for them to all die to a single gnoll.

review:
定価が下がった今ではコスパ良いおすすめのTD
良い部分としてはTDの中でもバランス調整が良く練り込まれて作られてる
悪い部分としてはコントローラーで言うところのレバガチャ
スペースキーとかFPS/TPS特有のWASD素早く連打するとちょこちょこゲームがクラッシュする
ナイトメアでもない限りそんなにガチガチに動く必要もないし後半はコイン余るので
ハードゲーマーとかガチ勢はあんまり効率的に考えず冗長性持たせたガバガバプレイの方が良いかもしれない

author: {'steamid': '76561198169410880', 'num_games_owned': 295, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 784, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 709, 'last_played': 1654581146}
review:
Este es un juego de matar, donde debes matar, no hay más.

Recuerdo haber jugado esta entrega pirata hace años y al enterarme recientemente de la salida del 3 me dieron ganas de re jugar el primero y el segundo.

Es un titulo interesante y simple, solo debes abatir las hordas de orcos que van a por ti para esto dispondras de armas y trampas, una premisa muy simple, pero funciona a la perfección.

La historia es bastante simple, y tampoco es tan largo, yo me lo pase en las dos dificultades en 8 horas más o menos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053442697', 'num_games_owned': 153, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 1716, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1716, 'last_played': 1624256734}
review:
Este es un juego de Tower Defense. Sos el aprendiz de un mago (medio torpe, pero la ultima esperanza para frenar la invasion de los orcos)
Son varios niveles, donde tenes que ir colocando trampas para detener a los orcos.
La idea es que no lleguen a las fisuras, porque si llegas a cero, perdes el nivel.
Es un juego viejo, lo encontras de oferta muy seguido, y realmente en argentina no llega ni a un cuarto de dolar de valor.

Asi que mas alla de que no vas a jugar tanto (unas 30 horas para completar todos los logros) y que no tiene cooperativo (para eso recomiendo la segunda entrega del juego) el juego es entretenido y realmente por lo que vale...es imposible no recomendarlo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198322748351', 'num_games_owned': 132, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 1189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1072, 'last_played': 1623945610}
review: This game is truly wonderful. I encountered this game when i was at least 10 years old at a disc store. Wasn't interested because doesn't seem to look fun in the covers. Now when i see it again with a fair discounted price, I bought it and regret that I did not buy the game with it's intentional cost. Amazing graphics for an old game, even there were so many mobs to clear. My game never lagged even if my computers seems to be a broken toaster. I like there are some comedy inside the storyline and it just works. Planning to play the 2nd game after I finished every levels. The only complain that i would say is that I dont like that i can't change the trap options during a break in the game but it would've been too easy if I could. So overal this game have given me a full satisfication. A 10/10 game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100336902', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 376, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 191, 'last_played': 1624066263}
review:
More than your average tower defense game, Orcs Must Die! allows you to jump directly into the fray. The gameplay is hectic, and fun. Even when I make a tactical error, it's fun to watch my not-so-well-laid-plan crumble as slathering orcs overwhelm me. Eight levels in, the game gradually gets more complex but feels manageable and forgiving. Completing a level, by defending the level's rift - the orc's ultimate goal, unlocks new traps and earns you Skulls which you can use to upgrade said traps. And you can revisit previous levels with your new and upgraded traps as many times as you'd like to earn the skulls you might have missed the first time around, or to simply try out different strategies. Each level ends up feeling like a sandbox waiting to be crafted into the ultimate orc-killing deathtrap.

The presentation is solid, landing on humorous, without being over the top. The graphics are charming and colorful. But you won't be writing and fan fiction about the main character. This game is pure fun and experimentation. The story, if you can call it that, exists merely to provide a basic framework as to why you're defending this rifts from orcs in the first place.

Pick this one up if you need a light-hearted change of pace between more serious games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048977206', 'num_games_owned': 218, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1131, 'last_played': 1623255701}
review:
Unlike normal Tower Defense games, Orcs Must Die allows you to freely control the game flow and engage the enemy in third person. If you get this game expecting to idle all the time, this is not the game for you. Sooner or later enemies becoming increasingly difficult to hold off with your traps, so you'll have to properly aim and fire your weapon/spell and get headshots.
Although this game was made in 2011, the core gameplay has aged well and I believe newcomers will like this game.

PROS
+ Simple story line, just straight to gameplay
+ Tactical game with numerous ways to tackle hordes of enemies
+ Engaging gameplay where you have to constantly move/shoot/cast/place traps
+ Varied death animations depending on which trap was triggered

CONS
+ You don't really know what a trap can do until you actually try using it and seeing the effects for yourself
+ Trap placement is sometimes weird - cannot place a trap in certain places even when it looks like you can
+ Enemy AI is weird - sometimes even if you block off a route the enemy would just break through it, even though there's a clear alternative path it can take
+ Enemy diversity is a bit limited, such as FROST OGRE, FIRE OGRE, ARMORED OGRE

Nightmare mode is extremely punishing - the difficulty spike is insane compared to war mage. You only get 3 seconds of free time per wave with tankier and stronger enemies. I had lots of frustrations going through the levels so if that's not your cup of tea, just ignore them and play whatever you want to your hearts content!

Keep in mind this is an Indie game made in 2011. Its not a perfect game but the overall enjoyment outshadows the problems. Solid game overall.

review: This is a great game!! I've had a lot of fun trying out new combinations, and some of the maps are actually kind of tough, and require some thought on how best to approach them.  The only complaint I have really is that the timber requirement to get the 5th skull is dumb.  A way I would change it is to first have a timer counter on the screen so you can track how much time has passed in the match, and have the timer pause during the breaks.  But all in all, really fun and is worth a buy.  I bought my copy on a third party website (Eneba) and got my Steam key for much cheaper than if you would buy it on Steam website.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065541078', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 639, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 639, 'last_played': 1620948321}
review:
Orcs Must Die! is a fun and enjoyable experience, it is an excellent tower defense game with a slay them yourself mentality. The Constant Killing and slaying of a variety of orcs started out simple and straightforward to soon being out of hand to which you wish you had a buddy to watch your back. Well its just your luck as there is a second Orcs Must Die! 2 and its just that. Co-op with your buddy and play through numerous levels and challenges and enjoy killing millions of orcs with either creative traps and or just your bare fists.

My favorite trap sets have been scenarios where you can kill all orcs by throwing them into the acid in the level or lava to which they die instantly, For the other levels I really enjoyed the wall traps and decoy to lead them to instant pain. The first one was a thrill to play, but if it were up to me, just play the second one as its so much better and you can bring a pal to join in on the action.

9/10 Experience and enjoyment for sure worth the purchase if you have no friends or just like killing orcs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011511137', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 859, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 859, 'last_played': 1620945375}
review:
This was a fun little tower defense type game. I enjoyed it - it was a welcome change from the larger and more complex games I typically play. Sometimes it's nice to just zone out and slash up some Orcs!

I did have one complaint about this game, though. There doesn't seem to be enough incentive to try out new builds. Especially when I was going for 5 Skulls on each level, I tended to stick with what had worked for me in the past, rather than experimenting with different traps and weavers. That's probably more on me, but it would have been nice to have had some sort of built-in reason to try out different traps.

Overall, I enjoyed Orcs Must Die! I think it was certainly worth the sale price that I got it for, and if you're looking for a fun way to kill a few hours, I think it's worth checking out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198208132699', 'num_games_owned': 160, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 1441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1441, 'last_played': 1588538767}
review:
[h1]Вижити у битві з орками - це не просто поборотися з ворогами, це боротьба за власне існування.[/h1]

🎮 Найкращий тавердифенс який я грав, в ньому є все що потрібно для хорошої ігри, ОРКИ і  багато способів для їхнього знищення, рекомендую всім хто хоче спробувати подібний жанр, музика підходяща і добре  пізходить до орочого ген()циду. 

🔪10 із 10 нарізаних орка. 

⚔️Буде розпродаж можете купувати, пару-трійку вечорів зможете приємно провести час ріжучи орків на дрібнесенькі клаптики.

🏆ORCS MUST DIE - це моя 5-та гра, яку я завершив на 100% досягнень.

🟡🔵[i] Наша зброя в цей момент вподобайка і комент! [/i]🔵🟡

author: {'steamid': '76561198275143839', 'num_games_owned': 178, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 1983, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1262, 'last_played': 1619026243}
review:
Style: Strategy Game
House Party Game: No
Completable Solo: Yes
Completable Multiplayer: N/A
Combat Involved: Yes
Combat Weaponry: CQC, Magic, Traps
Combat Type: Medevil
Difficulty Rating: 5
Difficulty Scale: (0 = Infant, 10 = No life, no friends, no job and no soul)

Deep Dive:
The game can be beaten on "apprentice" difficultly from beginning to end with minimum effort.
In terms of achievements however, this is where the game gets...tricky. Certain levels are designed to stress you and some deliberately put you in a lose - lose situation unless you can thread the needle.

In addition there are bugs with how the enemy's move and certain drops can fall through the floor, especially on stairs, which may not seem like a big deal but it can ruin a run if you need a health potion in a pinch or a coin purse for a crucial trap.

Negative Rating:
This game leaves a lot to be desired in terms of mechanics/combat, you have a variety of weapons and traps but the cost/damage balancing draws you back to only using the cheapest items in order to maximise efficiency and control the levels better. 

In my opinion this makes around 50% of the weapons/traps redundant and as such it failed to meet my expectations, especially as a single player game. I can appreciate it, but I wouldn't recommend it to anyone.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11093, 'playtime_forever': 216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1672746779}
review:
This is a hybrid tower (trap) defense/third person shooter/brawler where you fight off waves of orcs running along a dungeon path.

The game is very well made, although light on config settings.  The game could use a respec option, but overall it's fairly fun.  The asking price is a little steep but you can get the game very cheaply on sale or in bundles so it's worth grabbing when the opportunity arises.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016343991', 'num_games_owned': 326, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 4492, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4492, 'last_played': 1616234492}
review:
Pros:
It's pretty forward thinking of Robot Entertainment to let people launch the Orcs Must Die 2 level DLC as a standalone game, that's convenient for anyone who accidentally bought the DLC without the game and doesn't have the money to buy the full game right away when they realize their mistake.

Cons:
I mean I guess it's to be expected considering this was designed as DLC for another full game, but when you run it by itself this DLC has a lot of balance and coding issues. Like the enemy pathing wigs out all the time and most of the weapons and traps are pretty broken without other weapons and traps from the full game to balance them out. You really should just play this through Orcs Must Die 2 instead and save yourself the trouble.

author: {'steamid': '76561198033356283', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 13789, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13789, 'last_played': 1579231374}
review:
Orcs Must Die! is a 3rd person shooter + tower defense with a fantasy setting and cheesy humor.

This is one of my favorite games. The actual content of the game with DLC is probably 30 hrs or less. But I have 230 hrs at the time of this review because I have replayed it several times over the years and also played for high scores at some point, both of which are not usual for me. That is how fun I found it.

You start with some basic traps to slow down or eliminate the attacking horde. New levels unlock new traps, weapons, and bonuses. As you defeat levels you are rewarded with skulls. You can use those to purchase upgrades for your traps.

You might think to try to use only traps or only your player weapons to defeat levels. But most maps are balanced where you must use both at least initially. Often by the last few rounds I can have traps taking care of nearly everybody.

There are some physics traps like pushers and spring loaded floor panels. Aside from the obvious things like throwing orcs into lava/acid, I have seen videos where there are more orcs flying through the air than on the ground.

The DLCs are worth it for the price. Artifacts of Power is marginal but cheap. I only use the Floor Scorcher from that but I use it a lot. Some of the other ones can be useful depending on your playstyle. Lost Adventures has extra maps and enemies and more skulls for trap upgrades.

FWIW, Orcs Must Die 2 is also great and adds co-op, but I like this first one slightly more.

This game is so much fun and I really wish more people knew how awesome it is.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996891752', 'num_games_owned': 678, 'num_reviews': 293, 'playtime_forever': 479, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1614200606}
review:
A cool but flawed spin on the "Tower Defence" game genre.

The good:
* Some levels have unique one time use traps

The bad:
* The sensitivity in this game doesn't go low enough (or rather the slider doesn't feel like it is doing much at the low end) so aiming the crossbow was quite annoying
* No way to rebind controls
* The air enemy paths are badly designed. In certain spots on certain levels the only anti-air trap you have will simply not reach the enemies making the trap useless. Worst offender is the Balcony level which has many air enemies and they only fly high enough to be hit by the ceiling trap at the very end of the level. Placing ceiling traps is also very awkward and pretty much impossible if your camera gets stuck in a floor trap.
* There's no way to see what enemies will come in the next wave even during an intermission, or which door they will go through first at level start.
* No windowed mode.
* Some animations like level end and the controls screen are too long.

The meh:
* Quite limited upgrade paths. Each tower has only 1 pre defined upgrade.
* Level design limits creativity in trap placements. One could argue that's to force players to to use specific/different strategies each level, but ehh?
* No weapon upgrades

author: {'steamid': '76561198005594049', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 188, 'playtime_forever': 3053, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2954, 'last_played': 1613214475}
review:
Несмотря на некоторые на мой взгляд недостатки я не могу не порекомендовать эту игру, но лучше всё же брать по скидке дабы не сильно разочаровываться.

Как и многие люди этой планеты не успевшие поиграть в первую часть Orcs Must Die! Я решил преобрести это творение 2 раза пройдя с друзьями Orcs Must Die 2. Поэтому тем кто играл во вторую часть только с друзьями и решил внезапно пройти первую часть могу сказать что скорее всего на старте игра вам наскучит. Во первых она не такая весёлая как вторая часть (в основном наверное из-за того что вместе веселее), а во вторых есть еще ряд недостатков о которых ниже и поподробнее, а так как плюсы я лично не вижу смысла перечислять давайте поговорим только о минусах.

1 - Не основной минус и на первый взгляд незаметный, но к концу игры вы начнете понимать, что мелодия всего одна и она прямо таки начинают ближе к последней главе оседать в вашей голове.
2 - Что меня больше всего разочаровало это откровенная халтура в DLC. 
*Первая миссия настолько простая, что кажется будто мы только начали игру.
*Вторая миссия - перевернутая башня - тупая и непродуманная халтура, таже башня из основной игры, только орки бегут не снизу а сверху (ну что, чувствуете как разработчик старался продумать уровень с нуля?), есть еще одно отличие от обычной башни - это ледяные летуны которые откровенно бесят, потому что их может убить только толпа лучников стоящих у дверей, а с*раные баллисты почему то их игрнорят и стреляют по оркам, которые бегают дальше, если лучников не брать, то либо следите за летунами сами (кстати они сливаются с фоном, легко проглядеть), либо они залетят в ворота без проблем. На мой взгляд тупейшая миссия.
*Яма - последняя миссия. На боевом маге банально легкая, а на кошмаре неоправданно сложная и непродуманная, мало денег и фактически на старте уже Ледяной Огр, гноллы-охотники и 2е тучи летунов разного типа (огонь, лёд). То-есть вам по любому нужно либо летунов вручную мочить либо всех остальных, а на летунов баллисты или лучники.
3 - Очень плохой недостаток это разнообразие ловушек и их цена. Некоторые ловушки вы будете брать почти во всех миссиях, а некоторые не будете брать никогда. Те которые вы никогда не возьмёте еще больше отталкивают своей ценой, например колодец маны за 1500 золотых который раз в определенное время когда сойдутся звёзды даст вам ману один раз и снова ждать когда звёзды сойдуться. Или просто тупая ерунда это бочка за 2 сотни золотых, она еще и одноразовая. Паладинов по 1200 потом по 1000 после прокачки я вообще раза 3 за всю игру брал и то они пригодились только в одной миссии тупо для подстраховки, впрочем как и вонючая одноразовая приманка, кстати если глянете ютуб, её все используют чтоб орков на какой нибудь ловушке задерживать, а не по назначению, хотя по назначению она тоже может сработать. Еще есть потолочная мухобойка, которая занимает одну клетку и наносит мало урона а 3 штуки в ряд стоят дороже потолочной булавы, которая куда эффективнее!
4 - Я был разочарован когда увидел некоторые миссии которые я проходил во второй части или похожие на них, та же перевёрнутая башня.
5 - Враги из DLC есть только в DLC, а это всего 5 миссий, причем колдуны были только в двух миссиях всего.
6 - Хранительницы - тоже недостаток, в основном я брал среднюю на ловушки, она полезнее и дешевле чем две другие которые менее полезны и более дорогие. Сами сравните:
500 золотых за получениие большего колич. денег убийством ловушек или 800 за увеличение урона в голову арбалетом на 25% или 1200 за меньшее потребление маны, которое даст вам на один выстрел кольцом больше который ничего не даст?
1500 за перезарядку ловушек более быструю или 1200 за увеличение денег убийством магией либо 5% к мане за убийство ловушкой или 1800 за усиление 2х каких нибудь колец
На мой взгляд - очевидно что ловушки и цена это наше всё.
7 - количество денег на старте и на протяжении игры в принципе не даёт нам особого выбора в ловушках и хранительницах. А еще миссии короткие где-то по 12-13 волн - я успевал разыграться к 10й волне уже планы построил как дальше ловушки строить и бац - миссия пройдена!
8 - Главный минус - в эту игру почему то скучно играть одному, незнаю почему, она давольно унылая, да и за волшебницу во второй части мне было как то интереснее играть.

В общем сами смотрите в игре если не ошибаюсь 24 миссии и 5 DLC миссий, на ачивку нужно проходить игру на боевом маге и на кошмаре, на покупку всех улучшений нужно пройти обе сложности на 5 черепов, а это значит уложиться во время и не потерять ни одного портального очка - гемор еще тот судя по статистике и личному опыту.

review: Orcs Must Die! is an action packed tower defense game. You have a variety of weapons, spells and traps to murder orcs, ogres and more. The maps reach from easy as hell to extremly hard. The orcs are talking stupid shit while dying brutally which gives the game even more charm. I really recommend this game if you like the genre. The only "bad-ish" thing is the Nightmare mode. If you dont use the same traps on every level you wont make it. Which is kinda meh. BUT nevertheless did I had a blast playing this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198375892314', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 7963, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7840, 'last_played': 1653088839}
review: WHat I love most about this game besides the carnage and the absolutely hilarious one liners the orcs say is that it can be easy as well as still be challenging. but the best thing for me is that it does not set of my explosive temper when I am unable to win a level. I cant tell you how many controllers I have destroyed over the years out of extreme frustration with some of the games I have played. I love the various traps and all the different ways you can kill the enemy coming at you. I love the fact that the big bad Villain is a woman, its so nice to see this. but most of all I love the good guy is not quite smart enough to tie his own shoe laces and yet he is full of charisma and quite a good dancer with Phenomenal flexibility.  all up I would highly recommend this game to anyone looking at wasting a few hours of their life and having a good laugh at the expense of a few hundred orcs.

author: {'steamid': '76561197976885557', 'num_games_owned': 719, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 1366, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1363, 'last_played': 1610700176}
review:
What it is: Tower Defense/3rd person shooter

I liked the game. The first couple acts were relatively easy, but the difficulty ramps up for the third. The final stage is a bit brutal and the only one I had to repeat multiple times to beat. The orcs have a little personality and the story is mediocre, but that's not the point of the game. The game is all about setting up kill rooms and committing genocide against the orcs hordes. 

I will mention that the in game engine has some bugs in it. The physics spells/traps sometimes don't behave the way they should. Also, pits (acid/lava) sometimes don't kill enemies because they'll be on some glitched part of the wall that allows them to live. I've also see the enemies actually get SPRUNG OUT of a pit. I have no idea why that happens, but it has multiple times. Also, the game crashed the moment I beat the last stage. So, I have no idea how the story ends. Meh

Aside from the bugs, it's an enjoyable little romp.

author: {'steamid': '76561199014996901', 'num_games_owned': 144, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1763, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 648, 'last_played': 1644236865}
review: Отличная игра в жанре «‎Tower Defense» в которой есть много юмора и довольно несложные уровни для прохождения, хотя ближе к концу игры Вам придется немного «‎попотеть». Ребята из Robot Entertainment - сделали довольно неплохую игру с разнообразными «‎защитными ловушками» - которые отлично справляются с ордами орков! Движок «Havok Vision Engine» - смотрится довольно неплохо и в 2021 году, игра довольно не требовательная и пойдет на большинство компьютеров и ноутбуков.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062398170', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1051, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1051, 'last_played': 1374292387}
review:
Orcs Must Die! é aquele jogo que te surpreende pela qualidade na simplicidade. O jogo funciona com sistema de hordas, onde devemos nos preparar com armadilhas e estratégias, para derrotar determinadas quantidades de inimigos (Orcs). Em cada fase, você deve se preparar para novos desafios, com novas dificuldades e novos poderes para facilitar sua vida. O jogo possui excelente dublagem em português, o que deixa a narrativa mais interessante. 
Foi o meu primeiro jogo da Steam e me diverti muito com game.

Recomendado com sucesso!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198047246041', 'num_games_owned': 105, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1094, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1094, 'last_played': 1609868992}
review:
Данная игра Orcs Must Die! является Tower Defense с простым, веселым сюжетом где мы являемся глупым учеником магом, который сражается с орками. Цель игры проста - не дать оркам зайти в портал.
Графика не режет глаз, картинка приятная. 
Большой набор ловушек, что влияет на вариативную стратегию игры. Некоторые ловушки и кольца раскрываются только на тяжелом уровне т.к. средний, и простой уровень проходиться спокойно с паладинами и лучниками. 
Есть улучшение ловушек. Некоторые улучшения уменьшают стоимость ловушки, а некоторые продлевают эффект действия ловушки.
Если на простом и среднем уровне мы сами выбираем когда запускать следующий раунд, то самый сок начинается на сложном уровне т.к. подумать дается 3 секунды и сразу на нас идут монстры.
Подводя итоги: игра стоит своих денег и времени затраченную на нее.
Оценка:9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197960812673', 'num_games_owned': 814, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 2543, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2539, 'last_played': 1635561280}
review:
I played this game for the first time a year or two ago after knowing it by name and owning it for years, but never giving it a shot -- that was a big mistake. This was my first experience in a first-person tower defense game and I loved every second of it. It does a great job balancing the shooter mechanics with the tower defense ones, and the campaign missions are great. The campaign also does a good job in the typical tower defense format of presenting one new enemy and counter trap/spell per mission. As someone who is decent at FPS games but prefers the tower defense components I heavily enjoyed this game and didn't feel like I had to be good at shooters to do well, although it did come in handy.

The aesthetic is wonderful too, and even though I played it 7-8 years post release it didn't feel dated one bit, and actually felt superior to some more recent games I've played.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961566470', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 1390, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1390, 'last_played': 1571074832}
review:
Forgetting to upvote this awesome game (and its sequel) was a major oversight on my part.

Pros:
- I loved the mixed puzzle/action gameplay: first planning out your strategy, and then running around helping your traps to kill as many orcs as possible.
- Good music, albeit repetitive.
- Max's anachronistic voice acting is hilarious

Cons:
- FOV is too low (but there are workarounds)
- The graphics are OK, nothing special
- Wooden barriers are comically short. They look like they shouldn't be able to stop the orcs, but they work anyway.

Note: OMD1 maps are included in OMD2, but the OMD1 cutscenes/storyline/dialogue are only available in OMD1 itself. Also, the AI is tweaked in OMD2 so your experience may be a bit different between the two games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198977721460', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1091, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1091, 'last_played': 1584532266}
review:
Em 1789 ocorreu a revolução francesa, foi uma das revoluções burguesa e se levado em consideração que trouxe efeitos globais, podemos dizer que é uma das revoluções mais importantes,não à toa é o marco da virada da era moderna pra contemporânea,análogo a tal revolução temos esse jogo maravilhosamente divertido com mecânicas que podem revolucionar os tower defense, tem uma grande variedade de armas e inimigos e andar em terceira pessoa ao invés de ser uma mapa fixo no chão como outros do 
gênero deixa o negocio mais dinâmico. 
ok...talvez eu tenha exagerado  no revolucionário. no entanto é um jogo legal  e fácil de se distrair bolando estrategias, vale a pena.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998543056', 'num_games_owned': 2316, 'num_reviews': 616, 'playtime_forever': 18118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18118, 'last_played': 1667812153}
review:
[b] > Be me 🧙‍♂️
> Hear about this game called Orcs Must Die! 🧟‍♂️🚫
> Think it's just another fantasy tower defense game 🏰🤔
> Decide to give it a shot anyway, because orcs gotta die, right? 💀💥
> Boot it up and see the tutorial 📚🤓
> "Click here to place traps" 💡
> Place a trap 🧟‍♂️🔨
> "Click here to shoot orcs" 🏹
> Shoot an orc 🎯🧟‍♂️
> Orc goes flying like a ragdoll 🚀😂
> MFW I realize this game is all about orc-splatting physics 🤣🤣
> Keep playing, setting traps, and shooting orcs 🤖🎮
> Orcs charging at me like they're late for a pizza delivery 🍕🏃‍♂️🧟‍♂️
> Me placing more traps like I'm setting up a surprise party 🎉🎈🤣
> The orc pinball machine is in full swing 🎯🎳
> Orcs explode into giblets like confetti at a New Year's Eve party 🎉💥🎆
> MFW I'm cackling like a mad wizard 🔮😂
> Keep playing, unlocking new traps and weapons 🧙‍♂️🛠️🗡️
> Discover the joy of launching orcs into lava pits with spring traps 🌋🔥🧟‍♂️
> Me when the traps are doing all the work, and I'm just watching the chaos unfold 🍿🤩
> Orcs dropping loot like they're at an impromptu dance-off 💃🕺💰
> Me collecting all the shiny coins like a greedy dragon 🐉💰💰
> Finish the level with a huge grin on my face 😁🏆
> MFW Orcs Must Die! becomes my new favorite orc-splatting addiction 🤣👾🧟‍♂️🚫
> 10/10, would make orcs meet their hilarious demise again! 💯🎮🤣 [/b]


[INT. AN ORC-INFESTED CASTLE - The War Mage, surrounded by traps and chaos, takes a moment to address the audience.]

WAR MAGE: (with a smirk) Well, well, well, look who's come to talk about a little game called Orcs Must Die. I'm the War Mage, the guy who spends his days defending fortresses from hordes of the green, ugly, and not-so-smart fellas. But hey, it's a living!

[The camera pans to a line of spring traps flinging orcs into the distance.]

WAR MAGE: (laughs) You know, in this game, Orcs Must Fly! These spring traps? They're like the catapults of the orc-launching world. You haven't lived until you've seen an orc do a graceful, albeit involuntary, swan dive into the abyss.

[Cut to the War Mage placing barricades to funnel the orcs into a kill zone.]

WAR MAGE: (strategically) You see, it's all about strategy. You set up traps, you block their path, and you watch the chaos unfold. It's like planning a surprise party, but the surprise is a horde of orcs crashing the party!

[The camera reveals the Weavers, magical beings who enhance the War Mage's abilities.]

WAR MAGE: (enthusiastic) And oh, the lovely Weavers! They're like my personal cheering squad. With their help, I can be even more deadly – faster reloads, stronger traps, and all that good stuff. It's like having a whole team of magical coaches.

[The War Mage unleashes a powerful spell that obliterates a wave of orcs.]

WAR MAGE: (with a grin) But let's not forget my favorite part – the sweet satisfaction of obliterating orcs! It's like a stress relief session, but with more explosions and fewer angry letters from the neighborhood watch.

[The camera pans out to show a fortress filled with traps and orcs meeting their hilarious demise.]

WAR MAGE: (concluding) So, in Orcs Must Die, you'll laugh, you'll strategize, and you'll definitely make some orcs fly. It's a wild, trap-filled adventure that'll keep you entertained for hours. So grab your crossbow, set those spring traps, and let's get rid of some green, not-so-friendly faces!

[The War Mage winks at the camera before turning back to the chaos of the battlefield.]

author: {'steamid': '76561197988357925', 'num_games_owned': 258, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1588523703}
review:
İşini güzel yapan, o kadar basit bir şekilde bölümleri geçilmeyen güzel bir oyun.
Kısıtlı kaynak ve zamanla orkların geçtiği güzergaha tuzakları yerleştiriyorsunuz, ve onlar geçerken ateş de edebiliyorsunuz, dalga dalga gelen orkları durdurunca diğer bölüme geçiyorsunuz.
3D-FPS-Tower Defence olarak mı adlandırılı bilemedim ama bu türü seviyorsanız asla kaçırmayın ama bu türe yabancı iseniz ve denemek isterseniz ilk olarak bununla başlamak çok mantıklı olur.
Her türlü tavsiye edilir.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017279986', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 952, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 924, 'last_played': 1669490624}

author: {'steamid': '76561198169216054', 'num_games_owned': 1204, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 785, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 633, 'last_played': 1678012149}
review:
Um jogo do gênero tower defense bem divertido, prendeu minha atenção por várias horas e quase zerei o mesmo no mesmo dia. Ainda não possuo 100% por conta das dlcs e do tempo na vida que me anda faltando, mas ainda pretendo me divertir bastante novamente com este game.

. Jogabilidade: 8/10 (joguei com mouse e teclado, mas não faço ideia de como seria com controle analógico.)
. História: 8/10 (simples e engraçada, porém cumpre bem seu papel de entreter.)
. Dificuldade: 9/10* (varia bastante, zerei o jogo apenas no modo normal e por volta das 5 últimas fases passei bastante dificuldade, principalmente na última.)
. Gráficos: 8/10 ( Um visual cartoon para combinar com as falas engraçadas do protagonista, cumpre bem seu papel)

Nota: 8/10

review:
So This game is a lot of fun, I feel like you need to get use to it and pick up your own style of play.

Some Levels are made for a certain trap to be used, but you can totally bypass that to use other things. Don't stress about getting 5 skulls every level to start, just focus on beating the levels, you can go back later.

author: {'steamid': '76561198154004822', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 311, 'playtime_forever': 1559, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1309, 'last_played': 1603749513}
review:
Super Spiel.

Pro:
- Viele unterschiedliche Level
- Drei Schwierigkeitsgrade
- Viele unterschiedliche Fallen
- Story hält sich in Grenzen, ist aber lustig

Kontra:
- Gegner zittern ab und zu vorwärts, was das eigene Zielen schwer macht
- Man hat sehr schnell seine Favoriten und dagegen sind viele andere Fallen sehr schwach

Für Erfolgsjäger: Viele sind gut machbar, allerdings teilweise auch ein wenig Zeitintensiv. Bei anderen braucht man ein wenig Glück. 

Ich kann dieses Spiel, obwohl es älter ist, nur empfehlen. Es macht Spaß immer neue Level zu verteidigen. Für jedes Level bekommt man eine neue Falle. Außerdem bis zu 5 Schädel, die man in stärkere Versionen der einzelnen Fallen investieren kann. Ca. 20 Stunden kann man sich hier bestimmt aufhalten, wenn man Spaß an Tower Defence Games hat.

review:
Скрипнет пружина, ловушка с грохотом выкинет в далёкие дали лавового горизонта очередного орка, одинокий паладин будет ждать к себе в гости зелёную нечисть, но этому не суждено сбыться так-как лучники заберут себе всю славу, а наш герой отчебучит нелепую шутку убив очередного огра.

Я был рад вернуться в эту фановую игру в 20 году.

author: {'steamid': '76561198368724267', 'num_games_owned': 75, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 3553, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1061, 'last_played': 1693088149}
review:
A fun tower defence game where you get to kill Orcs! You unlock new traps and depending on your rating you can upgrade traps to be even more devastating. I highly recommend to anyone who wants a little fun with this game, though be very careful with the upgrades at the later levels can be really daunting. 

Pros:
+excellent mix of tower defense mode and action
+combining traps and combat skills
+ level design
+ price

Objection:
- in each mission, you have to reassemble a set of traps and weapons

author: {'steamid': '76561198049309242', 'num_games_owned': 1084, 'num_reviews': 107, 'playtime_forever': 771, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 771, 'last_played': 1599924389}
review:
Orcs Must Die! - это с одной стороны обычный Tower Defense, но с другой там заложено очень даже много веселья. 

Всё начинается с того, что ваш учитель, и по совместительству, и защитник порталов в мир людей, умирает очень глупой и нелепой смертью. И теперь вы, самый бездарный и безнадежный ученик, должны защитить мир людей от зеленой угрозы. В самом начале, перед запуском волн, вам дают время грамотно подготовится к обороне , расставить ловушки (а их тут довольно внушительное количество) , и только лишь затем вперед, в бой! Убивать орков весело и интересно, и самое главное, это не надоедает. По мере прохождения вам будут бросать вызов более могучие враги, а также сюжет будет обрастать новыми подробностями. Да, тут он не замысловат, но "тонкие" остроты в адрес главной злодейки от нашего главного героя доставляют. Да и вообще, игра построена на море чёрного юмора, который заставляет улыбнуться. 

Рекомендую всем тем, кто любит забавные шутки, море крови, ловушки и всем тем, кто хочется очутиться в теле тупого и бесполезного героя, которому суждено всех спасти...

author: {'steamid': '76561198127150166', 'num_games_owned': 129, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1082, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 878, 'last_played': 1690057257}
review:
Eu conheci esse jogo pelo 2 que eu cheguei a jogar o piratão pouco tempo depois que saiu. Depois joguei o Unchained que é um bom jogo mas sempre bugava algumas coisas no meu pc. Resolvi jogar a série do começo já que saiu o 3 também. É bem divertido, mas tem momentos que ce fica puto quando passa aquele único Orc que ferra com seu score. O outro nível de dificuldade é muito difícil eu nem tentei depois do primeiro.
Vou comprar o 2 e jogar por motivos de nostalgia, provavelmente ele tem uma replayabilidade melhor do que esse aqui.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011405333', 'num_games_owned': 507, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2889, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2780, 'last_played': 1604179613}
review: Fantastic hybrid tower defense action single player game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025478065', 'num_games_owned': 737, 'num_reviews': 354, 'playtime_forever': 1905, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1905, 'last_played': 1596208377}
review:
Je n'aime guère les tower defense, mais Orcs Must Die! est une exception.
C'est un jeu très sympathique où il faut poser des pièges pour stopper des hordes d'orcs. Mais on est plus qu'encouragé à participer au combat avec différents sorts et anneaux magiques mis à disposition.
Il y a une bonne variété de pièges et de sorts et les niveaux sont souvent assez différents pour que ne puisse pas utiliser toujours la même stratégie. Cependant, tous les pièges ne sont pas égaux et j'avais tendance à un peu toujours utiliser les mêmes.

La plupart du temps les orcs (et autres variétés de monstres dont des volants) viennent de deux ou plusieurs directions à la fois, ce qui implique qu'il faille gérer en temps réel les flots d'ennemis.

review: Absolutely broken mess of a game. Glitches on install and the first prompt does not work leaving you stuck at opening the spellbook for the first time. I was not able to get past this glitch and could not play the game in any way. I gave them my money and they gave me an unplayable game. So i got a refund and this game goes on the trash heap of broken games. It looked like it could be fun, would have been nice to play it after paying for it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198392798165', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1482, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 627, 'last_played': 1678703598}
review: Played this game once again after a kind friend of mine gifted me on Steam. And it was a nostalgia trip that I really loved having. Orcs Must Die is a game that you can always get creative on and try different ways of your tower defense strategies. There is not a perfect way of playing this game, the traps and weapons on this game gives you an insane flexibility, I genuinely can play this game any time I'm bored and have fun with it. And with it's good flexibility and nice humouristic traits and art within the game, I can happily tell that this game backs everything up it has with a good difficulty as well. First difficulty type where you can only get 2 skulls is obviously easy and for learning basics mostly, but pushing your limits with harder difficulties and trying new methods for levels is actually possible. And I'd like to mention the maps out of Classic Mode where it's way too harder than usual. And game actually rewards your effort nicely by rewarding you with skulls that allows you to upgrade certain traps and weapons. Don't take the fact that it's a relatively old game lightly, it still packs a nice amount of punch and joy to play. The only bad thing about is that it's probably losing it's flavour with time since it becomes repetitive after pushing your limits over and over, but that's where the second game comes in! So, I genuinely advice you to buy and try this relatively cheap game, you won't be dissatisfied!

review:
"Slice them, burn them, skewer them, and launch them - no matter how you get it done, orcs must die in this fantasy action-strategy game from Robot Entertainment.

As a powerful War Mage with dozens of deadly weapons, spells, and traps at your fingertips, defend twenty-four fortresses from a rampaging mob of beastly enemies, including ogres, hellbats, and of course, a whole bunch of ugly orcs. Battle your enemies through a story-based campaign across multiple difficulty levels, including brutal Nightmare mode!"

author: {'steamid': '76561199041486494', 'num_games_owned': 1897, 'num_reviews': 239, 'playtime_forever': 696, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 239, 'last_played': 1633489924}
review: Thumbs Way Up. Great game.  I played through most of the campaign in about 6 hours. I only have one level left but I will definitely replay it all over again, I'm having that much fun with it. There isn't much of a story, which works for me, but if you really want your games to have a great story this isn't going to be for you. But the gameplay is addictive you will want to keep playing one more level all night long. It's definitely worth the price but if you can get it on sale then you have no reason to not play it. I can't wait to check out orcs must die 2.

author: {'steamid': '76561198359701042', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 1663, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1661, 'last_played': 1630609159}
review: Сюжет Orcs must die! прост, и по сути, является формальностью. Некий старый и могучий маг, уже много лет охраняет портал в страну людей, от полчища орков. Но как-то раз, он подскольнулся на вражеской крови, и расшиб себе голову на смерть... Печально? Нет! В игре много черного юмора и подобных шуточек. Так что продолжу. Теперь охранять порталы предстоит его молодому и озорному ученичку. Вот пожалуй и все.Игрок управляет учеником, а ныне полноценным защитником портала. В начале каждого уровня дается время на изучение карты. После чего на имеющиеся деньги необходимо купить и грамотно расставить ловушки для надвигающейся Орды, и постараться не пропустить их в портал.Ловушек в игре огромное количество. Признаться, я сам, их все еще не открыл. Тут есть различные механизмы выпускающие шипы, стрелы, различные молотилки и месилки, замедляющие и подбрасывающие ловушки и многое др. Можно еще и лучников с войнами расставлять. Кроме того и сам герой неплохо орудует арбалетом, пикой и различной магией.Вначале все просто, но каждый уровень становиться все сложнее. И приходиться хорошенько обдумывать свои действия. Но при этом и веселье игра тоже доставляет. Много юмора и различные варианты смерти зеленокожих, не заставят скучать!Красивая, качественная и весьма оригинальная игра, которая подойдет практически для всех.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008332774', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 467, 'playtime_forever': 454, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 454, 'last_played': 1599076803}
review:
Not a bad TPS Tower Defense game. Even in 2020, it still is quite fun to play and challenging. There are a lot of different traps to choose from, Every level you unlock a new toy to play and kill orcs with.

It lacks some QoL features, like showing from which gate the orcs will start to attack you. Some levels just takes to long to complete. Orc pathfinding is a little bit sketchy. Gets a bit repetitive after a while. So there is that.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151040776', 'num_games_owned': 191, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 2306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1854, 'last_played': 1601191349}
review:
作为一款塔防游戏，兽人必死是一款相当有趣和富有挑战性的游戏，很适合作为闲暇之余的消遣游戏，整体难度个人感觉不是很高，战斗法师和梦魇的区别是少了备战时间，所以对地图的认识还是比较重要的，建议dlc一块买入，多了五个关卡和三款陷阱装备，还是很值得的，作为一款11年的游戏，当年是在土豆网上视频通关的，并且好多游戏都是看视频“玩”的，现在玩起来也是别有感触。以上，接下来去玩2代了，据说2代有联机内容，成就完成估计是个大难题喽。

游戏汉化建议自行百度天邈汉化1.2版本

成就难度都不高，三个难度剧情五骷髅就解锁了绝大多数成就，一些比如酸液击杀100，火球300杀之类的慢慢刷就行，还有一些如吊灯20杀，炸弹30杀并不是要一次完成，只要在一局游戏内完成就可以，如用3个吊灯来20杀也可以完成成就，不用陷阱完成第2.3幕：是指在游戏过程中会有过场动画的那两关，不用陷阱即可。

review:
Прекраснейшая игра, яркая графика, отличный перевод и озвучка, достойный юмор. Динамика на высшем уровне, разнообразие ловушек позволяет такие вещи творить. Отличные карты, хороший сюжет.
Я вот даже негативного про игру сказать не могу!
Настоятельно рекомендую, игра для отдыха.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036581382', 'num_games_owned': 469, 'num_reviews': 138, 'playtime_forever': 1412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1412, 'last_played': 1596744390}
review:
How come those most goofy and friendly-looking games are usually the most frustrating and merciless to the player. Overall rather infuriating experience.
But for sure you can get it for its humor, beginning stories of characters (as it's a trilogy now) and armies of greens to kill nonetheless.
Just because I didn't like it doesn't mean you won't but again it's quite punishing past chapter 1

author: {'steamid': '76561198092043493', 'num_games_owned': 675, 'num_reviews': 329, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 215, 'last_played': 1596679439}
review:
É um jogo que eu recomendo se você gosta de tower defense com uma bagagem de carisma bem bacana. 
Não cheguei a zerar o jogo porque não sou muito chegado neste estilo de jogo, porém cheguei bem próximo do final, não zerando apenas porque já estava um tanto enjoado do estilo do game e também porque não havia coop ( tanto online quanto tela dividida). 
Em termos gráficos o game é bonito, bem desenhado e lembra bastante uma animação da pixar, onde temos algo bem ao estilo "cartoon"  que agrada até os gostos mais refinados. Temos bons efeitos dentro do possível, uma variedade bem legal de orcs, e quando digo isso não me refiro aos tipos de inimigos, mas nas aparências dos orcs base do game, que mesmo sendo inimigo mais básico do game possui diferentes aparências, dando uma sensação real que estamos lutando contra uma horda e não apenas um monte de "inimigos reciclados". 
A jogabilidade é boa, sendo muito intuitiva e simples de se aprender. Os controles não são complexos, pois o real desafio está na escolha e local que você vai colocar as armadilhas ( algo normal para tower defense). Se você montar armadilhas em lugares ruins e não estudar o ambiente vai se dar mal! isso aqui não é um hack and slash, mas um jogo que onde você precisa usar um mínimo do seu cérebro, caso contrário não vai conseguir passar nem do primeiro ato! 
Quanto a história e carisma do game eu devo admitir: não esperava algo tão bacana, e mesmo não sendo uma história ótima, ainda sim é "legal" dentro do estilo que o jogo oferece. O que mais segura nossa atenção é o protagonista, que sempre faz piadas aleatórias a todo o momento, e nada tão forçado, pois são piadinhas engraçadas até. Óbvio que não podemos comparar a história com um RPG da vida né??? 
O meu único ponto negativo vai para o inexistente multiplayer do jogo. A temática de orcs must die poderia, FACILMENTE, ter um coop online, porque convenhamos: Não é muito bom jogar um game deste estilo sozinho, mesmo se você gostar. 
Enfim, orcs must die é um game bacaninha, leve e barato. Que mesmo sendo curto e não tão profundo ainda sim vai te arrancar um sorriso do rosto. Eu recomendo bastante para quem é mais "forever alone" e curte um tower defense.

review: Skvělá odpočinková akce u které zapojíte i mozek. Zastavujete hordy orků zajímavými pastmi, nástrahami a magickou kuší. Získat ve všech úrovních plný počet bodů není snadné, občas to dokáže i vytáčet. Ale je zábava když už jen čekáte až hordy naběhnou do systému vašich pastí a nikdo neprojde. Opravdu doporučuji. Za mě 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198083402293', 'num_games_owned': 315, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2650, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2518, 'last_played': 1628238544}
review:
Really really fun game in the Tower defense style of game.
Fun and addictive, just a perfect game for short gaming  sessions. Pity they didn't implement any multiplayer mode unlike OMD2.  Later stages get quite difficult. Must buy for any action game lover anyway!

author: {'steamid': '76561198078654394', 'num_games_owned': 210, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 2949, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 477, 'last_played': 1703451746}
review:
Having finally gotten every achievement in the game, i can list some stuff about the game, and some cool stuff about it

[h1] Cool stuff [/h1]
The game is simple and has 3 difficulty levels depending on how easy/hard you find it

Its not super pricy for how much content it gives (29 levels)

Diversity in what kind of defences you want (alot of traps and weapons)

If you own this game and buy the second, you gain even more levels as extra content

[h1] Your 3 best friends when you play [/h1]
Steel Weaver, using this weaver will allow you to buff up your guardians and traps to insane levels, and gain even more money from them.

Paladin Guardian, This guy can take alot of punishment for a relatively low cost, and with Steel Weaver, you can get regeneration and stun added.

Swinging Mace, If your enemy isnt an ogre, chances are this thing will 1shot it with ease, pair it with some tar and basically nothing stands a chance.

[h1] Overall i would highly recommend this game, or at the very least the second one since it improves on EVERYTHING [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198074322295', 'num_games_owned': 432, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 786, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 786, 'last_played': 1595960209}
review:
Всем доброго времени суток, думаю не надо много времени тратить на объяснения  что игра для своего времени достаточно популярная. Нестандартный Tower Defender, чем и зацепил меня, и как мне кажется, многих игроков. Сюжет есть, но поверхностный, хотя казалось бы, зачем глубокий в данном жанре игры, но его наличие уже хорошо (+ в копилку).
Графика для игры 2011 года хороша, хоть и "мультяшная", но некоторым она не по вкусу, но буду судить по себе, это явно не минус, что она "мультяшная", но графика явно хороша (+ в копилку).
Ловушек хоть и много, но есть как юзабельные, так и бесполезные которые даже не использовал за всю игру, DLC так же в счет.
14 различных противников (без DLC 12) **если посчитал неправильно дайте знать**. Я бы сказал что их даже много, чем мало. Думаю критики не будет если дам еще (+в копилку).
Так же присутствует статистика, где можно посоревноваться с другими игроками, что вносит азарт в игру, но это не каждому интересно. (+?)
Всё плюсы, плюсы, но да, я нашел минус. 
Не скажу точное название карты где я нашел БАГ. Помню лишь что на этой локации открывается "кольцо молнии" (Вроде так). И что же случилось. На последней волне, когда все прошло хорошо, маленький летающий нетопырь застрял за порталом, где его убить нереально, благо взял новое кольцо и на ПКМ с 4го раза убил его. (- в копилку).

Хочу подвести итог 3(4?) плюса и 1 минус.
Многое я про игру тут не описал, но а зачем? Лучше посмотри сам, ведь игра годная. И цена не большая.
От себя оценку поставлю такую: 87/100.

Спасибо что уделил своё внимание.

author: {'steamid': '76561198137284043', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 757, 'playtime_forever': 408, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 408, 'last_played': 1595853552}
review:
It's a pretty good Tower Defense game, but more the kind of game where your constructions don't do all the work, you have to kill alot of enemies yourself. This one has a lot of maps where you can easily force enemies to move a single direction and kill them all easily from there, but some maps where the enemies come from multiple directions. Overall this one is the better singleplayer experience, since the levels are designed for one player.

Time to finish: 6,8 hours

author: {'steamid': '76561198046826037', 'num_games_owned': 408, 'num_reviews': 150, 'playtime_forever': 1293, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1293, 'last_played': 1375906794}
review:
Orcs Must Die is an awesome tower defense game where you take a major role in repelling incoming orcs by shooting them with your blunderbuss while you buy time for your defenses.
Orcs Must Die 2 is definitely better though, since it offers more enemies, more weapons, more towers, and even co-op.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080899762', 'num_games_owned': 430, 'num_reviews': 157, 'playtime_forever': 1493, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1493, 'last_played': 1595274332}
review:
第一人称英雄塔防类游戏，融合了实时策略和动作射击等玩法。有创意，又好玩。

下限低，只要喜欢动作射击游戏，你就能轻松完成一场爽快的攻防战。
上限高，完美通关需要你对陷阱组合和部署位置有独到的理解。
既有挑战性，又让人愉悦。

如果你喜欢植物大战僵尸，喜欢各种上帝视角的塔防游戏，那你一定要试试兽人必须死，它会给你全新的体验。

综合评分：8.5/10
