author: {'steamid': '76561197998531755', 'num_games_owned': 3112, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 1906, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1712, 'last_played': 1559064742}
review:
O jogo é uma jóia escondida. Vale a pena o seu tempo, especialmente quando você pode escolher o seu pacote tão barato.

Este jogo não parece tão divertido como deveria ser. Primeiro, é o design da masmorra. Os desenvolvedores usaram uma paleta de cores bastante sombria que dá ao jogo cores escuras desnecessárias. Os níveis visualmente são bastante estéreis, mas funcionais. A questão é que a estética de um jogo está faltando e não é nada colorida, o que é uma enorme oportunidade perdida para jogos como este. Outro fator de porque este jogo não é tão agradável quanto deveria ser é o AI base de Orks. Eles apenas correm através de você até a fenda. Isto torna-se bastante frustrante, em seguida, lidar com vários caminhos que faz o jogo se sentir como uma tarefa, corrida contra o tempo na prevenção de inimigos de entrar no rift. É aqui que a aderência aos jogos de defesa de torres faz com que este jogo sofra. O herói precisa de um pouco de tempo para chegar onde precisa estar. Alguns níveis são até mesmo confusos em seu layout. No jogo normal de defesa, você é onipresente, pois sua mobilidade é bastante limitada. Isso faz com que você corra, persiga e cuide de caminhos em vez de realmente segurar a horda. O jogo teria se beneficiado da IA ​​que tentaria despachar o herói primeiro antes de priorizar o rift e excluir os rushes para tipos específicos de inimigos.

Além disso, o design de níveis pode se tornar cansativo. É tudo sobre o novo truque que os desenvolvedores introduzem ou melhor, uma nova arma. Os níveis também são fortemente baseados em oportunidades ambientais. Raramente parece que você pode apenas configurar o que você gosta e é melhor adaptar-se ao novo nível. Enquanto uma miríade de diferentes abordagens pode funcionar, o jogo ainda tem ênfase no estilo específico através dos mapas. Toda a jornada parece mais como "ei, vamos agora tentar essa coisa nova" ao invés de "jogar do seu próprio jeito".

DLC me pegou de surpresa. Em uma primeira missão, não tive tempo de me preparar e, nas primeiras ondas, vi que ficou muito mais difícil. Se alguma coisa, isso só me incomodou, mas eu acho que é bom para pessoas que querem conteúdo mais desafiador. Porém, é bastante um pico de dificuldade.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085504066', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 632, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 632, 'last_played': 1557548465}
review:
Kia ora!

Orcs Must Die is perfect for casual gaming! Just have fun! Played through the game pretty much in one go. Two sessions with a little sleep in between. The game has good replayability, however I moved straight to OMD 2 instead of playing through nightmare difficulty or tidying up levels.

If you like Tower Defense Games definitely buy it! Oh and by the way the soundtrack is awesome and one track in particular really gets you pumped up!

author: {'steamid': '76561197998038269', 'num_games_owned': 1589, 'num_reviews': 167, 'playtime_forever': 636, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 636, 'last_played': 1557695056}
review:
Well, game is quite a hidden gem. It is worth your time, especially when you can pick its bundle so cheap. 

I will focus on things which are problematic in this game. First of all, game is quite unbalanced. For example, traps which pushes orks away are too powerful. They are dead cheap, have no upgrades. Yet, when you combined with overclocked springs upgrades, it gets insane value. It is just 1000 upgrade to kill Ogres and it is not hard thing to do. In the final mission and wave this was extremely ridiculous as I had put one such trap next to each doorway. Guess what had happened. That's right. All ogres just got killed instantly and I won the game without firing a single shot. Combat tree on the other hand suffers the most as you can't really be everywhere on later levels and its usefulness compared to trap tree is just overall bad. Game is full of upgrade trees and traps of various usefulness and it suffers from general attitude "if it is not PvP content, you don't have to balance it". Game relies too much on headshots, but hit boxes for those are iffy. Crossbow does pitiful damage otherwise and sometimes it becomes highly frustrating.


Then, this game doesn't feel as fun as it should be. The issue is few fold. First, it is dungeon design. Developers used quite grim colour palette which gives game that unnecessary dark colours. Visually levels are quite barren, but functional. The issue is that aesthetics of a game are lacking and it is not colourful at all which is a huge missed opportunity for game such as this. Other factor of why this game is not as enjoyable as it should be is base AI of Orks. They just run through you to the rift. This becomes quite frustrating then dealing with several pathways which makes game feel like a chore, race against the time in preventing enemies from getting into the rift. This is where adherence to tower defence games makes this game suffer. Hero needs quite a bit of time to get to where he needs to be. Some levels are even confusing in their layout. In normal tower defence game, you are omnipresent, in this your mobility is quite limited. It makes you to run, chase and to babysit pathways rather than actually holding the horde. Game would had benefited from AI who would try to dispatch hero first before prioritising rift and excluding rushes to specific enemy types.

In addition, level design can get tiring. It is all about the new gimmick which devs introduce or rather, new weapon. Levels are also heavily based upon environmental opportunities. It rarely feels that you can just set up what you like and it is rather adapting to new level. While myriad of different approaches can work, game still has emphasis on specific style through maps. The whole journey feels more like "hey, lets now try this new thing" rather than "play it your own way" approach.


DLC took me by surprise. In a very first mission I got no time to prepare and in first waves I saw that it got a lot more difficult. If anything, it just annoyed me, but I guess it is fine for people who want more challenging content. Though, it is quite a difficulty spike.


Ah, the last, but not least. This game has no story at all. Well, it technically has, but devs did not play tested their game even once. How do I know it? Story is being told during combat. This results in you being unable to listen and all the dialogue being heavily overshadowed by all the action, explodey noises which you and your traps make. Really, such an annoying rookie mistake.

I am currently using the latest computer btw so maybe that's why and not the driver being disable at all.  Such a waste of my $10.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967291614', 'num_games_owned': 3248, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 736, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 736, 'last_played': 1555260114}
review:
Ich bin kein Freund von Tower Defense Spielen, Orcs Must Die! ändert da auch nichts dran.  Dennoch ist das ein gutes Spiel, was wohl mit daran liegt, dass es sich in 3rd-Person spielt statt Topdown. Was ich sehr gut an dem Spiel finde ist die Komik von Orsc Must Die! die sich aus einem Mischmasch von Grafikstil, der Kommentare der Figuren, der Art der Erzählung und Bilddarstellung á la Ladebildschirm und damit mitten ins schwarze meines Humors trifft. 

Das Gameplay läuft sehr flüssig, soll heißen mir fällt nichts ein worüber ich auch nur im Ansatz meckern könnte, der Schwierigkeitsgrad ist ausbalanciert, macht es nicht zu leicht, dass man sich langweilt, macht es im Umkehrschluss nicht zu schwer, dass man das Spiel frustriert beendet. Man gewinnt und man verliert, Punkt. Mit Abschluss des Spiels hat man genug Fallen und Zauber im Repertoire, dass man die Missionen auf die vielfälltigsten Weisen erneut lösen kann was Abwechslung ins Spiel bringt, egal ob man den Heighscore versucht, seine fünf Schädel zusammen bekommen möchte oder einfach die Orcs fliegen sehen will. Dieses Spiel lohnt sich auf jeden Fall.

author: {'steamid': '76561198253167221', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 1439, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1439, 'last_played': 1528656625}
review:
Nagyszerű ez a játék, az egyik legjobb tower defense. Ebben a játékban nekem nem is hiányzott a többjátékos mód, ez a játék úgy jó ahogy van. Ahogy haladunk előre a pályákkal, úgy nyílnak meg a különféle csapdák és fegyverek.
Mindenképpen ajánlom, az egyik kedvenc játékom lett. 
Teljesítmények: 27/27

author: {'steamid': '76561198304690132', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 155, 'playtime_forever': 1674, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1673, 'last_played': 1553652055}
review:
中盤までは楽しめた。

中盤以降は何がなんやら目がまわる。

バトル途中でのトラップの配置と戦略が上手くいかず
気がつけば、トラップじたいあまり把握できぬままクロスボウを連打。

能力に依存するカタチでの凍結と吸収、ファイアーボールで指がつりそうになった。

ノリのいい雰囲気で終えたにもかかわらず
ヘロヘロ＆へとへとの疲労困憊ゲーだった。

author: {'steamid': '76561198019727990', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 3036, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3006, 'last_played': 1520432687}
review:
[h1]JC's Games Discount Group[/h1]

[b][url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/JCsGamesDiscounts]Click here - and add yourself to JC's Games Discount Group[/url][/b]

This is a brilliant game, and one well worth playing!

I enjoyed the animation, the simplicity and the mild but daft humour throughout.

Personally speaking, I prefer this to Orcs Must Die 2, but each to their own.  This was and is exactly what I wanted in a first person 'tower defence game', without wanting the coop experience that version 2 brings.

The key to winning is using the environment to your advantage, i.e. where there are cauldrons attached to the ceiling, use them!!.... and perfect your aim to get head shots!!

For those of you looking to increase the challenge then aim to complete all the achievements, they're a blast!

author: {'steamid': '76561198062813911', 'num_games_owned': 1952, 'num_reviews': 2041, 'playtime_forever': 233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1551538928}
review:
[h1] DISCLAIMER: This is a first impressions review, and NOT a full review [/h1]

Orcs Must Die! is a game developed and published by Robot Entertainment

The game offers some nice graphics, although some ugly glitches here and there, it is pleasant all the same

The game does suffer with some repetitiveness at certain areas of the game but a fun game nonetheless

Orcs Must Die! overall, however, is a fun game to play, yet sometimes repetitive and it does get boring if being played for a long time, but is a great tower defence strategy game to play in short bursts!

[h1] RECOMMENDED :) [/h1]

review:
Les plus: Des niveau au design de plus en plus compliqué et du challenge intéressant vers les derniers niveaux.

Les moins: Assez répétitif, mais ce n'est pas vraiment un problème si on fait quelques niveaux de temps en temps (vaut mieux pas essayer de rusher tout le contenu en une journée).

Le design et les animations sont drôles en plus, manque plus qu'un mode coop! (voir Orcs Must Die 2!).

author: {'steamid': '76561197960313396', 'num_games_owned': 2, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 838, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 838, 'last_played': 1549555327}
review:
An action and well polished tower defense.

[h1][b]Performance: 10\10[/b][/h1]

     [b]- Optimization:[/b]  

The game is really optimized, I'm playing it in 3440x1440 at locked 100fps and never experienced an fps drop.

     [b]- Bugs\Glitches:[/b]

Never encountered a single bug or glitch, my 2 playthroughs were flawless.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1647749869
[h1][b]Gameplay: 7\10[/b][/h1]

     [b]- Challenge:[/b]

This game is really challenging, granted you play in the hardest difficulty and try to complete every level with the highest rating (5 Skulls). I had a pretty hard time getting 5 skulls in every level in Nightmare difficulty. I really enjoyed it.

     [b]- Content:[/b]

The story is nothing memorable (you don't play this game for the story), and I completed it in about 10 hours the first time, then another 4 hours to replay it in Nightmare difficulty. I will not play this game again, it would be repetitive, but that's just me. Will surely get OMD 2 though.

     [b]- Controls:[/b]

I'm more of a static dude in Tower Defense games; I much rather put my towers\traps and then sit back and watch how it plays. I'm not an huge fan of this action based gameplay that OMD offers. That being said, if you prefer a more "active" gameplay then this game is really for you.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1647750053
[h1][b]Design: 8.5\10[/b][/h1]

     [b]- Graphics:[/b]

I was really surprised with this one, the graphics are awesome for a 2011 game. Textures, particles effects, and models are really well made. The art design is perfect.

     [b]- Sound:[/b]

Sounds are well made, albeit there are not many different effects for orcs. Music is nothing special, but that's not really relevant in a game like this.

     [b]- Interface:[/b]

The interface is functional and clean, I liked it.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1647750116

author: {'steamid': '76561198324176893', 'num_games_owned': 555, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 1930, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1930, 'last_played': 1548453830}
review:
又是一款买来补盗版税的作品，虽然不知怎么的就顺便做了全成就。

这游戏不能说很简单，但也没有那么难。认真玩的话，可能全成就也就十几个小时不到的事情。

（我花了30+hrs是因为经常游戏挂机去干别的事情/睡觉去了。。。）

感觉2代没有那么好玩了，也完全没有做成就的欲望。。。

先推荐一波吧！

（唯一不足：明明对白很搞笑，却没有字幕）

author: {'steamid': '76561198050629402', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 601, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 601, 'last_played': 1548487671}
review:
Só joguei Plants vs. Zombies de Tower Defense a vida inteira, não tinha muita paciência para esse tipo de jogo, então achei na Steam um jogo chamado Orcs Must Die! e chamou a minha atenção pelo fato de ser em 3ª pessoa, gostei de ver algumas imagens e vídeos de gameplays. Tomei a decisão de comprar em uma promoção para experimentar e não me arrependi, o jogo é bacana, visual cartoon, cenários um pouco repetitivos, porém a equipe desenvolvedora se esforçou para trazer mapas mais complexos e além de tudo a jogabilidade é leve e frenética desde o começo, bem diferente do PVZ que começa bem devagar. 
O jogo te deixa à vontade com sua criatividade, é um game que te deixa montar as armadilhas como quiser, defender a fenda/torre às vezes é bem complicado, mas é confortante a sensação de vitória no game. 
Recomendado 8,5/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046038030', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1558098300}
review: This is a tower defense / RPG game. You place traps to help slow down and thin out the orcs that swarm you while you yourself attack them as well. The gameplay is quite fun and it does have one heck of a challenge. You really have to pay attention to how you set up your traps because you will be fighting hordes upon hordes of orcs. As you get farther in the game you start having to protect multiple portal from the said horde of orcs so if your not careful you will get overran very quickly. All in all it is a fun game with a good challenge.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041415814', 'num_games_owned': 1179, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 2233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1298, 'last_played': 1601576265}
review:
Orcs Must Die! es una mezcla de tower defense, MOBA y shooter. A lo largo de veinticuatro niveles, divididos en tres actos, nos encargaremos de eliminar a todos los orcos, goblins, ogros, gnolls y demás criaturas que han conseguido adentrarse en nuestro castillo mediante unos portales interdimensionales.

Para afrontar cada nivel, tendremos que invertir oro (que se obtiene matando orcos) en un arsenal de trampas, armas y hechizos que nos servirá para frenar a las oleadas de enemigos que se precipitan a invadir "La Fisura", que no es otra cosa que el último portal que tenemos que defender. Nuestro cometido es aniquilar a estos seres haciendo uso de nuestra astucia en un juego que tiene un elevado componente estratégico, ya que tendremos que determinar la posición de cada trampa, comprar guardianes como paladines o arqueros, lanzar hechizos elementales o tener precisión con la ballesta, que es el arma principal de nuestro mago.

Pese a tratarse de un juego de 2011, el título luce muy bien a día de hoy gracias al trabajo de Robot Entertainment. Este estudio de desarrollo consiguió optimizar a la perfección su obra y además, logró darle un toque humorístico realmente acertado. El diseño de niveles es muy satisfactorio, ya que a medida que vamos avanzando en la historia se nos presentarán pasillos, cámaras y salones del castillo que tendrán diferentes pisos, varios portales con diferentes caminos, techos abiertos por los que entrarán enemigos voladores y un sinfín de posibilidades que complicarán notablemente nuestra tarea.

Personalmente, Orcs Must Die! me ha parecido un gran juego en relación calidad-precio, es muy adictivo y sus tres modos de dificultad lo hacen totalmente rejugable. Muchos niveles nos llevarán a situaciones límite en las que tendremos que clickear el botón izquierdo del ratón sin parar para frenar a las hordas de orcos que se abalanzarán sobre nosotros. También tendremos la opción de mejorar nuestro arsenal pagando con "cráneos", la moneda del juego que se consigue haciendo buenas partidas en cada nivel. 

No tiene multijugador, aunque su segunda parte sí lo introdujo, sin embargo, es una experiencia que recomiendo a todos aquellos que quieran enfrentarse a un reto verdaderamente desafiante. También aconsejo comprar la expansión "Lost Adventures", puesto que incluye cinco niveles adicionales.

Minha nota para o game é : 9/10, jogo bem legal !!

review:
Good tower defense game, has a fun comical style. 

I picked it up in a bundle with the sequel, which has a lot of improvments, and is an all around better game.
I would recommend getting the second one if your only going to pick up one of the two titles. However, both are equaly enjoyable, and the story is continuous, so if you skip this one you will miss out on that, if that matters to you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198211003815', 'num_games_owned': 271, 'num_reviews': 154, 'playtime_forever': 1074, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1011, 'last_played': 1695559789}
review: 兽人必须死系列第一作，算是一款老游戏了，没有官方中文，支持第三方汉化补丁。兽人必须死是类塔防的第三人称游戏，通过布置陷阱与远程近战消灭一波又一波袭击来的兽人军团，通过不断推进关卡解锁更多的陷阱与道具，不同的敌人需要采取不同的应对，不过由于是第一作，很多时候策略可能比较单一就能解决，一招鲜吃遍天，比如挡路流就在大部分关卡十分好用。是一款十分耐玩的游戏，整体风格偏卡通。目前普通模式已经全部五星通关。

author: {'steamid': '76561198263316031', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 462, 'playtime_forever': 440, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 440, 'last_played': 1545600038}
review:
Muy buen juego de defensa de torres en 3D, desidi darle una oportunidad sin muchas esperanzas, pero me diverti mucho.
Como defensa de torres no añade nada a la formula (talvez hasta quita esa de mejorar las torres en cada mapa). Tienes una serie de trampas, bastante variadas (que acomodas en la fase de preparacion) y ordas de enemigos, durante la fase de combate puedes participar con tu ballesta y algunos hechizos.
Los mapas son variados y no siempre te valdran las mismas trampas (porque solo puedes llevar algunas a cada mapa,de tu eleccion claro). 
Es un juego satisfactorio, en su dificultad normal, no lo tendras facil y puede que pierdas algun mapa, pero no mas de una vez. Eso si cuando descubri las habilidades pasivas (que se compran y reinician en cada mapa) se rompio, podia comprar trampas y trampas, ya digo super satisfactorio.

author: {'steamid': '76561198176414038', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2027, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1660736997}
review:
Witam
Jeśli zastanawiasz się nad kupnem "Orcs Must Die!" to oświadczam że nie jest to zły pomysł. Jest to czymś w stylu Tower Defense, ale można się poruszać po mapie sterowaną przez nas postacią, przyzywać wojowników czy też pułapki. Gra oferuje walkę bronią białą, bronią dystansową i magią. Grafika choć nie jest nowa to wciąż i nadal wygląda świetnie! Zachęcam więc do zagrania w tę grę jeśli tylko masz ochotę pozabijać paru orków. Szukasz luźnej gierki do odpoczynku? Znalazłeś! Szukasz gry która da ci wyzwanie? Znalazłeś! Grę można przejść na normalnym poziomie trudności, jeśli masz z tym problem możesz go obniżyć, a po przejściu masz możliwość rozegrania trybu koszmaru....
Polecam osobiście ;)

review: Игра пушка! Это симулятор американского пограничника. Ты пограничник, а орки, огры и другие пидарасы - мексиканцы. Изощренные ловушки от острых предметов до бочек с пальмовым маслом. Иногда тебе будут помогать 2-3 путаны, которые увеличат твой член,либо сделают ловушки более острыми(шутка про пики точеные ....). Вообщем хоть игре уже 8 лет , она довольно жизненная и четкая. Удачи,помни они могут , как и гуки прятаться на деревьях!

author: {'steamid': '76561198009752238', 'num_games_owned': 952, 'num_reviews': 211, 'playtime_forever': 536, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 536, 'last_played': 1542779383}
review:
This was a very fun game. Orcs Must Die is a Third-person action-strategy game. I almost wanna call it tower defense since the object of the game is to defend your portal from orcs. How do you do that? Well that's where the fun comes in.

You play as a war mage apprentice who's job is to protect the portals. You get to lay out traps, learn spells, and use weapons to defend yourself and the portal from the orc horde. In the beginning you only have access to a few traps and a bow. But as the game progresses you get a huge arsenal to really help you in your line of defense. From simple tar pits that slow enemies down, to wall darts and ceiling crushers! Oh yeah, and that's just a taste of what you can use.

I really enjoyed this game and the challenge was just perfect. There's this great sense of glee you get when you have your traps perfectly set to where you don't have to move, all your handiwork is taking care of the threat for you. However, I do wish they had more traps to take care of flying enemies. I felt that you didn't have many options to use against them aside from the archers (which are amazing when you upgrade them) and the mini ballista (which I thought was too slow, but that's just me).

So if you're looking for some strategic chaos and lots of fun and exciting ways to kill orcs, you need to check out this game!

TL:DR: Very fun third person strategic action game with hilarious ways to destroy hordes of enemies. Very fun and presents a nice challenge.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972978861', 'num_games_owned': 1477, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 1038, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1038, 'last_played': 1543097966}

author: {'steamid': '76561198128885199', 'num_games_owned': 2385, 'num_reviews': 164, 'playtime_forever': 328, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 328, 'last_played': 1542059410}
review:
Uno de los mejores títulos basados en el género supervivencia, quien le guste este, no es entrega par perderse. Es simple, desde todos los puntos de vista, sonoro, gráfico, configuración, con un peculiar entorno casi animado de ogros y magia y una decente optimización. Tiene una breve variedad de trampas disponibles para ejecutar de diversas maneras a tus enemigos como envenenándolos, incinerándolos o aturdirlos mientras incrustas una flecha en su cabeza.
El estilo de los escenarios siempre se mantiene con una distancia entre lo corto y lo mediano para que sea bastante dinámico. Sin embargo, los ultimos niveles de la campaña, en mi opinion, su dificultad es elevada a tal punto de que parezca estar diseñados para múltiples jugadores. Los escenarios podrían ser un poco mas complejos o diversos para agregarlo algo mas distinto a su estilo.
Por otro lado, encuentro un poco desbalanceadas el daño de las armas cuerpo a cuerpo respecto el daño que recibes por la semejante cantidad de enemigos que hay (la mayoria son de daño cuerpo a cuerpo y no a distancia).
Es recomendado, no una compra obligatoria, pero si de oferta con sus DLCs e incluso su excelente secuela que encuentro con casi las mismas críticas que esta.
Los DLCs valen la pena ya que amplian un poco el armamento y añaden bastantes niveles similares a los de la campaña con un entorno diferente, ejemplo, nieve, antiguo, etc. Mas que ello no se debido que no los tengo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198209910323', 'num_games_owned': 343, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 861, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 838, 'last_played': 1530536691}
review: OMD to zdecydowanie najlepszy pierwszoosobowy tower defense jaki istnieje. Dopiero podczas mordowania tysięcy orków w człowieku budzi się jego krwiożercza natura i zanika moralność. Celem jego istnienia jest tylko zabijanie kolejnych tabunów zielonych potworów, a wszystko czego się dotknie zamienia się w krew i kupę mięsa. Ponadto gra zawiera masę humoru dzięki wypowiadanym przez postacie kwestiom. Warto zaznaczyć, że gra nie jest łatwa nawet na podstawowym poziomie trudności, późniejsze poziomy potrafią stanowić wyzwanie. Graficznie gra się w ogóle nie zestarzała. Serdecznie polecam.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991957072', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 724, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 724, 'last_played': 1324540800}
review: It's a tower defense game where you actively participate in the combat. it also reminds me of Trapt, which was a pretty fun game for back in the day. it's frantic fun with hordes of baddies charge headlong into your traps and get decimated. it's pretty fun and the enemies are standard fare for a tower defence. Overall an enjoyable game, worth getting on sale or in a bundle.

author: {'steamid': '76561198132536943', 'num_games_owned': 571, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 883, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 873, 'last_played': 1527931449}
review:
Velmi povedená hra akorád už je moc stará a proto ji nedoporučuji kupovat, protože má druhý díl a ten je o hodně lepší a má i stejné levely jako jednička a má jich i mnohem více. Ovšem pokud vás bavila dvojika a chcete zkusit jedničku. Tak si tento titul kupte akorád mi to přijde zbytečné. Hra ovšem není až tak špatná a proto jí dávám 85% za dobře vymyšlenou hru.

Doporučení: Hra není pro více hráčů a Orc must die 2 je lepší. Ovšem není to špatná hra.
Hodnocení: 60%

author: {'steamid': '76561198378598226', 'num_games_owned': 1410, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 1716, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1626, 'last_played': 1535455156}
review:
[h1] Шикарный Tower Defence для своего времени, но уже явно не теперь [/h1]
Игре палец вверх, посколько лично мне она зашла, вечерами можно запросто скоротать время, маленько поубивать орков и уйти.

[h1] Плюсы: [/h1]
+ идея и задумка. Лучших игр с таким жанром я пока знаю очень мало.
+ Юмор доставляет, хоть временами и туповат, но доставляет.
+Разнообразие локаций, ловушек и тому подобного.
+ временами даже приходится думать: "какую ловушку, где и как лучше поставить", так что это не только тупое месиво, но ещё и простор для размышлений.
+ Разные уровни сложности, затсавляющие как расслабляться, так и потеть))

[h1] Минусы: [/h1]
- Отсуствтие сюжета, ну или он есть, но очень слабый.
Я конечно понимаю, что в игре такого жанра его быть и не должно, но из-за этого.. (читайте дальше)
- Быстро приедается процесс.
То есть скучно, банально скучно. Я не могла играть в эту игру больше 30 минут или часа в день, потому что там банально нечего делать и всё однообразно. 
Зачистил все волны и всё по новой, меняется только комната, а принцип один и тот же.

[h1] Итог:[/h1]
Всё бы ничего, если бы не приедался процесс, так можно было бы спокойно ставить 8\10 (при учёте всех минусов)
Но затягивает она слабо, так вам скажу. Во второй части есть мультиплеер, это уже явно спасает ситуацию, а здесь.. ну просто не интересно бегать одному. 
Из-за однообразия ставлю 6\10

author: {'steamid': '76561198004492343', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1540936915}
review:
Tower defense. The frustrating, stimulating sport of Kings! Or their guards, to be more specific. Otherwise known as Bouncer Across the Multiverse. Keep the orks and ork-related baddies out of the magical rifts since your mentor died and you can do so much better than that old fogey anyway.

It combines strategy rather well with third person FPS and hack-and-slash. Rewards button mashing and strategic upgrades alike. Basic storyline but mild humor to lampshade the typical save-the-universe jive. Arcade-y with the global leaderboards.

Eventually turns into  let's-discover-new-ways-to-disembowel-all-participants-in-the-latest-WAAAGH

author: {'steamid': '76561198061291431', 'num_games_owned': 554, 'num_reviews': 210, 'playtime_forever': 1537, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1537, 'last_played': 1541059902}
review:
[h1]Всегда хотели раздать оркам хедшоты? Или же протестировать, насколько хорошо орки приспособлены к разному типу ловушек? Тогда, эта игра то, что вам нужно![/h1]

[i]Примерное время прохождения на обычной сложности + дополнения: 7ч + 2ч (плюс ещё примерно столько же на сложности "ночной кошмар), в зависимости от числа волн, карты будут занимать от 5, до 20 минут.[/i]

[h1]Сюжет без спойлеров[/h1]
Игра предлагает роль боевого мага, защищающего порталы, ведущие из "мёртвого мира" в мир людей, и служащие источниками всей магии. В "мёртвом мире", Орден (организация людей, занимающаяся защитой порталов) построил крепости вокруг порталов, и у них удачно получалось отбивать атаки орков и прочих существ, ведь не смотря на значительно превосходящее число воинов, противники не отличались интеллектом, но вдруг атаки стали организованными ...

[h1]Геймплей[/h1]
В игре только один режим одиночной кампании (почему-то есть мнение, что тут присутствует кооп) с 3 сложностями, причём, полным прохождением стоило бы считать прохождение игры на "боевом маге" (2'ая сложность) и "ночном кошмаре" (3'тья), так как они заметно отличаются сложностью, а "ночной кошмар" открывается только после прохождения игры на "боевом маге". Целью карт является защита одного или нескольких порталов в течении нескольких волн, если враги будут проникать в порталы, то игрок будет терять портальные очки, пока не проиграет. Враги выходят из одних или нескольких ворот (обычно, чем больше прошло волн, тем из большего числа ворот выходят враги), и всегда двигаются по определённому пути (установка баррикад позволяет изменить их маршрут), враги атакуют игрока, если он находится на их пути, но на игрока может отвлечься лишь определённое число врагов (исключением являются циклопы и орки с арбалетами, а так же гноллы, гноллы сразу же бегут атаковать игрока), остальные же идут дальше. В начале боя, игроку предлагают заполнить 10 имеющихся слотов доступным снаряжением и ловушками (но первый слот всегда занят арбалетом), и выбрать хранительницу (если хранительницы открыты). Ловушки делятся на те, которые можно установить на пол, стены и потолок, установка ловушек требует монет, которые даются за убийство врагов (дополнительно, монеты даются за убийств сразу нескольких врагов за небольшой промежуток времени) и завершение волн, во время паузы между волнами ловушки можно продать за 100% от цены (исключением являются повреждённые баррикады, паладины и лучники, другие ловушки повредить невозможно), число ловушек не ограничивается, ловушки можно стоить как во время волн, так и во время боя, ловушки нельзя улучшать во время боя, но каждую ловушку можно улучшить 1 раз в меню, потратив на это черепа, которые даются за завершение карт. Помимо ловушек игрока, на некоторых картах есть особые ловушки, такие как чаны с кислотой и огромные брёвна, активируемые выстрелом игрока.


[h1]Плюсы:[/h1]
+ [u][b]24 карты + 5 с дополнением[/b][/u] На разных картах, чтобы добиться хорошего результата пройдется использовать разное снаряжение, ловушки и хранительниц, так что однообразия в игре не заметно.
+ [u][b]12 разных врагов +2 с дополнением[/b][/u] Несмотря на то, что враги не укорачиваются от выстрелов, они интересуют своим большим количеством, вы сможете убивать более 100 врагов за 5 минут, ведь только огры и циклопы обладают большим здоровьем. Разные типы врагов отличаются размером (некоторые ловушки не действуют на больших врагов), способом передвижения (летающие враги летят по другому пути), особенностями (хобгоблин шаман может воскрешать любых врагов, щит орка-щитоносца блокирует один любой удар, кобольд подрывник легко расправляется с баррикадами, ...) и характеристиками. Стоит выделить ледяного и огненного огров, ледяной получает больше урона от огня и меньше от льда и наоборот.
+ [u][b]6 снаряжения + 2 с дополнением[/b][/u] Арбалет наносит x10 урон при выстреле в голову, и может запустить оглушающий выстрела, браслеты огня позволят бросаться огненными шарами и ставить огненные стены, кольцо молний позволит бросаться цепными молниями и создавать грозовые тучи, ...
+ [u][b]19 ловушек + 3 с дополнениями[/b][/u] Замедляющая врагов смола, баррикады перекрывающие пути, настенные топоры рубящие орков на части, взрывоопасная бочка, разрывающие орков поблизости, пружины, сбрасывающие наступивших врагов, грибы, переманивающие врагов на строну игрока, монетные площадки, увеличивающие награду за убийство врагов, ...
+ [u][b]Перки хранительниц[/b][/u] Хотите эффективнее расправляться с врагами лично (можете получить огненный арбалет, ...), или собираетесь больше полагаться на ловушки(+50% к урону колющих и режущих ловушек, ...)? 3 хранительницы, у каждой из которых древо из 7 перков, позволят вам поэкспериментировать с тактиками.
+  [u][b]Юмор[/b][/u] Орки постоянно говорят что-то забавное, к примеру: "Я пойду последним", так же юмор есть в сюжете и загрузочных экранах с ловушками.


[h1]Минусы:[/h1]
- [u][b]Выбор снаряжения и ловушек[/b][/u] Меню этого выбора в начале боя очень не удобное, оно не отсортировано, и ловушки вместе со снаряжением там просто разбросаны по ячейкам. Так же, это меню не сохраняет пустой слот, если вы хотите заменить что-то из взятого, а передвигает всё взятое.
- [u][b]Улучшения ловушек[/b][/u] Потратив черепа на улучшение ловушки, их нельзя будет вернуть, ловушка показавшаяся крайне полезной на одной из карт, может быть совершенно бесполезна на другой карте. А чтобы улучшить все ловушки, надо пройти все карты на обоих сложностях, набрав по 5/5 черепов на каждой (при завершении карты, даётся до 4 черепов (1 на сложности "подмастерье"), в зависимости от числа прошедших через порталы врагов + 1, если вы успели пройти карту достаточно быстро). Несколько раз получить черепа с карты нельзя.


[i]Хотя, после этой игры вышло ещё две игры "Orcs Must Die!", первая игра всё равно достойна внимания.[/i]

[h1]8.7/10[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198118999113', 'num_games_owned': 1112, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 1588, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1279, 'last_played': 1570161066}
review:
As regras são simples. Coloque armadilhas, ataque com seu herói, não deixe que orcs cheguem ao portal. Isso é tudo. E sim, é uma jogabilidade muito viciante. Você desbloqueia novas armadilhas e inimigos se tornam mais difíceis e mais variados a cada novo nível. Então, o jogo tem muito conteúdo e horas de jogo. Eu posso dizer com certeza que o jogo é ótimo!

Com sistemas de classificação que realmente lhe dão recompensas, inimigos divertidos e interessantes, uma longa e árdua campanha, e uma pequena história divertida, posso considera-lo como um Must Buy. 

[u]Pontos em destaque:[/u]
[list]
    [*]Casual e fácil de aprender: você pode jogar por menos de uma hora e ainda se divertir!
    [*]Muitos orcs diferentes para matar: orcs corpo a corpo, orcs de alcance, orcs voadores, etc.
    [*]Muitas maneiras diferentes de matar orcs: armas, feitiços, armadilhas e guardiões.
    [*]Sistema de classificação que permite que você se classifique entre amigos.
    [*]Nível de classificação de cinco caveiras que podem ser usados ​​para comprar upgrades.
    [*]Grande quantidade de feitiços, armas e armadilhas para escolher.
    [*]Árvores de habilidades que podem ser personalizadas em cada nível para permitir que você mude seu estilo de jogo.
    [*]Gráficos suaves que ficam bem e não exageram.
    [*]Diálogo engraçado e divertido.
    [*]Intensa quantidade de ação, mantém você pressionado e lutando entre cada onda.
    [*]Modo Pesadelo extremamente desafiador.
[/list]

author: {'steamid': '76561198011306765', 'num_games_owned': 174, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2498, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2496, 'last_played': 1590177949}
review:
A little gem! 
I found this game by an accident and absolutely felt in love with it! Perhaps it is the immersing story or the exaggerated main protagonist, but you just wish to play and play(and to get better in it!). Essentially this is a game of building a sufficient traps to stop the overwhelming attacks of all the nasty creatures you can imagine. There is a decent arsenal of weapons, upgrades and character specific spells/artefacts. Levels allow for multiple scenarios and are challenging.
Combined with a cartoon graphic, fast paced TPP action packed with explosions and magic flying all over the place we have a very tasty product that should give you hours of fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041990871', 'num_games_owned': 877, 'num_reviews': 253, 'playtime_forever': 397, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 397, 'last_played': 1536986039}
review: Very fun game. Haven't finished all of the levels yet, but this is a great game overall so far. The traps are pretty cool, and the dlc weapon, Vampiric Gauntlets, is awesome. The only thing that I wish for this game is that there were different play styles. Like one class that is mainly focused on traps and less on attacking with the character, or one that is super mobile and damaging but only has basic and not great traps. I like what they do with the different weapons, but I want more specializations. Nothing bad to say about the game though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022980827', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 244, 'playtime_forever': 474, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 474, 'last_played': 1380199339}
review:
Orcs Must Die! is a fun 3rd person tower defense game released in 2011. As with most tower defense games the goal is to defend the stages rifts (some stages have more than one) from the waves of enemies that spawn at each of the maps entrances (there are multiple entrances and some open at different times). While not being overly difficult to finish it’s not easy to get a perfect score in the stages and allowing too many orcs through will require a restart.
 
You play as the War mage, the last surviving member of the order who were destroyed in an ambush by the mob, a group of creatures that includes orcs, ogres, imps and other assorted creatures that wish to swarm into the human world from the dead world. The narrator (your teacher) doesn’t believe you up to the task, and is quite surprised as you manage to keep the mob at bay. I liked the Hero’s design and voice work, and he has a killer dance he breaks out in when he finishes a stage.
 
Gameplay is roughly broken into 2 separate parts, the initial setup phase where you pick up to 10 traps and items that you want to use in that stage and place the initial traps depending on your available money. The second part is a frantic fight as you watch how your traps are working, take the fight to the enemy, collect any dropped money, and try to save as many rift points as possible. As soon as the last enemy dies from one wave, the next wave starts, leaving a very small window to heal, take stock of the situation and prepare for the next wave. You do get a much needed break after every 3rd or 4th wave to do proper take on the situation, allowing you to change your trap placement, upgrade traps or character attributes (for that stage only) and plan for the next few waves. When you finish a stage you are rated in skulls (up to 5) for your performance, with the skulls being used to buy permanent improvements for traps, items and magic that are applied across all stages. This does allow a slight customization to the hero, as you can choose to focus more on traps or upgrading character abilities, though to complete the game on nightmare its likely you will have unlocked all the upgrades or a good amount of them before stating it.
 
The traps can be placed on generally any surface (floors, walls roofs), and with the stages design often lead to humorous scenes of watching orcs fly into vats of acid, be frozen and shattered, impaled, set on fire, shot, melted or crushed to death. As everything is drawn in a cartoonish style so what could have been a charnel house turns into a waiting game of gleefully watching them die and hoping the trap timers reset quick enough to send the next load of enemies to their death in often funny fashion. If your well equipped you can take the fight to the enemy but this can be a risk as a death will remove rift points.
 
If you are chasing 100% achievements then it’s possible but it requires a very good knowledge of each map, where to place traps and what spawns on each wave.

For more reviews please visit https://store.steampowered.com/curator/31327216/

author: {'steamid': '76561198044218218', 'num_games_owned': 479, 'num_reviews': 247, 'playtime_forever': 549, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 549, 'last_played': 1465173600}
review: Orcs Must Die! é um tower defense misturado com ação em terceira pessoa. Recomendo pra quem gosta do estilo Tower defense, mas pode ser uma porta de entrada pra quem nunca teve contato com esse tipo de jogo e é mais fã de jogos de ação. É bem legal você posicionar seus diversos tipos de armadilha e depois sentar flechada nos orcs para que eles não alcancem o ponto principal. Necessita muita estratégia e inteligência em alguns estágios.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972563262', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 1670, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1670, 'last_played': 1533401268}
review: A chaotic, cartoonish take on Skyrim meets Defense Grid, both of which are games I adore. This game is well polished with serious replayability. Would not mind acheivement hunting forever. 95/100, only wished for more depth in controlling gaurdian attack preference and more achievements.

author: {'steamid': '76561198271550483', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1239, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1239, 'last_played': 1652721140}
review:
The Warlords of Draenor! Led by the demon corrupted Gul'dan, the orcish horde travels through rifts to the land of Azeroth to wreak havoc and setup the long awaited return of the Demons... Oh wait, wrong franchise.
Orcs Must Die! is a third person shooter with tower defense elements. Unfortunately, I mostly felt like it doesn't do either one aspects reasonably well.

The game has around 20 or so levels, and in each level, there is at least one rift, where the orcs and other greenish bastards are rushing in, and it's your job to keep them out of those rifts for several waves. The main character is armed with a crossbow, and once unlocked, you can equip several spells and traps to help you further defend the portals.
Shooting with the crossbow is often times frustrating. If you shoot too fast, you lose accuracy. But the orc horde is so vast, you often end up shooting as fast as you can click the mouse. AOE fire spell is good choice against them, but you only have enough mana to cast few of them. That's why you need the traps.

Your traps start with basic spikes coming out of the floor, until eventually you gain swinging maces and other painfully sharp tools. But the main problems are the cost and the variety. On early waves, you barely have enough money to even barricade some routes, so you mostly have to rely on the annoying crossbow and spells. After surviving a few waves, you've gained enough funds to afford some better laid out defenses. The game even occasionally puts the orcs on a break, and sends them after you only after you are ready. Here is the cost problem: you don't usually get enough credits to create those cool dedicated killing zones during a level. And since the variety of the traps are low, you end up doing the same cost effective strategies on most maps. This eventually starts to get boring.

The story is nothing to brag about, since it isn't even the main point of this game but at least the main character has funny dialogue. It is also hilarious to listen to the orcs talk. They often speak something like "my vacation starts tomorrow" just seconds before walking into a wall grinder. The music is also quite nice to listen to.

Being released in 2011, Orcs Must Die! runs well on any machine today. RTX 3060 Ti manages easily 240 fps at 1440p. The game also runs well, but I did encounter some weird bugs, where certain enemy types didn't have any walking or attacking animations and instead they advanced in an almost t-pose like stance.

The game falls short on both the third person shooting and tower defenses. You earn too little coins, forcing you to rely on the crossbow more, which isn't fun to use. When you start to earn enough money, the level is already over. You'll just end up doing same trap systems for most levels, since there really isn't a lot of interesting, innovating or improvised traps. It's a nice game for a while, and it's best played in short amounts at a time. I'd score this a 2/5. It is quite cheap, so it's worth a purchase, and therefore I can recommend it for the small amounts of enjoyment you get from time to time, like when you actually have enough credits to create a perfect orc smashing path of pain.

review: This is my first game ever that could be considered a tower defense so I'm not aware if there are better ones out there. Orcs Must Die!, however, was very fun to play and landing multiple kills with your traps that push orcs into fiery pits or melting several at once with your throwable acid bottles is pretty satisfying. There are not that many levels and most of the time they all look similar (with a few exceptions), but I dug the gameplay and the humour so I recommend it when it's on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113745188', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2081, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2068, 'last_played': 1530901495}
review:
1편 2편 세일할때삼

함정을 설치해서 몰려오는 오크들을 방어하는 게임
마법, 무기로 직접 돌아다니며 방어할 수 있다.

다양한 함정과 마법, 무기로 여러 가지 전략을 짤 수 있음
노말모드 깨고 나이트메어로 넘어가면 쉬는 타임이 없어서 익숙한 함정과 마법만 사용하게 되지만
개인적으로 그 점을 빼면 별다른 단점이 없어서 갓겜이었다.

review: This is an amazing sequel to the previous games. I've played a bunch in beta and am really enjoying the new Sabotage mode. This is not a tower defense game for amateurs...you've really gotta know your stuff. Don't expect a lot of hand holding. Love the game's sense of humor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198212756277', 'num_games_owned': 115, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2563, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2294, 'last_played': 1617104995}
review:
Nella mia prossima vita spero ci sia ancora Steam per poterlo rigiocare!
Questo non è il classico tower defence dove piazzi torrette e stai bello tranquillo ad aspettare che i nemici si ammazzino da soli come lemmings: dopo aver piazzato le trappole dovrai imbracciare le armi e combattere o quegli orchetti varcheranno la breccia! Ogni livello è una sfida non banale e richiederà sempre una certa dose di ingegno, tempestività e anche un po' della stupidità del protagonista, che continuando a parlare per tutto il tempo trascina il giocatore nel suo mondo. Tuttavia l'impegno sarà ben speso dato che ad ogni livello completato verranno sbloccate nuove armi e trappole.
Il gioco è davvero bellissimo e, anche se alcuni livelli ho fatto veramente tanta fatica a finirli senza far passare neanche un orchetto, altri mi sono divertito a giocarli più e più volte per sperimentare nuove combinazioni di trappole. La trama è molto semplice ma non per questo povera, anzi: ci sono diversi punti di svolta e, dalla metà del gioco in poi, diversi momenti capaci anche di far emozionare.
Un gioco pienamente riuscito, pochissimi difetti decisamente ignorabili e SOPRATTUTTO riesce a funzionare a grafica alta senza nessun problema sul mio pc patata, cosa decisamente non da poco!

author: {'steamid': '76561198049427471', 'num_games_owned': 1045, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1500605948}
review: Playing this is worth it, only for having a bit more time with the war mage. That said, 2 has multiplayer. So if you can only get one, jump over there with a friend. The shenanigans you can get up to are incredibly fun here as well, and this game stands very well on its own.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051407386', 'num_games_owned': 713, 'num_reviews': 121, 'playtime_forever': 682, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 682, 'last_played': 1525990266}
review:
Orcs must die! Es un defiende la torre en tercera persona bastante frenético y sobre todo muy divertido con mucha variedad en cuanto a trampas, armas y habilidades que nos permite jugar de diferente forma más efectiva o bien, más destructiva.

La campaña principal te puede llegar a durar las 5 horas y con la posibilidad de aumentar ese tiempo al jugarlo en dificultades más altas que te permiten utilizar todas las trampas y objetos desbloqueados para poder aguantar y terminar con vida de tantas oleadas consecutivas sin tiempo para planear, poner trampas o tener un respiro, un reto para los amantes de los tower defend. 

No puedo decir más que, es un juego muy recomendado para los amantes de los tower defend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059166722', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 7957, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7957, 'last_played': 1529396651}
review:
Поначалу игра может показаться трудной даже на уровне сложности "Боевой маг", но со временем, получая всё больше слотов для инвентаря и приобретая улучшения, тактика борьбы с орычьем отродьем становится более разноплановая и эффективная. Если до этого -  главное было сдержать многочисленные орды, чтобы как можно меньше вражин оказалось в портале, то затем приходит желание идеально всё перепройти, то есть не допустить в портал ни единого  чудища за отведённое время.  На средней сложности это будет -  проще пареной репы, а вот на "Ночном кошмаре" придётся немного попотеть для этого, так как на этом этапе нет тактических пауз, а времени между орычьеми наступлениями составляет всего 3 секунды, при этом вражеской нечести в разы больше.

Игра мне очень понравилась и стала одной из любимейших. В общей сложности, я провёл в ней более 130 часов. За все крепости получил по 5 черепов, на всех уровнях сложности, приобретя улучшение ко всему, что есть, истребив почти 150 000 недругов. Даже не припомню когда в последний раз меня игра так затягивала. 

К сожалению, не обошлось без недостатков, зато малочисленных. Во-первых, протагонист часто кричит то, чего не произошло: будь то, что лучник повержен или баррикада уничтожена и.т.д. Вроде бы и мелочь, только вот это всякий раз отвлекает. Ну а во-вторых, иногда враги угодив в лаву или кислоту не погибают, а продолжают там находиться пока их не прикончишь; и если орки просто лежат без сознания и их легко добить, то гноллы свободно так перемещаются, и до них добраться оказывается порой очень проблематично. Ну и, это не недостаток, но всё же, думаю, что достижений могло быть и побольше. К тому же, для дополнения "Lost Adventures" ни одного достижения нет.

author: {'steamid': '76561198382714417', 'num_games_owned': 122, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1701110512}
review:
[i]Весело Оркам живётся! У них что ни день - то война.

Они после боя вернутся и сразу напьются вина.

А после обильнейшей пьянки заточат свои топоры

И выйдет блестящая рота с началом рассветной поры.	[/i]

[h1] Механика [/h1]

Цель игры – защита всевозможных замков, подземелий и комнат от зеленой нечисти. Сам игровой процесс больно напоминает TD-карты из Warcraft 3. Враги не должны пройти до главного портала. Как и чем их ликвидировать – решение ваше.

[h1] Истоиря [/h1]

Повествование истории Оркс маст дай идёт от лица, не совсем погибшего, главного старого и седого мага защитника порталов. Он рассказывает, как случайно поскользнулся на крови кобальта и разбил череп об порожки. И теперь судьба мира лежит в руках его непутёвого ученика, которому предстоит занять место учителя и вступить в бой с ордами орков. В конце ролика дедуля скажет, что мир обречён. Этой фразой он сразу объяснил, на сколько хорошо подготовлен его ученик. 

По мере прохождения выясняется, что орды злобных зелено-кожих (и других тварей конечно) на самом деле управляемые и поэтому представляют двойную угрозу и этот кто-то на всерьёз намерен прорваться в мир людей. И вот же незадача? Все эти напасти упали на плечи ещё не обстрелянного паренька.

СПОЙЛЕР
[spoiler] Главным врагом оказывается бывшая ученица старика, которая пожелала власти и для этого решила возглавить армию зубасто клыкастых орков. Её задача сильно облегчилась. Ведь собрав такую кучу монстров, она расщипывала на бой со своим учителем, а тут этот, цитирую – «Самонадеянный дурной мальчишка!».

К несчастью злодейки, этот наш герой оказался крепким орешком и старый маг всё же хорошо его научил. Поэтому, с каждым закрытым порталом, он становится всё сильней и в итоге злой колдунье приходится бросать в бой все свои силы. «Хеппи енд» не заставит себя ждать. Этот неопытный воин остановит вторжение и закроет навсегда все порталы.	[/spoiler]

Итог: 10 орков из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198057966077', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 824, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 824, 'last_played': 1526856801}
review: Nowe (w 2011 roku) podejście do tower defence. Ciekawy i sprawnie wykorzystany koncept pogromcy Orków, który broni twierdzy rozstawiając pułapki. Mamy kilka rodzajów przeciwników, dużo różnych pułapek oraz broni (jak na długość rozgrywki i iloć map). Każdy kolejny poziom jest inny i stanowi większe wyzwanie. Na ostatnim levelu niemal rozniosłem mieszkanie z nerwów. :P Bardzo ładna i przyjemna grafika i do tego sprawna optymalizacja, dzięki której ta gra ruszy praktycznie na każdym sprzęcie. Chyba jedynym minusem jest tak naprawdę monotonia, która zaczyna dokuczać kiedy poprawiamy wynik któryś raz z kolei (ostatnia mapa ekhm...). Całościowo nic nadzwyczajnego, warto sprawdzić, wymagająca pod koniec.

author: {'steamid': '76561198155755820', 'num_games_owned': 1234, 'num_reviews': 389, 'playtime_forever': 541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 463, 'last_played': 1539015543}
review: For me this the best Orcs must die! game. Especially the levels design. 24 Fortresses to Defend – Twisting passages, tall towers, and wide-open chambers all need a war mage to protect them. Extensive Replayability – “Nightmare Mode” and a skull ranking system provide extended play. 9 out of 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029972608', 'num_games_owned': 643, 'num_reviews': 404, 'playtime_forever': 1769, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1548, 'last_played': 1665750853}
review:
[b]PROS:[/b]
+ 24 interesting levels
+ huge weapons & traps variety (+ upgrades)
+ nice mix of tower defense & action
+ cool soundtrack
+ funny story

[b]CONS:[/b]
- clunky placement of some traps
- some weird AI pathing
- no co-op
- cannot reset upgrades

[b]Comment:[/b]
Story elements are fun though the connection of the levels could have used a campaign map of sorts as to why/how we move between these locations in the first place. Each level has a certain best possible path of using traps to ace it. But the good thing is that this is not mandatory and you can experiment too. Often you will find creative, or weird, uses for traps and master the levels your own way. While some levels let you build up your defences evenly others you just have to run a couple of times to know what enemies will spawn in which door. Your skill counts in not just the strategic placement of traps. But also delivering headshots is a great way to get enemies down quick, if your aim is good. Personally I love the crossbow. Mixed with the flame bracers the fighting felt really satisfying. While this worked for ME the choice is entirely yours, I believe most weapon & trap combinations can work. There are Apprentice, War Mage and Nightmare difficulties but the last one has to be unlocked. This is good because you do not get real breaks between waves in it and upgraded traps are needed. Speaking of which you can upgrade each trap using skulls you win by finishing the levels. However, the number of skulls you can get is fixed and upgrading is permanent so choose wisely based on what you like/use. The funky archer (& some trap) placement get in the way sometimes when you want to hurry but you need to keep shifting your cursor or the player to find a spot. This is annoying especially on Nightmare where you have limited time. Also the AI pathing is a bit weird but this can be both advantage and disadvantage (barricades FTW!). There's no cooperative mode though you can find that in the sequel Orcs Must Die! 2. The plus side is that you can finish this game yourself, as it was designed, while OMD!2 is more difficult to do on your own. Overall it's a good mix of tower defense and third-person action. Designed for people who like to place traps/units but don't just want to sit by and watch. Definitely worth a try.
------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]If you liked this review you can find more on the [/b][url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/28638055-Subjective-Reviews-Corner/][u]Curator page[/u][/url][b] or in my [/b][url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/srcorner][u]Review Corner[/u][/url][b].[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198200273126', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 516, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 467, 'last_played': 1506369908}
review:
Este juego para lo que ofrece es bastante divertido y puede llegar a ser tan adictivo que te lo puedes termianr en tan solo 5 o 6 horas, y para ser parte del genero de los Tower Defense es bastante diferente y tambien mas intenso, la premisa es facil, se han abierto portales en donde orcos aparecen y quieren llegar a un nucleo para destruirlo y nuestro objetivo es deternlos.

Si buscas pasar el rato y divertirte matando orcos y protegiendo el nucleo, su precio no esta mal, talvez no sure mucho pero se que lo pasaras bien.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025171737', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 1074, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 926, 'last_played': 1529301156}
review: This game is awesome if you like things like Dungeon Defenders and the tower defense genre.  The idea is like every other tower defense -- place traps between the gate(s) that the orcs come out of and the rift they're trying to get to.  The implementation is great, it's light hearted, the traps are interesting and it's really satisfying to repel a huge wave of orcs with careful planning.

author: {'steamid': '76561198257769959', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 828, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 686, 'last_played': 1528453960}
review:
Это полный обзор.Наиграл почти 12 часов.Просто отличная игра где ты мочишь орков,огров и других фентезийных существ разными способами.Хочешь сжигай,прупускай через них ток,отправляй в полёт(желательно в кислоту или лаву),дави и ещё куча способов .
В игре неплохая мультяшная графика.Простой сюжет,хороший юмор.На лёгкой сложности просто.На кошмаре даст серьёзно попотеть.
Из минусов .Нет коопа.Некоторые уровни так и просят коопа.Но вроде во второй части имея первую часть, будут доступны уровни из первой.Ну и местами скачущая сложность .Моя оценка 8,5 из 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198380242921', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 452, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 177, 'last_played': 1706374994}

author: {'steamid': '76561198125097275', 'num_games_owned': 946, 'num_reviews': 164, 'playtime_forever': 469, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 420, 'last_played': 1628235304}
review:
"Ураганный экшен" - часто такое словосочетание применяется к шутерам. Но эта игра уделывает по динамике любой шутер. Добавить в Tower Defence возможность помогать вышкам (а тут ловушкам) главным героем сносить противника - это уже половина успеха. Однако здесь такая идея не просто удачна, она превращает почти каждую миссию в напряженную схватку. Добавим сюда немного юмора и получаем великолепную игру для отдыха!
Крайне рекомендую!

author: {'steamid': '76561198077700068', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 178, 'last_played': 1567026908}
review:
1편, 2편 동시구매해서 해보았는데 2편은 아무래도 얼마 하지 않을 것 같아서 환불했습니다.

2편이 코옵도 있고 기능도 추가되서 더 즐길거리가 많은 것은 사실이지만, 완성도는 1편이 더 높지 않나 개인적으로 생각합니다.게임에 있어서 게임 내의 던전의  몰입감과 분위기 같은 것들이 게임의 플레이를 많이 좌우한다고 생각하는 편인데 1편이 저에게는 더 와닿았습니다. 디아블로로 비유하자면 1편이 지금도 명작으로 느껴지는 이유와 비슷하달까요.

둘다 잘만든 게임이고 세일할때 구매한다면 후회없는 선택이 될 것이라고 생각합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198099511835', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1527428906}
review:
Шутер/тауэр дефенс вроде Санктумов, только от третьего лица, фэнтезийный и куда более юморной - и пошустрее их, кажется. Башен нет, лабиринт выстраивать не надо, только ловушки - напольные, настенные, потолочные; апгрейды ловушек, собственного оружия и бойцов-NPC. Ко второй части приделали кооп и магичную тян. Есть демо-версии.
Ачивки! Фэнтези вайоленс! Рекоммендед! :steamhappy:

author: {'steamid': '76561198327871333', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 595, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 595, 'last_played': 1524908778}
review:
Absolutnie wyjątkowa fajne odcięcie od klasycznych strzelanek i rpg główny cel to ochrona ,,portali'' do świata ludzi przed falami orków Według mnie największe plusy to:
-Polski ,,dubbing'' 
-Ciesząca oko oprawa graficzna 
-Satysfakcjonujący system walki 
-Miła oprawa dźwiękowa
-Konieczność podejmowania przemyślanych decyzji w trakcie rozgrywki 
Jak na razie minusów żadnych nie zauważyłem więc ich nie wymienię aczkolwiek mogłaby być większa ilość jak i zróżnicowanie  broni typu łuk/kusza/topór/miecz. Ale moja ogólna ocena gry to 9/10 :D

review:
A very fun and satisfying Tower defense like no other. Gameplay is based on preferance and playstyle, the artstyle is nice and it is addictive! Some of the later levels require a specific stratergy which is what put me off completing it as i just had to watch a video and it would be easy. With that being said, i still had fun playing and would recommend. :D

UPDATE: I managed to beat the game without help from youtube. It can be hard at times but try different things and you will be rewarded!

8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198145680135', 'num_games_owned': 359, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 2056, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2015, 'last_played': 1583015645}
review:
[h1]Веселый Геноцид ОРКОВ![/h1]

[i] Orcs Must Die - это уникальное сочетание экшена и "Tower defence". Подобные проекты, можно пересчитать по пальцам одной руки.[/i]

[b]Плюсы:[/b]

[i]1) Жги, разрубай, протыкай, замораживай, обливай кислотой, скидавай в пропасть, взрывай, закатывай в блин и т.д. В общем издевайся над орками и другими отродьями, как душе угодно.

На выбор: куча ловушек, особенные элементы карты, а также арсенал героя.

2) Нарастающая сложность.Челлендж был до самого конца игры.

3) Юмор, много тупого , но смешного юмора!

4) Красивая рисовка в стиле Fable и Overlord.

5) И конечно же, орки! Каждая игра, где есть эти зеленые клыкастые пацаны, заслуживает отдельный бал.)[/i]

[b]Минусы:[/b]

[i]1) Сюжет. Он здесь просто, для галочки, а ведь можно было прикольно обыграть!

2) Продолжительная игра надоедает, из-за некого однообразия дизайна локаций.

3) Много одинаковых врагов! Нет боссов.[/i]

[b]6.5 из 10[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198438977158', 'num_games_owned': 105, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 3678, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1609, 'last_played': 1692013053}
review: Orcs Must Die!-это идеальная инди игра которая понравится каждому,сюжет таков:Из-за боевого мага ворволись орки из дверей,и мы за права свободы истребляем их,но орки были сильней и убили почти всех боевых магов, и теперь эту крепость обронять дастоётся нам, это конец,мир обречён.  Теперь давайте посмотрем на саму игру:24 уровня которые тебе не почём,5 уровней из DLC просто жопа,режимы боевой маг и ночной кошмар,дохрена врожин,разные ловушки.Всё это в этой идеальной игре.                                                                                     Сама игра очень даже не плоха,10\10

review:
Es un tower defense clásico pero revolucionario, con un gameplay que se asemeja más a un shooter frenético y mata mata que a un juego táctico de este estilo. Aun así, a mi estas dos combinaciones me gustan y se hace muy divertido y adictivo el juego. Y además, a todos nos mola reventar orcos.

El único pero que no es cooperativo y sería muy bueno de jugar entre dos personas.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971544967', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 148, 'playtime_forever': 2004, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2004, 'last_played': 1520486386}
review:
Really fun action, tower defense game.  This is a tower defense game where you are a character in the game and can attack just like a shooter.  You will pretty much need lay traps as well as fight personally to get through most levels.  The game has a good challenge level, but you should never get too frustrated on the normal level.  There is a good variety of traps and weapon types that are slowly given to you as you progress and there seems to be many strategies that will work.  As you progress you will also be able to improve your traps (but not your weapons / spells) so you can tailor your strategy how you like a bit (but upgrades are permanent so if you make a mistake, you are stuck with it).

Not much else to say, game has a good personality, nice presentation, sound and there were no bugs that I found.  Very polished and worth your time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042571202', 'num_games_owned': 1137, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 1404, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1404, 'last_played': 1519387892}
review:
A classic FPS Tower Defense game with one simple goal, to not let the Orcs reach the Rift.

This game is amazingly enjoyable, but after about 10 levels it begins to get a little bland. Personally, I prefer the sequel 'Orcs must Die! 2' as it is more rounded, easier to get achievements and it is also multiplayer. However, this has a certain nostalgic charm to it that you just gotta love. I dunno, hard to describe. Try it and see.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960559290', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1318489200}
review:
It seemed like a cool idea, but it's shit.

Just look at Fortnite PVE it's basically the same thing only more to explore and build.  It's also boring af and just feels like a grind because you end up doing A LOT of shooting along side your towers.

When I play TD type games I'd prefer to be able to relax while I play.  This is just a non stop pointless grind.  If I wanted high energy (running around constantly having to assess surroundings and react ahead of time and responsible for taking out most targets) I'd be playing CSGO or something else.



[quote=Enyxk0]Every heard of just tagging it as not interested[/quote]

No & thanks for the suggestion. I probably didn't notice it because I'm in a rush constantly to get things done behind the scenes which are bogging me down. It's also possible I just chose to not use it. I'm concerned using it will hide related games that I enjoy and that might be why I ignored it. Shops using algorithms to shove games in my face.. I want a clean, clear way to sort and look through the games myself. Games are being promoted on Valve's end rather than suggesting games that would fit my tastes. Why feed the machine if it's just looking to maximize profits rather than make me happy? There's very little difference between systems like this & others that I benefit from immediately.  :steamhappy:


[quote=The CheesePuff] The whole point of this genre is it isn't just a tower defense game. It's a shooter/ tower defense. You are just supposed to sit there and wait for the towers to do all the work. It's the opposite of a grind, isn't it? A grind is doing the same thing over and over again, whereas in this game you place you towers and your traps and get to move all over the map fighting. [/quote]

From your perspective it's not a grind? And no shit sherlock about "it isn't just a tower defense game" - that's why I bought it and was super excited about it. You obviously didn't understand what I meant so let me clarify for you: The FPS aspect isn't providing the same rewards that other FPS provide. It feels way too close to Diablo 2 & 3 :steambored: with the amount of frantic clicking involved VS skilled, pre-planned and even sometimes intuitive reaction shots, which the game hardly recognizes aside from a headshot. In other FPS if I pull insane 200iq or reaction shot plays (or better yet a combo) I'm immediately rewarded big time, mostly by my peers. :csgoanarchist::csgogun::csgogun:

And no you don't just get to move all over the map. You need to stay put in strategic positions to maximize your traps efficacy or else you will lose. I don't mind challenges, what I do mind are challenges that just test your patience over and over. Ones that feel like a grind designed to just keep you glued to the game doing the same mundane actions over and over. Extreme repetition. That is fucking boring as hell!!! So no it isn't the opposite of a grind, it's made the entire goal behind the game even more grindy than being able to sit back and handle all the strategy side of things, because not only do you have to click like fucking crazy, but you have to constantly aim at heads and shift around in the same small area to get angles. This game requires MASSIVE amounts of clicking just as I said with Diablo 2 & 3, and I'd argue it requires even more.

review:
Orcs Must Die! Un juego super divertido y recomendadisimo! Perfecto para jugar con algun amigo , graficos muy buenos para el 2018 , el protagonista en parte es muy cabron jaja , y eso de las trampas va muy bien , El juego en si lo encuentro muy especial , ir matando orcos , explotarlos en 100 pedazos con bombas y trampas , *c toma un descanso para escribir :v* 
Recomendable comprar los DLC's despues de completar al 100x100 la campaña . El modo Pesadilla es un dolor de cabeza! un juego que te dara bastantes horas de diversion!

10/10. 
*agreguen para jugar partidas n.n*

author: {'steamid': '76561198092539031', 'num_games_owned': 2656, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 1855, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1778, 'last_played': 1561709308}
review:
¡Gran juego! Muy entretenido, con gran variedad de armas y trampas bastante diferenciadas entre sí. Muchas formas de completar cada nivel dependiendo de las herramientas que elijas para llevar a cabo el trabajo, y dependiendo también de tu estrategia y de tu forma de jugar.

Tiene buena duración, tiene comedia, y una excelente banda sonora que te acompañará mientras destroces hordas de orcos una tras otra.

Como requieres de calaveras para mejorar tus herramientas, y cada nivel te da un máximo de 5 en total (siendo 5 la cantidad que obtienes por completarlo a la perfección), vas a necesitar ganar todos a la perfección si deseas poder mejorar todo tu equipamiento al máximo, y esto le añade reto, y varias horas más de diversión matando orcos.

¡Muy recomendado!

review: Orcs Must Die! have the same vibe as the other Tower Defense game, where not only "towers" do all the job - Sanctum. But instead of all of kind futuristic stuff we have here orcs, traps, spells and other fantasy things. It's fun and challenging. The only thing I'm missing here is some kind of endless mode. If you ask me, it's one of more interesting games from this genre. It took me around 8 hours to complete all of the normal levels + the ones from DLC, but there is also challenge mode, achievements, skull system (rating), so there are lots of more stuff to do.

author: {'steamid': '76561198202222971', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1003, 'last_played': 1527386746}
review:
[h1]読まなくてもいいあらすじ[/h1]
本作の舞台は中世ヨーロッパ風の剣と魔法の世界。
魔法によって作物が育ち、疫病とも無縁の豊穣の世界だが、世界と世界を繋ぐ魔法の装置「リフト」が各地に点在しており、そこから押し寄せる異世界の魔物たちに平和を脅かされている。
そこで武装した魔法使い「ウォーメイジ」たちは「オーダー」を結成して砦を築き、日夜異世界の侵攻から世界を守り続けていた。
そんなある日、300年にわたってリフトを守り続けたベテランであり、オーダーの長でもある最高戦力、マスターウォーメイジが戦闘のさなか不注意からコボルトの血で足を滑らせ、床に頭をしたたかにぶつけ還らぬ人となってしまう。
目前に迫るオークの襲撃に対抗できるのは昨日まで半人前扱いだった彼の不肖の弟子ただ1人であった。
「世界はもう終わりじゃな…」
[b][i]「あばよ爺さん！あんたが死んで俺は晴れて見習い卒業だ！」[/i][/b]

[h1]オーク死すべし！[/h1]
TD+TPSの傑作。押し寄せる数百体ものオークやゴブリンの群れから武器や罠を駆使してたった1人で砦を守る、某牛丼チェーン店も真っ青なワンオペ防衛ゲー。
ウェーブの開始前に策をめぐらせ後は結果を見守る従来のTDとは違い、ステージを忙しなく走り回って設置したトラップの補助を行ったり、配置に失敗して出来た穴をアクション部分で塞ぐところが本作の特徴。
設置できるトラップは遊び心にあふれたものが多いが、師匠曰く主人公のウォーメイジとしての才能は「カス」なため最初期は2つのトラップしか扱うことができない。
しかし実戦を経て成長、ステージをクリアする毎に使えるトラップが増えていき一人前になるという彼の成長に合わせたゲームデザインになっている。

ゲームバランスに関してはぶっちゃけクリアするだけなら特定のステージを除けばとあるトラップを設置しているだけで簡単にできてしまう。
しかし本作にはスコアシステムが導入されており、複数のトラップを用いて連続してオークをひき肉にしていく程スコアが加算される仕様となっているためスコア目的なら上述のトラップは扱えないなどやりこみ向けの調整となっている。
ただクリアするだけなら簡単、スコアアタックをすると難しいというライト層とやりこみ層の両方の需要を満たしている点はポイントが高い。

何より一番取り上げるべきが本作と続編の2作が公式で吹き替え込みのローカライズがされているところ。
デビルメイクライばりの詰んでる世界観でお調子者な主人公がを軽口を叩きまくる。機械翻訳じゃない完璧な日本語で。
こんなものが定価1000円、安いときでは100円で買えてしまうのは控えめに言っても狂気の沙汰。だから買おう。

review: This game is tower defense style game play with an interesting twist  because it is from the Third-person Perspective. I find the concept of planting traps and using the various methods at your disposal to deal with orcs an interesting one. That being said I would never buy this game. I got it free with the purchase of a Radeon card. Honestly, I don't know why anyone would buy it. It's mildly entertaining, but it really isn't that good. When I think "what game do I want to play?" I don't think Orcs Must Die! But, that is just my opinion if you think you will be a die-hard fan of this game don't let me stand in your way.
