author: {'steamid': '76561197998119247', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 175, 'playtime_forever': 1020, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1020, 'last_played': 1483801308}
review:
Robot Entertainment have produced a slick action game here based around the popular tower defence genre. This game follows the traditional tower defence script of building traps to stop a constant stream of enemy foe but introduces player spells and weapons to assist.
Far from becoming confused the game merges the 2 styles effortlessly, there are occasions when building an intricate series of diversions and traps is the order of the day and other times when equipping your poking stick and some fire gauntlets is required to smite the raging hordes.
The game follows a steady learning curve, those new to tower defense games will be handheld throughout the first stages and with the game introducing new skills and abilities as you go along you will never feel overwhelmed at the pace.
The games real charm rests in the war mage himself, the character story is developed via cut scenes between levels, he's equipped with a few witty one liners that he will dole out at various times and you cant help but like the guy!
The graphics are good, the music is solid and atmospheric . Some people will play through it once but with the introduction of the "skull ranking" system many will replay the levels in order to 5 skull them. In this game skulls mean upgrades and upgrades means more dead orcs! ... This game takes its place as one of the best tower defence games available today. With the announcement of a sequel on the way things are looking good for Robot Entertainment.

author: {'steamid': '76561198099788052', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1490339366}
review:
오크 머스트 다이. (Orcs Must Die!).

오크를 막는 결계를 유지중이던 대마법사가 죽자, 그의 조수가 오크들을 막는 이야기를 게임으로서 다루고 있다.
한 유명 유트브 게임채널에서 꼭 해볼만한 인디게임으로 추천되어 있기에 구매하여 플레이 해보았다.
결과는 대만족, 
fps, tps장르와 디펜스 장르 게임들을 모두 좋아하는 필자라서, 카솟이나 카글옵에서도 좀비 서바이벌 서버를 많이 이용했었다.
그런 필자의 취향과 딱 들어맞아서 정말 재미있게 플레이했다.

현제 플레이시간 5시간을 초과하기 일보직전인데, 이 짧은 시간동안 마지막 스테이지를 제외하곤 모두 클리어했다.
물론 가장 낮은 난이도이긴 하지만, 그레도 꽤나 하드코어한 편이다.

일단 이게임은 내가볼땐 호불호가 확실히 갈리는 게임이다. 이 점을 유의에 두고 평가를 읽어주기 바란다.

우선 이 게임의 방식은 간단하다. 3인칭으로 플레이어를 조종하며 상대의 진격을 막는 여러가지 함정이나 타워를 설치하며 본인또한 크로스보우, 마법등을 이용해 오크의 진격을 막는 게임이다.

여타 다른 디펜스게임과 비슷하게 특정 구역에 오크들이 도착하면 화면 우측상단의 미니맵 옆 라이프가 까이고, 라이프가 0이 되는순간 게임은 패배한다. 그러나 이 게임이 특별한 점은, 오크들이 그 구역이 아닌 플레이어를 1순위로 노린다는 것이다. 이 시스템과 더불어 플레이어가 죽으면 부활하는것이 아닌 게임이 끝나게 되어있다.

즉, 플레이어 또한 오크들이 들어가면 안되는 특정 구역과 맞먹는 중요도를 가지고 있다는 것이다.

이 게임의 특이한 점이라면 역시 디펜스 게임과 TPS 액션 게임을 한번에 즐길 수 있다는 점이다. 오크들 헤드샷을 때리는 타격감이 일품. 마법으로 오크들을 쓸어버리는 것도 굉장히 재미있다.그렇다고 해서 포탑이 그저 도움을 주는 급의 역할이냐? 그것도 아니다.

아무리 TPS 장르가 섞였다고 해도 이 게임의 분류는 엄연히 "타워 디펜스", 절대 타워의 비중이 낮지 않다. 타워를 사용하지 않으면 1스테이지는 어찌어찌 몰라도 2스테이지부턴 불가능하다. "타워 디펜스"인 만큼 타워 의존도가 높다는 뜻이다.하지만 이렇게되면 또 타워만능주의가 되지 않느냐? 그것도 아니다! 플레이어는 자신을 강화시킬 수도 있고, 마법을 이용하여 오크들을 간단하게 쓸어버릴수도 있다. 항상 탑뷰형식으로 타워와 유닛만 깔며 지루함을 느끼기 쉬웠던 여타 다른 타워 디펜스 게임과는 엄연히 다르다는 소리다.

개인적으로 재미있게 했고, 이만큼 재미있게 플레이했던 디펜스게임이 식물대 좀비와 풍선타워디펜스 5 말고 또 존재할지 의문이다.

디펜스게임을 좋아하는 사람들도 스릴감을 느끼며 재미있게 플레이할 수 있고, 탑뷰형식의 디펜스형식이 거북한 사람들도 TPS가 결홥되어 재미있게 즐길 수 있는 게임이다.

플레이시간은 제법 짧은 편인 것 같다. 곧 공식 후속작인 2편도 해볼 예정인데 2편에 비해서는 플레이시간이 많이 짧아보인다.

그래도 실망하지 마라! 난이도가 총 3개있다. 적어도 3회차까지는 재미있는 게임플레이가 가능하다는 소리다.


이 게임에 대해 이야기는 들어봤지만 흥미를 가지지 않은 사람들이 많을것이다. 허나 생각해보자, 왜 이게임의 평점이 "매우 긍정적","압도적으로 긍정적"일지. 그만큼 신선하고 재미있는 소재를 토대로, 게임성까지 두마리 토끼를 모두 잡았다.

다만 필자는 스토리를 좀 중요시하는 편인데, 스토리는 내다버린 게임이라서 조금 아쉬웠다.

한글화도 안되있긴 한데 솔직히말해서 한글화 그딴거 필요도 없을정도로 게임진행이 쉽다.

스트레스를 해소하고싶다, 색다른 디펜스게임이 필요하다.
이런 류의 사람들에게 최고의 게임이 아닌가 싶다.

이 게임은 다른사람에게 충분히 추천할 가치가 있다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198107109105', 'num_games_owned': 158, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 376, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 316, 'last_played': 1527442848}
review:
[b]Orcs must die[/b] belongs to a genre that is obviously meant to be have repetitiveness, but in a good way so no reason to explain that . You have to stop horde of ogres from getting into some kind of orb that powers you and the valley. Use traps, weapons, guardians and powers to stop the horde. It may sound boring but trust me you'll love it. It has a bit of story that continues on OMD 2! so it is recommended to buy both on bundle.
+ Play as you wish. First 2 levels are meant to teach you but after that kill them however you want.
+ Plenty of creative environment kills available
+ Increasing difficulty doesn't mean the health bar will just increase. Instead, a lot of varied types of ogres come that requires good knowledge of weapons that you'll pick before starting the stage
+ Creative weapons
+ Funny
+ Really cheap on sale

-Just when you think you have the grip, the game ends
-No boss ending, kill the last horde and the game will just end after a cutscene

~Stages are not sorted according to difficulty well. There are difficult levels and some dead easy levels right after that. But maybe thats how they want it to be.

[b]Overall I give this game 7/10 Nick Cage and a big heeeeehaw! [/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198194599329', 'num_games_owned': 956, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 1717, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1650, 'last_played': 1479520872}
review:
An utterly fun game, Orcs Must Die! combines FPS with placing down traps. Probably not a new idea, but that doesn't in any way, shape, or form detract from the enjoyability, so let's get into some pros and cons.

Pros
-It has some story elements (a big thing with me). This game could have gone without story altogether and still been fun, but the developers decided to spice it up! I mean, sure it's a pretty basic story, but, considering the game genre, I'll consider it a pro.
-Responsive and intuitive controls that are easy to learn and get the hang of.
-Normal (Warmage) difficulty getting boring? Try Nightmare difficulty for the challenge you crave.
-Great music and graphics.
-Great replayability across most levels (I say most because the first level, even on Nightmare, will get easy pretty quick).
-Funny commentary from the characters.
-DLC adds new weapons, traps, and levels.

Cons
-No multiplayer. If you're not into that then this point is moot.
-Only one character and set of weapons/traps.
-DLC costs money. Might be a con to some. I wasn't personally bothered by it, but, then again, I probably got it on sale 'cause I'm cheap like that.

So, yeah, that's all I got. So go get it. It's worth its full price, but if you want to get it on sale, that's understandable. Anyways, it's a great game I would recommend to just about everyone.

author: {'steamid': '76561198168801303', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 709, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1575978796}

author: {'steamid': '76561198253126354', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 224, 'last_played': 1483313106}
review:
Orcs Must Die! É um Tower Defense (gênero onde o objetivo é impedir que os adversários percorram um mapa e atinjam determinado ponto especifico) de ação e estratégia, com visão em terceira pessoa e combate em tempo real para um jogador. Foi desenvolvido e publicado pela Robot Entertainment, responsável por jogos como Age of Empires Online e Hero Academy, e lançado somente em formato digital para Xbox 360 e PC em Outubro de 2011.

O enredo gira em torno da Ordem dos Magos de Guerra, um grupo de magos, responsáveis por proteger as Fortalezas da invasão de Orcs (e outros monstros), para que eles não atravessem as Rupturas localizadas dentro delas, estas são a fontes de poder mágico vital para manter a vida na terra e um portal entre o mundo dos homens e dos Orcs. A história se inicia quando o Velho Mestre (e narrador) sofre um acidente ao defender uma das Fortalezas e aparentemente morre, cabendo então ao seu aprendiz (o protagonista do jogo, chamado apenas de o Mago de Guerra), defender as fortalezas em seu lugar, lutando contra as invasões crescentes e cada vez mais organizadas dos Orcs.

O jogo não possui uma história profunda e detalhada, apenas um conceito, que é uma justificativa para os acontecimentos do jogo, o foco principal é a jogabilidade. O enredo é contato através de cutscenes com imagens estáticas ao fim de cada ato, e através de diálogos do protagonista ao inicio de cada fase. A trama é focada no humor muitas vezes negro. O Mago de Guerra é um personagem muito carismático, seus comentários e diálogos durante o gameplay são realmente bem engraçados.

O jogo possui um total de vinte e quatro fazes, dispostas em três atos. Você começa cada fase dentro de uma fortaleza diferente, o objetivo é impedir que os Orcs atravessem as Rupturas, e você tem uma certa quantidade de pontos de Ruptura dependendo da faze, você perde pontos caso algum inimigo atravesse ou você morra, se estes pontos chegarem a zero é Game Over e vai ter que recomeçar toda a faze novamente. Os inimigos surgem em hordas, cada faze tem um numero diferente de hordas, e você tem um intervalo de dez segundos (três no modo pesadelo) entre uma e outra, e alguns momentos de pausa para se organizar, comprar seus itens e posicionar melhor suas defesas.

Para conter os inimigos você tem um arsenal de armas, magias, guardiões (que são NPCs que te auxiliam ao longo da partida) e principalmente armadilhas com diversos efeitos e usos diferentes a sua disposição, que podem ser melhorados com a utilização de caveiras dadas ao fim de cada faze, além de tecelões que servem para melhorar suas habilidades. Uma boa estratégia é vital para vencer, você deve estudar muito bem a faze antes do inicio da partida, fazer um bom posicionamento de cada armadilha ou guardião durante as fazes é essencial para conter os adversários. Mas apenas isso não basta para segura-los, é necessário utilizar armas e magias, e ser rápido e preciso, tomando cuidado para não levar muitos golpes, pois seu personagem é muito frágil e procurar controlar seu reservatório de Magia para que ela não se esgote, felizmente você pode se recuperar rapidamente chegando perto de uma Ruptura.

Os inimigos do jogo são bem variados desde Orcs normais, Kobolds pequenos e fracos, passando pelos mortais Gnolls, até grandes e poderosos Ogros, entre muitos outros, cada um com comportamentos e habilidades diferentes. Por isso é bom tomar cuidado, além de inimigos mais poderosos causarem mais dano, custam mais pontos de Ruptura.

O gameplay é rápido e frenético, você vai se ver muitas vezes correndo de um lado pelo outro pela faze, algumas com vários caminhos, a fim de conter seus adversários, felizmente o jogo responde muito bem aos comandos, tocar de armas, para armadilhas ou magias é rápido e feito alternando as teclas numéricas ou scrolll do mouse (e gatilhos no caso do controle), tornando o jogo rápido e dinâmico.

A ambientação do jogo é por vezes repetitiva as fortalezas são bem parecidas umas com as outras, com mudanças de design em cada faze, mas sempre com mesmo visual, apesar disso elas são bem feitas e detalhadas. Os gráficos do jogo seguem o estilo cartunizado, as cores são vivas e combinam muito bem com todo o resto, apesar disso a violência gráfica é moderada, com Orcs sendo fatiado e suas partes voando pelo cenário (e desaparecendo logo em seguida).

O jogo apresenta total localização em nosso idioma, com menus e dublagem em português, sendo um dos pioneiros na Steam nesse quesito, o que para um jogo independente é algo digno de respeito. E de fato a dublagem é excelente, todo o diálogos e piadas foram muito bem executadas, e não possuem qualquer erro, além das vozes combinarem muito bem. A ressalva fica por conta do gameplay com frases sendo repetidas a exaustão, o que chateia um pouco, mas nada que tire o brilho do jogo. A trilha sonora apesar de limitada cumpre seu papel nada de especular, ela é agitada nos momentos de combate e calma nos demais momentos.

Orcs Must Die! é um jogo bem divertido e desafiador que vai proporcionar várias horas de diversão, ele pode parecer difícil a primeira vista, mas a medida que você progride aprende, ganhas novos itens e habilidades e traça estratégias ele se torna bem mais fácil. Ele seria melhor é mais completo com um modo multiplayer, que foi adicionado em sua sequencia Orcs Must Die! 2, mas ainda sim é um jogo excelente e merece ser jogado, principalmente se você gosta de ação e estratégia. Orcs Must Die! custa R$ 16,99 a versão normal e R$ 21,99 a versão GOTY com todas as DLCs.

DLCs:

O jogo possui duas DLCs, já inclusas na versão GOTY Edition:

Orcs Must Die! - Lost Adventures, inclui mais cinco fases que expandem o jogo original, elas são bem mais desafiadoras que as da campanha principal, e são uma boa pedida quem quer um pouco mais de desafio ou caveiras extras para melhorar seus itens. Além disso jogo apresenta dois novos inimigos o Morcego de Gelo e o Mago Ciclope, e um novo item.

Orcs Must Die! - Artifacts of Power, que acrescenta duas novas armas e duas novas armadilhas.

Aqueles que fizeram a pré compra do jogo receberam a roupa alternativa Cavaleiro da Ordem, que nunca foi lançada via DLC. Todos os monstros, armas e roupas, lançadas como conteúdo adicional neste jogo vieram por padrão em Orcs Must Die! 2.

O QUE PODE AGRADAR:

- Jogo viciante e realmente divertido, rende muitas horas de gameplay.
- Legendas e dublagem totalmente em português brasileiro, que ficaram muito boas por sinal.
- O jogo é realmente leve e possui excelente otimização, não há quedas de FPS mesmo com a grande quantidade de elementos na tela ao mesmo tempo.

O QUE PODE DESAGRADAR:

- Diálogos muitas vezes repetitivos durante o jogo.
- A ambientação tem poucas variações entre as fases.
- Ausência de um modo multiplayer, muito comum neste gênero de jogo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073852396', 'num_games_owned': 1034, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 331, 'last_played': 1559019657}
review:
К этой игре нужен определённый подход и выбор "купить или нет" может быть достаточно неоднозначным.
С одной стороны, это очень добротная, красивая и интересная вариация TD-игры с большущей долей экшна.
С другой же - она становится почти непроходима (с определённого момента), если играть в одиночку на средней или высокой сложности (а кооператива в этой части нет).
В общем и целом, эта игра мне нравится больше своего аналога Sanctum: несмотря на то, что там перспектива от первого лица, по концепции игра та же, разве что сеттинг может повлиять на выбор.

Поэтому напишу так: если вы любите игры с механикой tower-defence, но ориентированные на экшн, реакцию и слэшерные/шутерные элементы, и вам не с кем разделить прохождение - стоит брать её по скидке и с DLC Artifacts of Power, ибо предметы типа перчаток вампира или колодца маны неплохо так меняют игровой баланс, и проходить сюжетную кампанию, причём сбавлять сложность со средней на низкую как только игра будет становиться нудноватой и излишне сложной. В таком раскладе прохождение основной кампании составит часов 5-7.
В случае же, когда проходить собираетесь в кооперативе, стоит сразу брать вторую часть и проходить мимо этой. Лор игры не настолько богат, чтобы вы там могли что-то упустить, так что если сингловое прохождение не интересует, можно смело пропускать.

author: {'steamid': '76561198152153235', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 142, 'playtime_forever': 931, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 829, 'last_played': 1481175663}
review:
这将RPG和塔防结合起来的闯关游戏，各种设计UI都很人性化就是放陷阱的时候红光太刺眼了。一代没有字幕和联机模式，前期那个酸液很好用将怪引到一起在炸非常快的清理普通小怪。食人魔就有节奏的爆头就行，冰冻法术必备，主要升级障碍 箭墙  切割机  弓箭手 圣骑士，前期升级尖刺和沥青。大部分关卡打法就是用弓箭手在安全的位置清理飞行物，障碍放在关键位置将怪引到一路（特别是好几路出怪的），然后最前面尖刺 火焰喷射中间路径箭墙或者切割机，上面加点钟摆，弓箭手在高处最后靠近水晶的时候障碍卡一个口子放几个圣骑。遇到有岩浆之类的关卡可以用弹簧和推推，顺便说一下切割机太好用了。可以作为主力，自己可以用传送门到处支援一下用冰法术对付那些大型食人魔，冰食人魔就爆头就行。女神大部分关卡点战争加强陷阱和兵力强度，个别短的关卡点加强自己能力的女神。弓箭手和圣骑士总的数量是有限的所以要想好比例。

+多种多样的陷阱和法术设计
+不重复有特点的关卡
+友好简单的UI和操作设计
+需要不同方法对付的怪物需要一定策略性和思考
+滑稽夸张的画风和动作
+优秀的场景设计和舒服的画面
+全部骷髅拿到过关的快感，具有挑战性的难度
—没有对话字幕
—放陷阱时和部分关卡过于强的光线影响感官
9.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198033300542', 'num_games_owned': 658, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 592, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 592, 'last_played': 1477591760}
review:
Orc must die

 -Jugabilidad: Posee una duración un poco corta ya que solo tiene la campaña y me la he pasado solo en 8 h y eso que he repetido muchos niveles para conseguir mejor puntuación. Al solo tener la corta campaña como único modo de juego le resta muchos puntos al juego ya que se le podría sacar mucho partido si tuviese un modo cooperativo o un modo de supervivencia de aguantar rondas hasta perder, también Un modo duelo de enfrentarnos contra alguien en online y quien aguante más rondas gana. Son necesarias más actualizaciones en las trampas y más armas ya que hay poca variedad pero tiene una buena variedad de enemigos y de trampas (La mayoría de lo que le falta a este en Orc must die 2 lo tiene). Por todo ello puntúo este apartado con un 6.5

-Tecnología: Este juego funciona sin ningún problema, sin caídas de frames ni nada por el estilo. Los efectos de luz y sombreados están bien. Puntúo este apartado con un 7.  

-Gráficos: Están muy bien siendo gráficos caricaturescos que combinan muy bien con este juego tower defense. En todo el juego no he tenido problemas con ninguna textura. Las animaciones del juego están muy bien tanto las de las trampas, armas, enemigos, etc… Puntúo este apartado con un 8.  

-Sonido: Tiene una banda sonora muy buena, todas las canciones que han puesto en los niveles me han encantado y no me han resultado repetitivas. Los efectos sonoros de las trampas, las armas y los orcos están muy bien. El doblaje a español me ha resultado impecable ya que las voces que tenían cada personaje les quedaban muy bien. Puntúo este apartado con un 9.

-Innovación: Lo innovador de este juego es que ha mezclado los géneros de acción en tercera persona y tower defense y les ha quedado genial aunque en ese mismo año hay otro juego que ha mezclado esos dos géneros que se llama Sanctum (juego que no lo he jugado pero tiene buena pinta). Hay que  destacar los enemigos voladores que nos harán tener que centrarnos no solo en las trampas a ras de suelo, también a la altura adecuada para que alcancen a los enemigos que vuelan. Puntúo este apartado con un 8.



Finalmente este juego recibe, desde un punto de vista crítico, un merecido 7.5.

review:
TPSとディフェンスゲームの融合したゲーム。
簡単すぎず難しすぎず、主人公とトラップの両方をうまく使わないとクリアできない絶妙なゲームバランスがすばらしい。
もともとの値段も安いうえに、ちょくちょくセールを行っているため、1コインで買えてしまう。

IMHO it's better than the second part as it's really pure and straight fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014333343', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 2989, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2859, 'last_played': 1626590474}
review:
20 years ago Lemmings one of the most popular video games of its time saw you guide and eventually rescue cute little suicidal rascals through a plethora of destructible landscapes. Now fully fleshed out in a 3 dimensional take on what made this game so fun has been mastered. The wit, premise, control, Ui, art style, characters, gameplay, even plot in what is essentially a tower defence game is superb. I haven't played Nintendo in a long time but this game distinctly reminds me of its charm, knowingness and ability to throw you in the deep end of fun.

Orcs Must Die hard mode aptly named Nightmare and the games achievements offer re-playability to OMD on par with Super Meat Boy one false move and you have to try your best again. The nail biting choices you have to make with your fully loaded arsenal are many. Usually these choices will make themselves self evident: a little nook for archers where they oversee a choke point or noticing you will be facing fire dragons you choose the ice ring knowing they a vulnerable to it. But sometimes you will be forced to change your tactics in the face of defeat. It's a mad house at times: fine tuning, timing and running about building, fixing and fending off the horde until your sophisticated blender of death is running at optimum efficiency.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027873712', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 208, 'playtime_forever': 196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 196, 'last_played': 1480022655}
review:
This game is not a casual game. OMD is deceptively challenging and ramps in difficulty pretty quickly in only a few levels; it's nothing rage inducing unless you are a perfectionist seeking a perfect skull score on each level (compare it to getting full stars in Angry Birds). 

At it's core it's an ultra-competitive score attack arcade game and is best played as a marathon rather than in short bursts as you'll have time to warm up and eventually play at your best. 

Pros:
- Smooth gameplay
- No spoonfeeding
- Great balance between budgetting, planning, setting up traps and commencing the action
- Replay value

Cons:
The game has a number of annoyances but nothing worthy of including in this review.
Simply put they could have tweaked certain things a bit more for my taste.

Note: If you don't have a strong fan for your PC be wary of overheating.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046641847', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1647, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1647, 'last_played': 1412267188}
review:
力技も一つの方法

マップは単純ですが、高低差があったり使えるギミックが違っていたりして一つのステージでも復数のクリア方法を試せるのが良い
トラップの種類は豊富でゲームをやりこんでいくうちに自分の得意なトラップのコンボができてくる
数十体のオークを一気に殲滅する気持ちよさがたまらない

難易度は丁度良く多少頭を悩ませるところがあるかもしれないが
ノーマルモードは難なくクリアできると思う
簡単なステージでは主人公のボウガンのゴリ押しがトラップより活躍することもある

他の人のプレイ動画を参考にしてそこから新しいテクニックを覚えるのも楽しい

review:
This is a great example of how to combine action and tower defense gameplay.

Gameplay is very fun; the variety of weapons and traps gives you plenty of ways to complete most levels. However, some traps/weapons need to be upgraded before they're useful IMO.

The art style, soundtrack and story (what little story there is) are all fun and upbeat, and make a very fun atmosphere. The dialogue is gold, too.

Nightmare mode is exactly what is says on the tin.

Absolutely recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198174436470', 'num_games_owned': 68, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 1671, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1074, 'last_played': 1675880072}
review:
[h1]Vorwort[/h1]

Ein Magier soll ein Portal verteidigen durch das die Orks in die Menschenwelt gelangen können. Irgendwann jedoch beißt der alte Mann ins Gras und sein dümmlicher Lehrling muss seine Aufgabe übernehmen. Dies tut er auch mit entsprechenden Kommentaren. So kloppen wir uns nun in der Rolle des Lehrlings durch verschiedene Level immer mit der Aufgabe die Orks daran zu hindern die Portale zu betreten. Hierfür stehen uns eine ganze Reihe unterschiedlicher Waffen,Fallen und Zauber zur Verfügung. Wie wir die Orks umlegen ist ganz uns überlassen und nur durch die Umgebung begrenzt. Nebenbei erfahren wir wie alles seinen Anfang nahm und wer wirklich hinter der Invasion durch die Orks steckt. Haben wir das alles hinter uns gebracht warten mit der Erweiterung noch weitere Level die von uns gemeistern werden müssen.

[h1]Wertung[/h1]

[b]Pro[/b]
[list]
  [*]3 Schwierigkeitsgrade
  [*]24 verschiedene Level + 5 mit Erweiterungen
  [*]18 verschiedene Fallen + 4 mit Erweiterungen
  [*] die aufgewertet werden können
  [*]12 verschiedene Gegnertypen + 2 mit Erweiterungen
  [*]3 wählbare Talentbäume
  [*]Ranglisten
[/list]
[b]Contra[/b]
[list]
  [*]manche Level teilweise unfair vom Schwierigkeitsgrad
  [*]kein Multiplayer Modus
  [*]keine freie Tastenbelegung
  [*]Tutorial nur in Bildern und nicht spielbar
  [*]Erweiterungen ohne eigene Story
[/list]
[h1]Schlusswort[/h1]

Wer für nebenbei ein Spiel sucht bei dem man nicht viel machen muss und etwas kreativ ist der ist mit Orcs Must Die! Gut aufgehoben. Für Fans von Tower Defense genau das richtige. Für 10€ kann ich es ohne Bedenken empfehlen.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969322683', 'num_games_owned': 416, 'num_reviews': 233, 'playtime_forever': 2738, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2680, 'last_played': 1480794760}
review:
重大な欠陥が見つかった為、お勧めしませんに変更。２０１６／１１／２０付

ＨＤＤがクラッシュする可能性があります。
Ｗｉｎ１０　Ｈｏｍｅ　６４ｂｉｔで確認。

「ステージをやり直す」で再挑戦する度にメモリリークが起こり、最後にはクライアントが停止します。
（※原因はＶＣ＋＋２００８ランタイムＤＬＬのアプリケーションエラーによる、カーネル停止でした）

問題はこの作品ではチート対策の為かウインドウモードにする事が出来ず、Ctrl+Alt+Delでタスクマネージャーを立ち上げると操作不能状態に陥ります。

この二つの状況が組み合わさると、クライアントがＨＤＤにキャッシュデータをアクセスした際にメモリリークでクラッシュし、いわゆるファイルオープン状態で操作不能になります。
こうなると電源ボタンで強制終了させるしかないのですが、当然ＨＤＤが破損する可能性があります。
下記のゲーム内容で書いた通り、１ミスでやり直しをする事になるこのゲーム内容で、やり直しを続けると最後にはマシンごと吹っ飛ぶ仕様なのは、おま環とはいえ、さすがにお勧めでません。
ＨＤＤの異音が聞こえ、アクセスランプが点灯し続けたら、死んだかもしれないという覚悟が必要です。

下記で書いたとおり、トッププレイヤーの人達はどんなコンボを使っているのかと動画をみましたが、
「Ｘｂｏｘだがセーブデータが本当によく壊れる」
「ＰＣのハードディスクが壊れた」
「クライアントがクラッシュする」「音が鳴らなくなる」
という様な発言が動画内容にありましたが、自分も多分に漏れず、見事に一部のファイルが壊れ、ＨＤＤも１０メガほどクラッシュしました。
幸いデフラグはこまめにしてる方ですし、Ｗｉｎ１０はそういう点では過保護気味にＯＳを保護してくれるので、大事にはいたりませんでした。

でも、一昔前のゲームではこの手のクラッシュはよくある事でした。
マシンがハングしてみて思い出しました。
「あー、そういや、ウインドウ化しないゲームってマシン巻き込んで死ぬよなー」って。

回避するには
「もう一度最初から」は二、三回に止めてクライアントを再起動させる。
「Ctrl+Alt+Delができたなら”ログオフ”を躊躇無く選べば、Ｗｉｎ１０がなんとかしてくれる」
「録画ソフトはメモリリークと相性が悪いので、使わない」
「録画ソフトに限らず、バックグラウンドで他のソフトを動かすのもわりと危険」
というところでしょうか、遊ぶ方は気をつけて下さい。

以下、ゲーム内容のレビュー（おすすめ）です
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
Gem CraftやMushroom Defence、Bloons、Kingdom Rushなどと比べると、ゲーム性の方向性が違うのですが、往々にして「エンドコンテンツをステージクリアにしているゲームは、超難易度でストレスが溜まる」為に、あまり人気が無い様に思います。

ＴＤは自分で防御陣を作る事自体が楽しく、更に効率的、或いは更に巨大化、特定の縛りでの構築など、遊ぶ人によって特定面でスコアを稼ぐか、フリーモードで先のウェーブに進むといった楽しみを見つける要素が好まれるのではないか、と自分は思うのですが……。

しかしクリアを目的としたＴＤは「最終的にはパズル化するか、ジャグリングするアクションゲーム」になってしまいがちで、制作側はクリアさせまいと必死でハラスしてくる事になりがちです。
ProtectorやBubble Tankなどが思い当たりますが、かなりストレスを感じる内容で、クリアした後、二度は遊ぶ気にはなれませんでした。

このＯＭＤ１も、そういったハラスがちょくちょく見られ、ラストステージではご存じの通り、ステージの定石を知らないと無理ゲーという状態になっており、ちょっと残念でした。

例えば、構築した陣地を無視する空中敵のラッシュ。例えば、倒せば倒すほど分裂して、ジャグリングしない限りは無理な敵など、何Ｗａｖｅ目までに、この陣形に「しなければならない」という類の内容です。
ＯＭＤ１ではコボルドサッパーとノールですね。
ラストステージのｗａｖｅ６はこの作品において、全ステージ中、最も最悪な敵セットだと思います。

どうやらＯＭＤ２の方では、そういう部分は少なくなっている様ですが、この作品ではエンドコンテンツがナイトメアクリアの為、かなりのストレスを感じるかもしれません。

でも、定石があるという事は、それを攻略して教えてくれるサイトや動画があるという事でもあり、それを見ながら同じ様に陣地を置いていけば、同じ様にクリアできるでしょう。
自分もそうしました。
果たしてそれは、何のゲームなのか。と考えると、答えを見てしまったパズルゲームに近い物を感じます。

この作品が発表されたのは5年前で、その後ＯＭＤ２が出た後、２０１６年には新作も出ていますから、安価で当作を買い、他のシリーズ作品を買うきっかけとするのも良いと思います。

３０００円とか５０００円で買ったなら、ちょっとお進めできない内容ですが、１０００円なら良い内容だと思います。

ちなみに、自分はＤｕｎｇｅｏｎｓ＆Ｄｒａｇｏｎｓ　Ｏｎｌｉｎｅを１０年ほど遊んでいますが、ノール、コボルドのデザインが若干似ている様に感じました。
樽コボルド、爆弾コボルド、ノールのファイアブランド族とウインドラッシャー族など、なんとなく親しみを感じました。

author: {'steamid': '76561198014687447', 'num_games_owned': 1206, 'num_reviews': 179, 'playtime_forever': 277, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 260, 'last_played': 1478006700}
review:
絶対にTECMOの「刻命館」シリーズから着想を得たであろう3人称視点のディフェンスゲーム。

口数の多いイケメン魔導師とトゲトゲやスライサーといった物騒なワナを操作し、オークやトロールなどの怪物たちをポータルへ到達させないかを競うというシンプルな内容だが、平面版ディフェンスと異なる立体版のため一筋縄ではいかず、あらゆる手段を模索することが求められる。

ステージを増すごとにイケメンが使える魔法やワナも増していくため、リプレイ性も高く十人十色の戦略を練ることができる。

steam限定のゲームなのに、無駄にクオリティの高い日本語吹き替え版。

author: {'steamid': '76561198229231924', 'num_games_owned': 1565, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 1294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1162, 'last_played': 1457298315}
review:
Orcs must die is a tower defence game and third person shooter wrapped up into one.

The plot is as simple as it gets. There are two worlds, our world, and the orc world (insert warcraft joke here). They are connected by rifts, which allow travel between the two worlds, and for magic to flow into both worlds. An order has been set up to protect these rifts at all costs, using massive forts filled with traps to stem the hordes. You are a thick beefcake trained by the best old man the order had, before he died, it is your task to defend the rifts and keep back the hordes.

The meat of the game is wave based tower defence, where in you spend mana to set up defences along lanes in order to protect the rift from any nasties trying to get through. You yourself are loaded with weapons as well which allow you to take an active roll in the defence of the rift. You have a set amount of slots with which to select your tools of death and are locked into those until the end of the level. Weapons and traps both take up a single slot, so choose wisely.

Its a difficult but extremely satisfying process, going through each wave and being careful with how you plan everything out, from basic trap set up to the shooting mechanics, every enemy is dealt with in a slightly different way, with no true stratagy to perfectly stop the incoming hordes, you're always moving, always setting up new traps, always doing something. Its chaotic, but rarely overwhelming to the point where its impossible to handle right up until the end when you've failed to make the optimal trap set up somewhere or haven't been active enough in your own personal combat against the creeps. 

Visually the game is very cartoonish, everything is very clean and it goes well with the cheesy comedy aspect, really hammering home the fact the game is light hearted, which is fine. The music scores, while not the greatest pieces, are memorable and even weeks later i can perfectly remember the main theme, i personally found them fantastic, but your tastes may differ.

The game overall was a wonderful experience from start to finish, being one of the most addictive games i've ever played in my life, and it was also the first game i ever played on PC, forever bringing me into the folds of the PC master race. I whole heartedly recommend this game to anyone looking for a fast paced tower defence game, or third person shooter with heavy focus on not doing all the work by yourself.

author: {'steamid': '76561198255238928', 'num_games_owned': 340, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1613029072}
review: Le meilleur jeu de Tower Defense selon moi. Les graphismes sont chouettes, les dialogues et répliques sont pleines d'humour et voir les orcs mourir sur les pièges savament posés... le pieds quoi !

author: {'steamid': '76561198005145171', 'num_games_owned': 1611, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 2361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 635, 'last_played': 1559312988}
review:
3인칭 시점 주인공을 조종해 오크를 학살하는 디펜스게임 입니다.

디펜스 방법은 크게 세가지로 나뉘는데

디펜스게임의 전형적인 함정들을 오크가 다니는 길목에 설치 하는 방법
궁수와 팔라딘으로 이루어진 가디언을 고용하는 방법
주인공의 활, 검, 마법을 강화해 직접 무쌍을 하는 방법

물론 한가지 방법에 올인해 플레이 할 수도 있고,
세가지 방법을 혼합해 플레이 할 수 있습니다만,

매 게임 시작시 세가지 방법중 한가지를 강화하는 스킬트리를 타게되면
그 게임을 플레이 중엔 다른 스킬트리를 적용할 수 없고,
등록 가능한 무기와 마법, 함정의 갯수도 제한되어 있습니다.

따라서 등장할 적의 종류와  지형을 보고 주력으로 사용 할 플레이 방법의 스킬트리 하나와
보조 할 플레이방법 하나를 선택해 전략을 꾸미는게 유용합니다.

또한 다른 디펜스 게임과 달리 적을 직접 죽일때는 물론이고 병사를 고용할때, 함정을 설치할때도
주인공이 직접 설치, 고용 할 장소까지 뛰어가야 합니다.

귀찮을 수 있지만 상당히 역동적이고, 디펜스의 과정에 직접적으로 참여하고 있다는 느낌을 받을 수 있었습니다.
이런 부분이 수동적이고 정적으로만 느껴질 수 있는 여타 디펜스 게임과 차별화 된다고 느껴집니다.
  
기본 난이도는 쉬운 편 이었습니다만, 상위 난이도는 정말 상당히 어렵더군요.
저는 상위는 포기했습니다만, 순발력과 전략에 자신있는분은 도전해 볼 만 할것같습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999921146', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 423, 'playtime_forever': 1058, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1058, 'last_played': 1475144171}
review:
Un Tower Defense intéressant avec un thème médiéval-fantastique teinté d'humour pas désagréable.

Comme avec Sanctum, vous devrez intervenir par le biais d'un personnage en complément des pièges que vous disposerez, ce qui donne beaucoup de dynamisme au GamePlay (on aime ou pas). Vous avez donc à votre disposition plusieurs manières d'aborder les niveaux (arbre de compétences, pièges, pouvoirs, armes). 

Vous ne construirez pas ici le parcours des monstres, les dongeons successifs sont globalement définis avec parfois plusieurs parcours possibles ou alternés et même des pièges déjà existants, au mieux vous pourrez diriger un peu les flux de monstres en disposant des barrages (plutôt chers).

J'ai pris beaucoup de plaisir à y jouer car il-y-a une atmosphère vraiment plaisante/amusante. Même si l'on peut traverser assez facilement chaque niveau, la difficulté est quand même présente si l'on veut réussir à terminer un niveau avec la note maximale à chaque fois.

Souvent à prix réduit et en bundle.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120435966', 'num_games_owned': 179, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 533, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 365, 'last_played': 1536759509}
review:
Jedna z nejlepších her kterou jsem za poslední dobu hrál. Není nic lepšího než hordy orků, které se na vás valí ze všech stran a jejich výrazy když vlezou na jednu z vašich pastiček (*ďábelský smích*). Hra je docela krátká, ale když vás chtne tak vás nepustí a s radostí si dáte nějaký ten level znova. O téhle hře jsem přemýšlel že si ji koupím docela dlohou dobu a vědět o tom jak mě chytne, tak ji kupuju hned bez přemýšlení. Jako velký plus považuji komentáře hrdniny u kterých jsem se nasmál a také velkou variaci toho, jak si rozložit pasti, popřípadě je vůbec nepoužít.

Hru by jsem ohodnotil jako vynikající a doporučil by jsem ji všem bez ohledu na věk anebo vkus.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012510051', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 4711, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4711, 'last_played': 1478743602}
review:
罠だけでなく、主人公も参加できるアクション型タワーディフェンス！
クリアしても何回も遊んでしまうほど、最高に面白いです。
DLCも全部買ったし、2も買いました。
詰まって困った時も、攻略動画を配信なさっている方がいらっしゃり（私はニコニコを見ました）、とても助かりました。
面白いゲーム性のみならず、日本語にも対応かつ楽しい翻訳で、私の中では90点です！
2と比べるとアクションよりも罠に対する比重が高く、ソロプレイが好きな人には本作のほうが楽しめるかもしれません。

author: {'steamid': '76561198082803954', 'num_games_owned': 319, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 2480, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2471, 'last_played': 1478281847}
review:
当年这游戏才出来时，几个玩过的朋友都说好玩，我天天瞎几把忙反而把这游戏搞忘记了。上个月才想起来有这么个东西。上X宝一搜，1+2的合集包只需要12元。
这游戏玩着轻松爽快，一天搞个一两关，到现在一共玩了41小时，连同DLC的5关在内，战斗法师难度和噩梦难度全关卡5骷髅过关，全成就达成。
听说2代的内容比1代又要丰富许多，这1+2合集只要12元非常划算，强力推荐。

author: {'steamid': '76561198132954934', 'num_games_owned': 346, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 8466, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4046, 'last_played': 1497344597}
review: Рубите их, жгите их, протыкайте их и запускайте их в воздух — неважно как, но орки должны умереть в этой стратегии действия. В роли могущественного боевого мага с арсеналом смертоносного оружия, заклинаний и ловушек, защитите 24 крепости от яростных толп опасных врагов, среди которых огры, дьявольские летучие мыши и, разумеется, целое стадо уродливых орков. Сражайтесь с вашими врагами на протяжении кампании, состоящей из нескольких различных по сложности уровней, включая брутальный уровень «Кошмар»! Зажарите орков, сбросив их в лаву, загоните их в ловушку и расплющите потолком, или заморозите их и разнесете на кусочки? Не важно, какое бы оружие или ловушку вы выбрали, орков в любом случае ждет летальный исход! Любителям TD игр покупать.

review: Jogo simples fácil e divertido o jogo vai evoluindo com você pois conforme você vai avançando no jogo os orcs vão ficando cada vez mais fortes e maiores números a quantidade de chances de o orc passar e você não perceber é grande pois você geralmente vai focar na rota em que você está mas muitas vezes alguns deles pegam atalho e quando vai ver o orc já está quase encostando no portal e bate a aflição continua defendendo ou sai e acaba se atrapalhando pois muitas vezes pode ser até um grupo de vários orcs ou até mesmo um troll bem recomendo para todos

author: {'steamid': '76561198028673669', 'num_games_owned': 7009, 'num_reviews': 401, 'playtime_forever': 728, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 728, 'last_played': 1420737797}
review:
Amazing game, totally love it <3.

It has everything to spend a great evening:
+Cartoonish but high-quality graphics - Great animations of everything - traps, spells, orcs deaths. Lovely.
+Variety of enemies (and even allies) - different enemies, different approaches.
+Gameplay: provides awesome replayability which is just great for a single player game - this is a tower defence game AND you are playing as a hero that places those towers, so you can play with more offensive traps so they do everything for you, you can put more effort into leveling your character and kill all the orcs manually, or you can buy some troops and make more defensive traps to block the enemies. Great game. Good level design and nice story.
+If you lucky enough - you can catch this game for 90% on sale - instabuy (don't forget the dlcs they are very useful)
+3 difficulties
+Nice OST

Overall, I loved everything about this game. Very well done.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995480115', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1298, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1262, 'last_played': 1476560908}
review:
Orcs Must Die! is a very nice take on the tower defense genre. Seeing as I only played through the Single Player portion of the game and on Warmage difficulty my review will be based on that.

The game starts out with a short cinematic of an old archmage who meets his untimely demise at the hand of some stairs. As he falls Orcs are about to storm the portals into our world with one last obstacle in their way, the archmage his terribly unskilled apprentice, you.

Throughout the campaign the game slowly expands your arsenal of weapons and traps that you can use to slaughter the oncoming horde as they attempt to break through. At no point are you overwhelmed with choice or are you left with few options on how to handle a given situation.

While some strategies are more effective in certain situations you are always free to take the hard path. The difficulty level is not too high in this game and greatly depends on your preffered play style. Once I developed a certain preffered trap combo I found myself using it over and over with great effect until certain maps came along where the combo was entirely useless forcing me to adapt my playstyle.

The only shortcoming in this game is that while the difficulty is okayish in most levels there are certain spikes that can come as a complety suprise and force you to figure out some mechanics without being informed about them so this might be frustrating for some players who prefer to casualy walk through a game.

The only noticeable bugs I encountered were with flying enemies going straight through walls in some stages and in another some enemies managed to get stuck at the bottom of an acid swamp without dying. Overal these encounters were few and once you were aware of the possibility of them occuring not all that problematic.

Overal score of 8/10, Would totally recommend this to fans of the genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063696282', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 506, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 311, 'last_played': 1476363582}

author: {'steamid': '76561198010119049', 'num_games_owned': 510, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 343, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 343, 'last_played': 1488047473}
review: because Orcs Must Die!

author: {'steamid': '76561198010738109', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1524, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1524, 'last_played': 1476281638}
review:
Pros

+Good variety of traps, weapons, and spells that allow for different playstyles. Want to go heavy on traps? How about heavy on spells and weapons? Or a nice mixture of both? Finding the perfect combination for what works for you can feely very rewarding and fun.
+Good map variance. Maps can force you to switch your build so there's rarely a comfort setup that works for everything. 
+Good music that very rarely grows tiresome or reptitive.
+Graphics are good and still hold up even several years later. Gives off a cartoony vibe, which I enjoyed.
+Good variety of enemies that require different combinations to kill effectively.
+A good amount of challenge from the Nightmare level maps that might require multiple set ups or attempts to figure out the perfect combination.

Cons

-Some of the voice lines that trigger when you set up traps can grow tiresome and reptitive really quickly.
-I suffered some audio issues where a voice line would either stutter halfway through (but the gameplay would be fine) and some waves on some maps just not playing music.
-The story is nearly non existant, but who plays a tower defense game for the story?
-No Co-Op or online play.

Overall Orcs Must Die! is a very fun rewarding Tower Defense / Third Person Shooter hybrid that I highly recommend to fans of those genres.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061676073', 'num_games_owned': 181, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1109, 'last_played': 1479470838}

author: {'steamid': '76561198113519264', 'num_games_owned': 365, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 347, 'last_played': 1476124733}
review:
Лучшая игра 2012 года - по всей видимости то самое числа tower defens игр наконец-то перешло в качество. Балом правит знаменитый интерес: что станет с толпой злобных орков, раз они наступят на ту вот пружину. При всем этом все оставшиеся нюансы игры исполнены так замечательно, что вынудят позеленеть от зависти большая часть ААА тайтлов: рпг-система, боевка, графика, звук и т. п. - все на высшем уровне.

Сильный, взрывной, динамичный экшн. Стратегии здесь, естественно, есть место, но мне более понравилась конкретно "резня" с орками, расчлененка, всевозможные немыслимые композиции. Большое количество ловушек, мистика и прокачка делают игру многообразнее и веселее. Мало того, они не дают надоесть игрушке.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012111055', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 249, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1475789453}
review:
No me ha convencido para nada. He intentado ver sus bondades pero quizás el juego me parezca demasiado simple o puede que no conecte con su estilo. 

Técnicamente reconozco que es correcto. Mapeados en 3D con alturas, variedad de trampas (aunque en el fondo todas me parecían lo mismo), montones de enemigos que van a piñón fijo, sin IA, avanzando por donde les dejas. Cosa que por otro lado es normal en los Tower Defense, no esperaba otra cosa. Vamos, que en aspecto técnico no he visto anda que me chirriase más allá de lo normal sobre todo teniendo en cuenta que el juego ya tiene sus años.

Pero como Tower Defense me pareció caótico y poco satisfactorio. Imagino que si pasas bastantes horas le pillarás el truco a como combinar las distintas trampas para que el escaso oro que te dan salga rentable, pero no pude llegar a ese punto. De hecho a la hora y pico se me hizo bastante cuesta arriba continuar porque, sinceramente, me estaba aburriendo. No soy un entendido de Tower Defense pero sí que me he viciado horas largas en algún juego antiguo del género en móvil. Quizás aquí el hecho de tener un mapa con alturas o el verlo en tercera persona me resultase más confuso.

Como Hack & Slash si que me pareció malo con avaricia. Disparar la ballesta es un ejercicio de azar ya que las flechas van para todos lados. Por suerte hay tantos orcos que es probable que le des a alguno, pero no es nada divertido y parece que simplemente tienes que aporrear botones. Lo mismo me pasa con la espada o con el guante que lanza a gente por el aire. Supongo que luego hay más armas pero no me quedaron ganas de continuar. Es especialmente frustrante dejar pociones o barriles por el medio y ver como explotan cuando no deben simplemente porque tu ballesta decide disparar hacia la derecha en vez de hacia la izquierda que es por donde 'apuntas'. 

Por tanto la suma de dos géneros que a priori me podrían gustar resultó desastrosa para mí.

En cuanto al humor del juego... bueno, pues vale... seguro que si me tomo unas cañas me hace gracia. Bastantes cañas. Muchas cañas. Es que es muy simple, casi de 'pedo, caca, pis'. No me resultó insufrible pero tampoco es que fuera inspirador.

Tengo la segunda parte (debí pillarlos en algún bundle) y supongo que le daré un tiento, pero sin demasiadas esperanzas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026249725', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 4588, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4141, 'last_played': 1480045579}

author: {'steamid': '76561198009326106', 'num_games_owned': 246, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 1485, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 823, 'last_played': 1591630279}
review:
I'm enjoying this game a lot at the moment and it reminds me a lot of Dungeon Defenders. I purchased this and Orcs Must Die 2 in a Steam sale around a year ago I think and i definitely see myself replaying the game on Nightmare difficulty.

Your character is a funny war mage tasked with defending the various dungeons and bastions from an onslaught of ogres, kobolds and orcs. You get to control the war mage in third person as well as actively managing your traps.

Unlike some games you have to wait for a break or stoppage in waves to replace or build traps. In this game you can sell, and lay traps whilst the waves are happening (as long as you or an enemy aren't in the place you want to place your trap).

I felt like they could of expanded the story each level to give a sense of immersion, but the gameplay makes up for this flaw.

If you love tower defense games but want an alternative to your standard one then give this a try.

Pros:

- Fun Gameplay
- Nice Assortment of Enemies
- Quirky Main Protagonist
- Plethora of Traps
- Dynamic Trap Management
- Cool Looking Artwork/Graphics

Cons:

- Not a very in-depth Storyline
- Short Campaign
- Graphics May not Appeal To Some
- No Coop or Multiplayer Aspect.

author: {'steamid': '76561198250793062', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 4335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2270, 'last_played': 1569818855}
review:
Orcs Must Die! is one h*ll of an amazing game. I loved it so much that I played it over and over again until I got all the achievements for the game and cleared every single stage (including the ones from the DLC) with flawless victories. Then I still kept playing just for the heck of it. And I mean, I usually don't even bother getting every achievement for the games I play. 
I don't really remember why I chose to buy this game at first. I must've got the game w/o even watching the gameplay because I thought this is one of those old, classic tower defense games. The thing is, it was actually so much more than that. This game is an excellent combination of a third person action shooter with a tower defense-like aspect. [b]The best part of the game is there are so many ways you can play this game (depending on the stages and your preferences). You can just lay a whole lot of traps and watch the hapless orcs get sliced, crushed, and burned to cinders without even lifting a finger (this usually requires some advanced traps and upgrades you get about halfway through the game, so you won't be able to do this from the very start). You can also become the ultimate orc-slayer and butcher hundreds of orcs single-handedly with your crossbow and bladestaff (well, with the help of a few barricades to limit their paths). Or you can actually act like a War"mage" by equipping yourself with a bunch of different magic armaments and blast the orcs with arcane fury (again with the help of some barricades, I suppose).[/b] Depending on which traps and spells you choose to employ, the possibilities are practically endless. You just have to be creative. 
Also, this game differs from those boring, classic tower defences where you just build the towers, sit, watch, and wait until the long waves end. This game is fast paced (especially on insane difficulty where you only get 3 seconds for preparations!) and action-packed. Even if you choose to just build a whole lot of towers and watch, you will still feel like you are constantly "In-action" due to the way the levels are designed.
[b]One warning here though: if you absolutely hate third person shooters, this might not be the game for you[/b] as you do have to make extensive use of your crossbow in the early game (but as I said, it is possible to completely rely on your traps and guardians and not lift a finger on most of the later stages if you so choose).
Another possible downside of the game is that it has no co-op or multiplay (which became the central part of the later series of this game). It's a pure single-play game. I personally think this is completely acceptable because: 1. If you absolutely want co-op, you can just play the sequels; 2. Unlike the sequels, where the levels are designed for multiple players, the level design of this game is made to be challenging but manageable for a single player.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972347749', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 375, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 375, 'last_played': 1473402012}
review: I didn't expect to have as much fun with this game as I did, but it is a really fulfilling game. I got this one sale for something insanely cheap, and kept in in my library for a long time before I even got to play it. I'm sad I didn't boot it up until now. The game is a mix between a third person shooter (although there is a melee weapon) and some tower defense/strategy elements. As you successfully defend each level, you'll be able to unlock new magic/defenses/units/passive buffs and it is all really rewarding in the end. I would love it if this game was multiplayer, but even still in its current form, it is a blast to play around with.

review:
第三身守城遊戲，難度適中。
遊戲除了在迷宮內佈置陷阱外，
還可操控主角使用矛、十字弩和各種魔法。

由於個人較為喜愛遠程武器，
所以全程只使用十字弩和各種魔法。
十字弩的優點，除了可一擊即爆一眾小怪的頭外，
而對大怪的頭部攻擊傷害也較大，
猶如射擊遊戲般，十分有爽快感！

8/10

+) I liked how the game was. Your view, aim, the battle, sound and effects, etc.

 -) It would've been more nice if we could fight the witch or was it mage?.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068468308', 'num_games_owned': 327, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 1092, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1092, 'last_played': 1471458116}
review:
相当相当不错一款第三人称塔防游戏，作为一款11年的老游戏，如今回味起来也是满满的惬意感。
  作为一个战斗法师，你要做的只有一件事：把出现在你面前的所有兽人都干掉。而你的手上，有许多的陷阱在等待着它们。在武器和陷阱的选择方面，你可以搭配出不同的效果来。尽管一代的陷阱数量偏少，但大部分的陷阱都有它的用处（除了法力井，一般而言我根本不需要这玩意儿，所以大部分时间我都无视它的）。
  在地图方面，我只能说地图制作的太棒了。24座堡垒，各具特色，从小的到大的，都有其可圈可点的地方。厚重而闭塞的堡垒，老实说并不算多么欢乐的气氛，给我一种背水一战的感觉，身后就是裂隙，前方就是涌入的兽人，能做的就是布置好陷阱把兽人都干掉。
  再说说难度方面，在战斗法师难度下，一般人也可以很轻松的全部通关（更别提更加简单的学徒难度了）。而噩梦难度下，尽管可能上手会有点难度，不过总的来说也不算太难。
  在音乐方面，无可挑剔，激昂而富有节奏感的BGM给我十分强的代入感，能让我更专注于享受游戏过程。
  再说说不好的方面，那就是兽人的AI和路线问题，有那么一两种情况会出现兽人前进路线错误的问题，并且还遇到过在有路可走的情况下错误的去攻击路障来清出一条路。这可能会迫使玩家改变原有的布置或者玩家会利用BUG来进行游戏。
  哦，还有个十分有趣的行为：当你完成关卡的瞬间，跳入酸液池或者岩浆，你会发现我们的主角会伴随着死亡响起的BGM跳起舞来。嗯，相当有趣不是吗？
  总的而言，是一款非常非常优秀的游戏，我给出9/10分。1代尽管只有单机内容，但相当经典。可以说，兽人必须死系列的玩家绝对不应该错过1代。

author: {'steamid': '76561198160017153', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 957, 'last_played': 1671783800}
review: Ottimo gioco, uno dei migliori per gli amanti, come me, dei tower defense in tempo reale. la possibilità di uccidere le orde di nemici simultaneamente con le trappole posizionate grazie all'ingengno e con spada e balestra grazie all'abilità del giocatore rende il gameplay profondo. Doppiaggio in italiano perfetto e divertente. Grafica cartoonesca molto piacevole e livelli diversificati. Buona anche la longevita grazie a un discreto numero di livelli e una grande rigiocabilità dell'avventura grazie alle 3 modalità di difficolta presenti e il desiderio per i perfezionisti di terminare tutti i livelli con il massimo delle stelle. Nel complesso, in cambio di circa 10 euro, si ottiene un ottimo tower defense, quasi esente da difetti. Altamente consigliato

review: Orcs Must Die! 2 is one of my all time favourite games. So when I checked out the original Orcs Must Die!, I was pleasantly surprised. This game is pretty much just Orcs Must Die! 2 singleplayer, and if you're a fan of the sequel, you should definently check this game out. 9\10, and yes I am a fanboy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041512403', 'num_games_owned': 1837, 'num_reviews': 2456, 'playtime_forever': 105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1606634010}
review:
포탈로 향하는 오크들을 막자!

액션 디펜스 게임입니다.
포탈을 향하여 다양한 몬스터들이 웨이브 형태로 등장해 접근하며
플레이어는 직접 전투와 트랩, 병사 배치를 통해서 이들을 막아야하죠.

전투 시작전에 보유하고 있는 무기와 트랩들을 선택할 수 있으며,
무기는 자유롭게 교체하면서 사용할 수 있습니다.
석궁을 기본으로 사용하면서 원거리 무기들을 사용할 수 있고
근접 무기를 장착해서 근접해 적들과 전투를 진행할 수 있죠.

트랩과 병사를 배치하기 위해서는 마나를 소모하여
마나는 웨이브를 진행하면서 획득하고 사용할 수 있습니다.
맵의 형태와 적들의 예상 이동 겅로를 잘파악하여 
효율적인 배치를 하는 것이 좋죠.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053826507', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 2269, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2269, 'last_played': 1470733442}
review:
買って損はしない爽快感のある良ゲー。
最初は出来ることも少なくタワーディフェンスなのに攻撃してばっかり…と感じてたんですが後半一気に使えるトラップが増える。増えてくるといろいろ出来るようになって加速度的に面白さが増す。
クリアだけならそんなに難しくないのですが、完勝とTAがいるスカル５狙うと忙しく頭をひねらないといけない絶妙な難易度が素晴らしい。
主人公が無駄にイケボ・敵のオークの声までばっちり日本語のローカライズは、他のゲームも見習って欲しいぐらい。

review:
Juego realmente "Original" en su momento, y creativo con respecto al mezclaro lo de las trampas y cosas de rol como mejorar detalles del jugador, muy adictivo y entretenido a la par de desafiante, lo eh jugado muchisimas horas en offline cuando salio (otra historia) pero ahora le dedique un tiempo a completar los logros y a revivir los jugado, y de verdad lo volveria a jugar, ya hay secuelas pero a quien le gusta el genero de verdad se lo recomiendo que lo juegue porque no es una perdida de tiempo, mas que eso seguro que se lleva alguna gran risa entre los comentarios graciosos del personaje en la campaña, buenos momentos entre los desafios y emocion de querer seguir matando orcos, ogros y gnolls! xD

P.D: 8/10, en lo unico que no le pongo exelente es porque no tiene el modo multijugador, lo demas, impecable! . recomendadisimo señores! xD

author: {'steamid': '76561197969328503', 'num_games_owned': 232, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 3010, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3010, 'last_played': 1469323692}
review:
Orcs Must Die! is a tower defense game where you are in control of the hero who will be fighting off Orcs and planting traps. The game plays like a 3rd person action game mixed in with the traditional tower defense formula. The player plays an extremely active role and your crossbow will be needed just as much as wall arrow traps. There are numerous traps at your disposal and you unlock more as you go along. By the end of my play through I ended up using just about every single trap. They are all designed very well and most of them work well with each other to produce great kill boxes.

The game features three difficulties but you'll want to start on War Mage as you don't gain many skulls (the currency used to upgrade traps) on Apprentice (the easiest). At the end of each map you are awarded between 1 and 5 skulls based on your performance. Getting 5 skulls will require a significant amount of strategy (especially on Nightmare, although there's no achievement for getting all 5 skulls on all stages on Nightmare, just War Mage). You'll need to pretty much know what is going to come out and during what wave so that you can prepare adequately. YouTube is an excellent reference if you're having trouble and is great for learning new strategies that you may not have figured out on your own.

There's not much more to the game outside of the general story mode but getting all 5 skulls on War Mage and Nightmare will take a while, making the game a great value considering it's already quite cheap. The game features leader boards so you can always go back one you've fully upgraded your traps and go for a better score on the global rankings or among your friends. Overall this is a great tower defense game that is well worth your time if you have any love for the genre. 

8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198079068708', 'num_games_owned': 394, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 504, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 504, 'last_played': 1469202439}
review:
[i]Разве бывает много ловушек? Думаю, нет![/i]

[h1][b]Геймплей[/b][/h1]
Tower Defence в чистом виде: преграды и орудия против врагов на их пути к порталу. Можно выбирать различное оружие для вашего главного героя, всевозможные напольные, настенные и потолочные ловушки для умертвления орков, кобольтов, огров и тому подобной нечисти, рвущейся из потустороннего мира. Игра очень динамичная!

[h1][b]Звуковое сопровождение[/b][/h1]
Звуки происходящего на экране порадуют Ваши уши, а особенно те, когда орков разрывает на куски :3
Музыка хоть и повторяется, но не надоедает и постоянно придает процессу живость и динамику.

[h1][b]Юмор[/b][/h1]
Пожалуй, основная фишка Orcs Must Die!
Фразы орка, рвущегося в первых рядах, на подобии "И почему я не стал сантехником?" или танцы главного героя после завершения какого-либо этапа, все это и многое другое не раз вызовет у Вас улыбку или смех :)

[h1][b]Челлендж[/b][/h1]
Не раз придется перепройти некоторые уровни на среднем или кошмарном уровнях сложности. Под каждый зал нужны свои варианты ловушек. Где-то хватит липкой жижи и лучников, где-то - раскаленной лавы. Комбинируйте и создавайте свои тактики!

[h1][b]Плюсы[/b][/h1]
[list]
[*] Простой сюжет, который тем не менее слегка заинтересовывает
[*] Юмор
[*] Музыка
[*] Мясорубка
[*] Челлендж
[/list]

[h1][b]Минусы[/b][/h1]
[list]
[*] Если хотите играть с геймпадом, то Вам придется всегда помнить о том, что его нужно подключать ДО того, как запускать игру. В противном случае, игру надо перезапускать, так как она не видит геймпад, если его подключать в процессе игры.
[/list]

author: {'steamid': '76561198156151718', 'num_games_owned': 274, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 67, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 67, 'last_played': 1469087824}
review:
[h1] Крайне позитивный и забавный Tower defence с элементами экшена. Незамысловатый сюжет и много черного юмора. Приятная картинка и полная русская озвучка. 

Геймплей: [/h1] [b] Разнообразные варианты сочетания ловушек, харизматичный и иронизирующий главный герой, огромное количество врагов и способов их уничтожения. С трудом отровался, чтобы сделать перерыв на чай... [/b]

[h1] Музыка: [/h1] [b] Звуковое сопровождение игры не вызвало нареканий. [/b]

[h1] Графика: [/h1] [b] Во время ураганного замеса, когда приходится бегать от одной половины карты к другой, особо некогда любоваться окружением. Конечно упор здесь не на реалистичную графику (и это хорошо, иначе лаги были б жуткие), но тем не менее, графика не вызывает желание вырвать глаза, и залить в глазницы серной кислоты... [/b]

[h1] Вердикт: 8.8/10 [/h1]
[b] Думаю игра однозначно заслуживает место в библиотеке. Чего ей не хватает - так это мультиплеера (есть во второй части). Если хорошая скидка, то покупаем не задумываясь... Особенно если вам нравится TD, в котором можно принимать непосредственное участие в обороне. [/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198006784126', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 400, 'playtime_forever': 724, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 724, 'last_played': 1469042718}
review:
Orcs Must Die! 

[b]POSITIVES[/b]

+ gute deutsche Sprecher (auch wenn das nicht gerade sonderlich viel ist)
+ 19 tödliche Fallen die man langsam aber stetig hinzubekommt
+ im Level platzierbare Bogenschützen und Paladine die einen bei der Verteidigung unterstützen
+ 11 abwechslungsreiche Gegner (unterschiedliche Orks, Gnolle, Oger, Kobolde, Höllenfledermäuse)
+ gute Spielperformance ohne Ruckler
+ sarkastisch-ironische Sprüche des Helden und der Orcs
+ gutes Leveldesign (mehrere Orc-Eingänge, mehrere Spalt-Portale, verwinkelte Architekturen, Teleporter, Lavagruben, weit geöffnete Hallen, enge Passagen, usw.)
+ leichte Steuerung (übrigens auch Pfeiltasten, auch wenn das in den Steuerungsoptionen nicht angezeigt wird)
+ guter mittlerer Schwierigkeitsgrad (von 3 möglichen namentlich Lehrling, Kriegsmagier, Albtraum) der langsam aber stetig zunimmt
+ Siegestanz nach jedem geschafften Level
+ wer einen Level gut abschließt, wird mit Schädeln belohnt, mit denen man seine Fallen aufwerten kann
+ im späteren Verlauf kann man unter drei verschiedenen sogenannten Weberinnen wählen, die verschiedene Boni, Fähigkeiten oder Fallenverbesserungen gewähren, quasi Spezialisierungen
+ motiviert ungemein und ist sehr unterhaltsam
+ 24 Festungen zum Verteidigen mit immerhin 10+ Spielstunden auf dem mittleren Schwierigkeitsgrad

[b]NEGATIVES[/b]

- Klickorgie (Dauerklicken mit der Linken Maustaste zum betätigen der Primärwaffe)
- Mini-Map ist nicht wirklich übersichtlich, aber immer noch besser als ohne
- kein kooperativer Modus, was sehr Schade ist, da sich das Spiel echt dafür anbietet

[b]FAZIT[/b]

Orcs Must Die ist ein Tower-Defense-artiges Spiel mit einer starken Action Komponente in der Third-Person-Perspektive das sehr viel Spaß macht. Man möchte eigentlich nur noch diesen einen Level machen, nur noch die nächste Orkwelle in die perfekt positionierten Fallen locken, ohne dass Langeweile aufkommt. Ich konnte und wollte einfach nicht aufhören, bis ich nach etwa 11 Stunden komplett durch war, obwohl ich es ja eigentlich nur mal schnell probespielen wollte. Und das schaffen nur sehr wenige Spiele, dass ich sie mit einer solchen Spielzeit an einem Tag durchspiele. Definitiv ein Daumen nach oben!

Wenn ihr an weiteren Reviews von mir interessiert seid, dann folgt meiner [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/10868887-Dark-Chummer%27s-Reviews/?appid=63110]Gruppe[/url].

author: {'steamid': '76561198079559139', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2004, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1447, 'last_played': 1386629611}
review:
Orcs Must Die! is third person a hilarious sit-game-com settled in fantasy medieval theme.

Technically:
[list]
[*] the game is a fantasy / medievial "tower" defence + third person "shoot everything that survived trap lines",
[*] 30 traps, spells and weapons (total), mostly upgradable
[*] 20 (24?) levels to beat + a few in DLC, approx 10h of gameplay,
[*] nightmare difficulty, another 10h of gameplay,
[*] challanges - max score per level - 5-10h,
[/list]

Gameplay notes:
[list]
[*] The difficulty per wave grows with number and setup of enemies, and shrinking space for traps, 
[*] The enemies do not seem to have increased HP per wave,
[*] Most of levels are balanced so that the Mage needs both traps, spells and wepons to hold the line,
[*] Weapons require item slot, there are two in the game: sniping crossbow and melee blade staff,
[*] Spells require equipment slots and to use in the mission and mana to cast,
[*] Defender minions require item slot, and gold to place them,
[*] During a level the Mage can buy upgrade from one of three 'weavers': generic trap upgrade, spell upgrade, mixed upgrade.
[*] Traps cannot be directly upgraded during the level. They can be upgraded during the story.
[*] Some levels have two or more distanced attack paths, of which at least one must be fully secured with traps,
[*] No endless mode (can be found in OMD!2),
[*] It is possible to replay old levels with improved trap set for better score.
[/list]


All of the characters are stereotypic to the point of lunacy.
[list]
[*] The main hero, 'The Warmage' is a young, dumb lad.  Blindly convinced of his own awesomeness. He needs to prevent orcs from enering portals to our world (at which he is good)... and to figure out (at which he is terribly bad) a more permament solution. 
[*] His (former) Master shows up in the story by his memories. He was the last (failed) hope for the world, spare his student, but the only thing greater then his apprentice's ignorance, is his stupidity.
[*] The Sorceress (the prime enemy in the game), does not show up directly, but magically takes quarrels with the Warmage.
[*] Most of her arguments are attempts to insult the Warmage so that he can't figure that out (which is not that hard afterall).  Most of Warmage's speech are (futile) attempts flirt up the Sorceress, and show that he is the most handsome and awesome man in the area (which if of course true, as he is the only one).
[*] The orcs are main competitors for the price for The Best Cannon Fodder in video games: dumb, ugly, run and die in hundreds, have hilarious (though still dumb) speach lines, can be headshot-ed.
[/list]

General info
[list]
[*] OMD is settled in medieval-themed bastions / castle /  dungeons. There is only one level theme.
[*] Forget about cinematics. The storyline is presended via semi-animated drawings. This is a great idea and fits great into the game.
[*] The orcs, the Warmage and the traps have a bit grotesque, comic design. Again, this suits the overall game mood, and slows down graphics 'aging'.
[*] Amazing music. If you run into game OST, do buy it. I managed to get one from Humble Bundle.
[/list]

Any problems?
[list]
[*] Trap balance - some traps are simply better, some are just useless (Hint: use traps with large AOE and fast or no reload),
[*] Since trap upgrades are permament, The Warmage usually sticks with favourite set with little room for experiment.
[*] No co-op game (solved in OMD2)
[*] The super-arogant hero can be hard to get used to. The humor can be sometimes percieved as primitive.
[*] High emphasise placed on combat, it is not possible / extremly difficult to play only with the economy.
[*] First two levels in nightmate are... too nightmareish, the difficulty seems to be easier further.
[*] there are two levels in the game (including final), which must be simply learnt and played by hearth. In each wave the 
Mage must build traps in particular area, buy a proper upgrade and solo secure another corridor. 
Mispacing traps will leave the attacked corridor unsecured.
[/list]



Strong sides
[list]
[*] humor,
[*] nice character design,
[*] good overall ballance in map design,
[*] good balance of strategic / economic components in gameplay (unless you don't like action in tower defences),
[*] interesting maps,
[*] high 'replayablity', level score to be maxed.
[/list]

You should avoid the game, if you:
[list]
[*] dislike action in tower defence and prefer them to be purely economic,
[*] dislike arrogant and dumb protagonists
[/list]

Do play if:
[list]
[*] don't mind thinking / action hybrid,
[*] look for a lot of fun,
[*] tend to max each level
[/list]

author: {'steamid': '76561198065461125', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 2176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2174, 'last_played': 1672053688}
review:
全成就的我告訴你：

想要輕鬆過夢魘級的話一定要用“蘑菇”！昇過級用！
夢魘級衹要有超大型食人魔(冰凍強化、火焰強化、裝甲強化)的關卡必須用“蘑菇”！不要以為自己魔法、武功很厲害！你來不及打的！

如果夢魘級最終章最後一波來的時候你手裡的錢衹夠買兩三個“蘑菇”，你可以放棄了。戰鬥法師級別的最終章我是8個“蘑菇”5骷髏過關的，每位肥仔贈送一個，哈哈哈。

author: {'steamid': '76561198272081313', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 1031, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 927, 'last_played': 1461452358}
review:
This game is quite simple: Shoot, slice and blow up all the orcs.  08/10!

Its a nice mix of TD and a medieval fighting game. WIth the talent-like choices you can personalise how you wanna play each level, going trap heavy, combat heavy or a mix.
The story is not bad but is not the strong point. The funny coments you character makes sometimes are quite cool tho. 

Pros:
- Kill orcs (need say more?)
- Several diferent levels with diferent kinds of enemies
- Choose how you wanna play (TD heavy or slash/shoot heavy)
- Smart ass coments that can actualy make you giggle (maybe...)

Cons:
- Not story rich
- Could get repetitive (but really, killing orcs gets boring for you guys??)

author: {'steamid': '76561198010267364', 'num_games_owned': 1212, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 673, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 673, 'last_played': 1467576119}
review:
Most Tower Defense games are a fairly hands-off genre; you build towers and they do their thing, with your involvement being where to put them and when to upgrade. But lately there have been some that let the player get into the action more personally, and Orcs Must Die is a great example of that. Compared to the nameless protagonists of the last two games, OMD puts you in the shoes of the Apprentice, one of many War Mages tasked with defending rifts to the human world from bands of invading orcs. His tutelage has come to an end though, thanks to his master taking a fatal tumble, forcing him into the role completely. As the Apprentice is a combination of Gaston from Beauty and the Beast and Groose from Skyward Sword, this isn't necessarily a good thing, especially not when the orcs seem to be getting more organized suddenly.

Instead of defending whole territories like other games, each level in Orcs Must Die takes place in a different fort, with a rift on one end and the orcs (as well as other enemies) charging in through the other. So rather than towers, you'll be placing down booby traps instead: spike traps on the floor, walls that shoot out arrows, even swinging maces you can put on low ceilings. It's not too hard to create a total death course enemies will futilely try to wade through. The game's combo system, the ragdoll physics, and the orcs' voice clips as they're being pulverized all help encourage this very well. The Apprentice also has some weapons of his own for crowd control, or the odd enemy that manages to get through your traps.

Each level offers up to five skulls, four for not taking any damage and one for speed, which you can use to upgrade your traps permanently. These range from extra damage on some, to slowing enemies, to dramatically increasing speed. It can make many traps much more useful, although what you spend can't be refunded. The game has 24 levels, which I beat in about ten hours. That unlocks the Nightmare difficulty, which offers tougher enemy placement and much less time to prepare between waves. I didn't find the base game that difficult, so it's a nice option if you want it. There's also some cheap DLC, which offers a few extra tools and some new levels; nothing necessary, but good if you want to get a bit more out of the game. And with one this well-made, there's not much reason you wouldn't.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055763215', 'num_games_owned': 869, 'num_reviews': 164, 'playtime_forever': 1663, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1598, 'last_played': 1479959981}
review:
Best kind of game genre hybrid. This game takes the mechanics of a tower defence game, and adds the excitement of fast-paced FPS gameplay into the formula to make killing orcs as satisfying as possible. And it doesn't take itself too seriously, either, leading to a fun time on every map, during every cutscene, and in every part of the grueling challenge that comes with completing the final levels on nightmare difficulty.

A dang good game that entertains and plays well.

author: {'steamid': '76561197980647317', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 2176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2176, 'last_played': 1346828400}
review:
[h1]1-sentence review :[/h1]
Perfect mix between a 3rd Person Shooter and a Tower Defense Game !

[h1]Pros :[/h1]
- Challenging without being too difficult
- A bunch of really different "towers"
- A ton of enemies
- Varied & interesting Levels
- Funny main character

[h1]Cons :[/h1]
- Lacks a little bit of polishing on user-friendliness
- Orcs Must Die 2 is better (It's not a con for me, but it's the reason some idiots don't recommend this game :) )

author: {'steamid': '76561198030092398', 'num_games_owned': 412, 'num_reviews': 143, 'playtime_forever': 454, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 454, 'last_played': 1457030595}
review:
[i]Общее[/i]: Игра на один раз. Перепроходить её вам вряд ли захочется.
[i]О сеттинге[/i]: Оформление игры прекрасное. Тут всё круто. Рисовка, анимация, подходящее музыкальное сопровождение - Всё это выше всяких похвал. 
Хотя есть одна штука... Ролики представлены в картинках, и что-то мне подсказывает, что это из-за лени. Картинки конечно здоровские, но в чем была проблема сделать круче?
[i]О цене[/i]: Цена приемлемая, НО! Какого чёрта dlc с 2 предметами стоит 59 рублей???Почему сразу нельзя было включить это в игру? Никогда не понимал этих фишек... Дико бесит такое отношение. Напомнило историю с Мафией 2, где куча dlc, которые добавляют по 2 машины и по 2 костюма. 
Конечно в игре есть и второе dlc - Lost Adventures. Вот оно своих денег стоит.
     [h1][b]7/10[/b][/h1] Приятный вечер вам обеспечен.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066117318', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1355472000}
review:
Gioco in cui uccidi orchi, troll, orchi, strane creature, orchi e ancora orchi.
Le modalità con cui queste uccisioni sono effettuate sono davvero tanto geniali e divertenti. 
Il titolo personalmente mi ha stufato dopo alcune ore proprio in virtù dello stile di gioco, in cui si avanza di livello e si ha a che fare con orde sempre maggiori in numero provenienti da tutte le direzioni, in mappe sempre più grandi e complicate.
E' un gioco carino che però soffre tanto l'assenza del multiplayer (mancanza colmata col secondo capitolo per fortuna).

6.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198095486595', 'num_games_owned': 53, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1681153858}
review:
Llevo jugadas varias horas a este juego, aunque STEAM actualmente me dice que llevo 2, es un juego bastante entretenido, en unos momentos que no tenía internet y no podía jugar Bo3, me sirvió bastante para pasar unas cuantas horas agradables. aquí van mis puntuaciones :

Jugabilidad: 7 Es bastante fácil cojerle soltura a los controles, pero a veces se hace pesado hacer tantos clics para los ataques básicos.

Motor Gráfico:Es un juego de 2011 así que no le podemos pedir unos gráficos UltraHD 4K porque no había suficiente potencia en ese momento,pero aún así los gráficos que tiene del estilo "cómic" están bastante bien y tienen su gracia.

Bugs/Errores del juego: De momento no he encontrado ninguno, ni un simple crash he tenido, así que les doy mis felicitaciones al equipo desarollador.

Una pequeña "pizca" sobre el juego: Es un juego de estrategia estilo "Tower Defense" bastante entretenido, normalmente no me gustan este estilo de juegos, pero este al estar 1º persona es más atractivo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039796997', 'num_games_owned': 500, 'num_reviews': 192, 'playtime_forever': 1245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1245, 'last_played': 1463651917}
review:
Любишь Tower Defense? Бесят орки, и все связанные с ними? Тогда, рекрут, ты по адресу!

Главный герой отбитый на всю голову, в плане самосохранения, ученик Боевого мага и абсолютно бездарный(как показалось Учителю). Он последняя надежда Альянса, вынужден защищать порталы дающие магам их силы, но ведущие прямо в серце Альянса, в столицу, т.к. его учитель навернулся на крови гоблина и [u]потерялся[/u]!) (поскользнулся на крови, и расшиб голову об лестницу[spoiler][strike](как бы)[/strike][/spoiler]).

[h1]Геймплей:[/h1] Разнообразные варианты сочетания ловушек, харизматичный и иронизирующий главный герой, огромное количество врагов и способов их уничтожения.

[h1]Музыка:[/h1] Звуковое сопровождение игры нареканий не вызвало.

[h1]Графика:[/h1] Полигонов достаточно для того, что бы игра была достойной и не вызывала желания ее не проходить, она конечно не реалистичная, но вполне достойная.

Думаю игра однозначно заслуживает место в библиотеке. Чего ей не хватает - так это мультиплеера (есть во второй части). Если хорошая скидка, то покупаем не задумываясь... Особенно если вам нравится TD, в котором можно принимать непосредственное участие в обороне.

10 [b]Черепов орка[/b] из 10! (на одного!)

author: {'steamid': '76561198171278762', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 396, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 396, 'last_played': 1464902515}
review:
I got this game for .99 cents when it was on sale, I thought it wouldn\'t be much fun but the opposite is true. This game is a surprising rendition of a classic TD but has a very unique element to it, You are the Character setting traps and slaying orcs with a crossbow. This game with all its unique trap combos, my favorite the Floor Burner with a spring trap to make them endlessly run through it again and again, makes the gameplay enjoyable, there are a few annoying maps but all in all a great game 

Lets take a minute to go through the pros and cons

Pros- The game is surprisingly addictive slaughtering orcs over and over with a trap combo
          The game has unique traps and different map levels each time so you don\'t get used to the same strategy
          The headshot feature is my personal favorite  
          Archers on a bridge are OP
          The Graphics are suprisingly great
   
Cons- The music for the orcs is a bit redundant but fun
           I wish OGRES weren\'t so OP as well as the Fliers if you get caught offguard 

Overview- I would recommend this game for someone who likes TD\'s and Strategy 

PS. Or slaughtering orcs :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198102206785', 'num_games_owned': 401, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 2887, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2804, 'last_played': 1627803730}
review:
I got this game from a bundle sale, I wasn't expecting it to be good.

After some months after buying this game I gave it a try and the experience is sweet!

The game offers you a simple yet challenging gameplay.

Like a tower defense game you only need to prevent the enemies (in this game Orcs,Gnolls,Ogres,etc.) from getting into the Portal (Rift).

You can plant traps and use you hero to cut them,shoot, and kill them with spells, this makes the game more interactive. (which isn't like other tower defense game where you have to wait and watch after planting your towers)

The story is good too simple and funny which makes getting to another level somehow enjoyable as you get to know what and why the orcs are attacking.

The Hero isn't boring either and you get to somehow love the guy as his humor and sarcasm is pretty entertaining and funny.

Grab this game and have some fun. (Have some fun and watch what the traps do to the Orcs.)
